column2: China: Shanghai yakajije ingingo za guma-muhira kubera Covid
column3: Abategetsi ba Shanghai mu Bushinwa bavuga ko bagiye gukomeza ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ingingo za guma mu rugo, mu gihe abandura ca kiza karanda ca Covid muri uwo mugwa mukuru w'ubutunzi bibandanya vyiyongera ku muvuduko. Mu ngingo nshasha harimwo gushiraho imiryango ifise inkengeri za elektroniki zizobuza abanduye gusohoka, co kimwe no kuvana abantu mu mazu yabo kugira ngo apompwe imiti yica imigera. Mu ntango y'iyi ndwi, amajana n'amajana barakuwe mu mihana yabo kugira ngo amazu yabo apompwe imiti yica imigera. Izi ngingo zigiye gushira Shanghai muri guma mu rugo mu ndwi igira gatanu. Abategetsi b'igisagara ca Shanghai bavuga ko abantu bose banduye, hamwe n'incuti zabo za hafi, bazoshirwa mu kibanza reta yateguye co kubugaraniramwo. Hampande y'ivyo, ingingo zo gupompa imiti yica imigera zizokomezwa mu bibanza bimwe bimwe vy'ico gisagara bisinzikaye. Ibi bisigura ko bishoboka ko bamwe mu bahaba bazotegerezwa kuhava mu kiringo gito - harimwo n'abazoba bapimwe bagasanga ntibanduye. Iyi ngingo ije inyuma y'imisi mike abanyagihugu bo mu yindi mirwi ibiri y'i Shanghai  - Beicai na Pingwang - bategetswe kuva mu mihana yabo mu kiringo gito bakimukira mu bibanza vyateguwe. I Beicai, urwandiko rw'ubutegetsi rwahawe abanyagihugu rwabategeka gutekera ibintu vyabo kandi bagasiga ububati bwabo bwuguruye. Basabwa kandi gusiga umuryango w'imbere wuguruye, Amasanamu yo ku mbuga hwaniro y'abantu batonze imirongo n'amasakoshi yabo mw'ijoro yerekana ko ibintu bitari vyoroshe. Izi ngingo ni ikimenyetso c'uko abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bafise ishaka ryo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya Covid i Shanghai - igisagara gifatwa n'ikigega c'ubutunzi bw'igihugu. Uturere tumwe tw'igisagara mu twugawe dufise ikibazo co kuronka imfungurwa, bikaba ngombwa ko abanyagihugu barindira imfashanyo ya reta igizwe n'imboga, inyama n'amagi. Abategetsi baracagerageza poritike yo kurwanya Covid bagashira imbere gutuza burundu uwu mugera aho guhitamwo kubana nawo nk'uko mu bindi bihugu bahisemwo uko. Iki kiza karanda i Shanghai, catanguye kwibonekeza mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, kimaze kwandurwa n'abantu barenga 400.000 bamenyekanye gushika ubu hamwe na 36 bapfuye. Hafi bose ni abantu bafise imyaka yitereye, abatacandazwe bafise ibibazo vy'amagara, nk'uko abategetsi b'Ubushinwa babivuga. Ibi vyatumye imiriyoni 25 z'ababa muri  iki gisagara bategekwa kuguma muhira.

column2: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
column3: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

column2: Kurondera amamuko nyafrika y''intambo y'intambara ya Brazil, capoeira
column3: Brésil  izwi nk'amamuko y'ubuhinga bwo kurwana busa n'intambo buzwi kw'izina rya capoeira, ariko amamuko nyezina mu bisanzwe yinjiye aciye mw'ibahari Atlantic. Marcia Veiga yandika ko muri Angola hari umugabo umwe ariko aragerageza kuvyura iyi ntambo yo muri kahise kugira ngo afashe abantu gusubira kw'iragi ryabo. Gatatu mu ndwi, ubushuhe bwo ku mugoroba burakubita, Lucio Ngungi ari mu kibuga ahantu hamwe i Luanda ku mugwa mukuru wa Angola. Akurikira akayira kagana ku kibuga c'umupira w'amaboko, mu gihe izuba ririco riracokera, hatangura kwumvikana amashi, indirimbo n'ingoma vy'abanyamuziki. Ku muzingi, abanyeshure bambaye T-shirts z'umuhondo ziriho 'masks' za kera, barindiranye igishika cinshi co kwinjira mu muzingi  babiri babiri. Bose ica rimwe, batangura bazunguruka bunamye i buryo n'i bubamfu, mu ntambo izwi nka Ginga. Umwe muri bo, asa n'uwataye umutwe, Ngungi, umukuru wabo yatwawe n'akaririmbo ngo: "Nta kindi gisigaye, hari ubumenyi butandukanye". Iyi rero ni Capoeira Angola, ubuhinga bundi bwo kurwana ariko bukoreshwa gake cane muri Bresil no muri Angola yo nyene ubwayo. Ariko izina ryayo ubwaryo rirerekana amamuko yayo yo mu binjana bitari bike - imbere y'uko abantu bagirwa abaja bakavanwa muri ako karere ko mu bumanuko bwa Afrika bakajanwa muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko kuba abacakara. Yavuyemwo ico icitwa Brésil ubu ibona ko ari umudiho ukomoka mu karanga nyafrika. Ibicurarangisho bifise uruhara ntangere mu gusamaza abarorerezi. Capoeira Angola irimwo akantu ko guterekera, kandi usanga ahanini batambira hasi cane. Nico gituma n'umuziki ugenda buke buke ugereranije n'umudiho uzwi cane, unzwi nka Capoeira Regional. Itandukaniro riri hagati ya  Capoeira Angola na Capoeira Regional ntiryoroshe kubona, ariko muri Capoeira Angola harimwo ibicurarangisho vyinshi kandi abayikora bumva ko ari nk'umugenzo wo gusenga. Intumbero ya Ngungi ni uko ubu bwoko bw'iyi ntambo bumenyekana cane mu bantu. Hafi imyaka 20 iheze, yatanguye kwimenyereza muri Capoeira Regional, ariko haciye imyaka indwi, yahavuye yumva ivya Capoeira Angola aca atahura ko Regional itari rwiwe. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 36 ati: "Nagumye nibaza nti kubera iki mbandanya nkina Regional kandi nshobora kwishikira ku muzi w'igihugu canje". N'aho ata makuru akwiye yari afise, yarondeye kumenya umunya Brésil Pedro Trindade - yari azwi kandi nka Mestre Moraes - akaba yari yarigishijwe ko ari we muhinga yafashe iya mbere mu kunagura Capoeira Angola mu myaka ya 1980. Ngungi ati: "Rimwe rimwe ndashavura iyo niyumviriye ingene uruhara rwa Angola muri capoeira rwibagiwe". Mestre Moraes avuga ko uruhara rwa Afrika rwasuzuguwe, kimwe mu vyabitumye kikaba ari ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. Asigura ati: "Yaramenyekanye nka kimwe mu karanga ka Afrika hanyuma ifatwa ko yari iyo kurwana kubera ishirahamwe ry'abacakara". Hagati mu kinjana ca 16, mu gihe bariko barakora mu mirima, abacakara batanguje icagiye kuba ishusho ya mbere ya capoeira ya Brésil, yahinduwe ubuhinga bwo kurwana buba nk'intambo kama. Inyuma y'aho ubucakara buvaniweho muri Brésil mu 1888, reta yarabujije capoeira, kubera ubwoba ko abacakara baronse ubwigenge bashobora kuyikoresha mu migumuko yari kugorana guhagarika. Yarabandanije mu kinyegero kandi abirabure benshi babandanije bakora icitwa ubu Capoeira Angola bakorera mu bibanza bitazwi, kandi bakoresha amazina atari yo mu kwiyoberanya. Mu myaka ya 1930, Reis Machado, azwi cane kw'izina rya Mestre Bimba, yatanguje uburyo bwo kwigisha capoeira bwatumye yoroha kwiga. Amaze kwumvisha ubutegetsi agaciro k'ubu buhinga bwo kurwana mu mico, bwahavuye bukuraho itegeko ryabuza capoeira, ivyamuhaye akaryo ko gutanguza ishure rya mbere ryigisha capoeira muri Brésil. Hagati aho, capoeira yabandanije gusuzugurwa, cane cane n'abanya Brésil bisununuye. Abonye bimeze uko, Mestre yaciye ashiraho ayandi mategeko ngenderwako - ategeka ko kuja muri yo utegerezwa kuba wambaye impuzu yera kandi nziza, ategeka abanyeshure kuza basa neza, mbere aca ashiraho n'uburyo bwo gutanga amanota ku barusha abandi. Ibi vyatumye capoeira ikwega abantu bashasha baciye batangura gukorera  capoeira mu nzu. Aha rero niho hatanguriye Capoeira Regional. Bitumwe n'uko hari bamwe babandanije bagendera kw'ishusho ya kera, bahavuye bemeranya ko boyita Capoeira Angola  kugira ngo bayitandukaye na capoeira Regional. Ariko uko imyaka yagiye iragenda, niko yagiye ishirwa ku ruhande ivamwo iribagirwa cane. Regional ifise umudiho unyaruka ugereranije na Capoeira Angola. Mestre Bimba yarongeye aravyorosha mu bicurarangisho bikoreshwa, aca akoresha cane umuduri n'ingoma. 'Yarangabanirije ishavu' N'aho yitwa gutyo, ibivugwa ko capoeira ifise amamuko muri Angola biracateye amadidane, kuko abacakara bavuye ku bivuko vya Luanda bari abavanywe mu turere dutandukanye twa Afrika yo hagati n'ubumanuko twose. Ariko ifitaniye isano n'intambo za Angola, nk'akarorero iyizwi nka N'golo - aho imisore ibiri irwana yigana ingene imparage zibiri zirwana barwanira umukobwa. Ariko, n'aho amamuko nyezina ataboneka neza, Ngungi yariyemeje gusubira muri kahise karanze igihugu imbere y'ubucakara yongere ahimirize abanya angola kwishimira akahise kabo. Yahunze afise imyaka 15 mu gihe ca ya ntambara yo muri Angola, ariko atahutse mu gihugu mu 2014, yashatse gufasha kuzana impinduka mu gihugu. Ngungi yabaye umuntu afasha abanyagihugu, hanyuma atanguza ishure ya mbere ya Capoeira muri Angola, Escola de Capoeira Angola Okupandula, bisigura ngo "ndagushimira wewe ngashimira na ba sokuruza". Yahawe ipete rya Contramestre (bisigura umuyobozi), kandi afise akarwi gato, ariko gafise ishaka, k'abanyeshure. Utujwi tw'ibi bicurarangisho -  agogô (amafirimbi), atabaque (ingoma) n'imiduri vyumvikana mu micungararo y'iri shure turyoheye ugutwi. Umunyeshuri w'imyaka 17 yitwa Kelly agira ati: "Nari mpagaze ku rubaraza neraguza irya n'ino kugira menye iyo ayo majwi yariko arava, ariho nagiye mbona Contramestre". Eka na Marcos w'imyaka 18 ni uko nyene, aho yagiye kumenya Capoeira Angola yumvise uwo muziki igihe yari ku rubaraza, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Nkina  Capoeira Angola imisi itanu mu ndwi kandi ndakunda ingene ingabaniriza ishavu, ikamfasha kwiyumva neza, ikamara irungu, kandi ikamfasha kwibagira ivyo hanze". Ukwigisha abanyeshure insiguro ya kahise ka Angola hampande y'umuco w'abanyaburaya ni ngombwa kuri iyi shure. 'Mu kintu kinini cane' Aguinelo umunyeshure akiri muto w'imyaka 15 ati: "Nize vyinshi ku muco wanje ndetse n'igihugu canje biciye muri Capoeira Angola gusumba kw'ishure". Mestre Moraes agereranya Capoeira Angola na ca kimenyetso cerekana isi idahera (symbole de l'infini/infinity symbol), ashaka kuvuga ko hagati mu muzingi umucapoeirista (ni ukuvuga uwukora capoeira) yumva ata mipaka ihari kandi ata n'umwe asumba uwundi. Ati: "Ikwigisha ko uri mu kintu kinini cane" . Abanyeshure ba Ngungi ni bo kimenyetso cavyo. Marcos ati: "Numva nishimiye kuba mfise ikibanza mu kintu kimbohoza cavuye mu bucakara, nk'umuntu nigenga". Indoto ya Ngungi ni uko umusi umwe yozogura ubutaka bukwiye yokwubakamwo ishure kugira ngo abandanye ahimiriza urwaruka gukoresha Capoeira Angola. "Nditaho cane abantu banje kandi nama ndiko ndiyibutsa ko kwishura ivyiza bankoreye atari agahato ahubwo ko ari igikorwa ntegerezwa gukora".

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lukaku, Pogba, Doku, Abraham, Lingard, Sterling
column3: Sergio Aguero aherutse kugurwa na Barcelona yahinyagaye, ibizomutuma adakina mu kiringo c'indwi cumi (amezi arenga atatu). Mw'itangazo uwo murwi wo muri La Liga wasohoye, Barcelona ivuga ko yahinyagaye mu kuguru kw'iburyo. Aguero w'imyaka 33 yinjiye muri  Barcelona ku masezerano y'imyaka ibiri yateyeko igikumu mu kwa gatandatu, avuye muri Manchester City aho yari amaze imyaka cumi, aho yaciye umuhigo mu bakinyi bamaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo vyinshi uwu murwi, akaba yatsinze ibitsindo 260 mu nkino 390. Kugira ngo PSG ishobore kwigarurira iki gihangange co muri Argentina, iriteguye kugurisha abakinyi cumi bose harimwo uwahoze akina hagati muri  Everton umunya Senegal Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 31. (Athletic) Uwu murwi wo mu Bufaransa kandi wahagaritse ivyo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28. (Le Parisien - in French) Inyuma yo gufatwa ibipimo vya mbere vyo kwa muganga muri Chelsea, umusatirizi wa Inter Milan,  umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 ashobora gukinira uwo murwi urukino rwayo rwo kwugurura Premier League aho uzohura na Crystal Palace ku wa gatandatu. (Daily Star) Lyon yamaze kwemerera umushahara wa musatirizi wa  Liverpool umuswisi  Xherdan Shaqiri w'imyaka 29. (L'Equipe - via Get French Football News) Manchester United iriteguye kwemeza ko yamaze kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28 kuri uwu wa gatatu  - bikazomuha akaryo ko kuzokina urukino rwa mbere muri Premier League ku wa gatandatu, aho uwo murwi uzotana mu mitwe na Leeds. (Daily Star) Liverpool ihanze amaso umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Rennes umubirigi Jeremy Doku w'imyaka 19. (Voetbal 24 - in Dutch) Umusatirizi wa Chelsea umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23 ariko araronderwa na Arsenal, Roma hamwe na Atalanta. (Goal) Roma iriko iregereza igiciro c'imiriyoni zababa 47 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika gisabwa kuri Abraham, ni mu gihe Chelsea iriko irarondera ingene yotanga nk'intizo uyu musatirizi ata kibanza kinini agifise, harimwo n'igice cemeza ko uwomutwara afise n'amahirwe yo kuzomugura burundu.  (Mail) Umumenyereza wa Roma Jose Mourinho aripfuza umusatirizi wa  Arsenal umufaransa  Alexander Lacazette w'imyaka 30. (Gazzetta dello Sport - via Boot Room) Leicester iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28 mu gihe uwundi mwongereza mugenzi we James Maddison w'imyaka 24 yova muri uwo murwi. (Football London) Aba Foxes (ni ukuvuga Leicester) baravugwa kandi ko bashaka umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Schalke umunya Turukiya Ozan Kabak w'imyaka 21 - yamaze igice ca nyuma c'umwaka w'inkino uheze muri Liverpool aho yari yaratijijwe - hamwe n'umufaransa na we nyene akina inyuma muri West Ham  Issa Diop w'imyaka 24. (Leicester Mercury) Everton iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Newcastle United umwongereza Sean Longstaff w'imyaka 23. (Athletic) Bayern Munich iriko irihweza nimba yogarukana umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umufaransa Franck Ribery w'imyaka 38 amaze igihe yimenyereza hamwe n'uwu murwi kuva avuye muri  Fiorentina. (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Manchester City umwongereza Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 26 ariteguye kugiriranira ibiganiro n'uwu murwi wiwe kugira ngo ashobore gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano yo kubandanya ayikinira. (Sun) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele w'imyaka 24 ariko arihweza kazoza kiwe muri uwu murwi.  (Athletic)

column2: China: Umukuru w’igihugu aragabisha ko wa mugera corona ukwiragira cane
column3: Inyuma y'inama y'abashikiranganji ku munsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha mu Bushinwa, umukuru w'ico gihugu Xi Jinping  aragabisha ko wa mugera ruhonyabantu corona uriko urakwiragira bidasanzwe. Perezida Xi yabwiye abategetsi bakuru ko igihugu ciwe "kiri mu gihe kidasanzwe". Umugera corona gushika ubu, umaze guhitana abantu 56  abandi nabo bashika 2000 baramaze kuwandura kuva wadutse. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe abashakashatsi b'abongereza bagabisha ko Ubushinwa bushobora kunanirwa no kurwanya uwo mugera. Mui bisagara bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, hari amategeko yafashwe yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza. Kuva uno munsi ku wa Mungu, amamodokari y'abigenga ntiyemererwe kuja mu gisagara ca Wuhan aho uwo mugera watanguriye. Ibirori vy'umunsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha vyatanguye ejo ku wa gatandatu vyarahagaritswe mu bisagara bitari bike. Hagati mu gihugu, ingenzi zitegerezwa kubanza gupimwa ubushuhe, mu gihe ingendo z'amatereni mu bisagara bitari bike zahagaritswe. Mu ntara ya  Hong Kong imaze igihe iri mu migumuko ikomeye hatangajwe ibihe bidasanzwe, ikiringo c'uburuhuko bw'abanyesure naco kirongerezwa. Hari n'ibihugu bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, aho abanduye bashizwe mu bibanza vya bonyene kugira ngo bavurwe. Uwo mugerawa corona uri mu muryango w'imigera itera ibicurane bisanzwe, ariko ukabangamira cane ibihimba vy'ihemero. Mu kumenya ko umuntu yafashwe, atangura kwumva amenetse umutwe, mu nyuma agakorora cane, inyuma y'indwi agatangura kugira ingorane zo guhema. Gushika ubu nta muti canke urucanco rurashobora kuboneka. Abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bikeka ko uyo mugera woba wanduwe uvuye ku bifungurwa vyo mu kiyaga vyinjijwe mu kinyegero. Uwo mugera urateye umutima uhagaze abahinga bavuga ko bishobora kugorana ko igihugu c'Ubushinwa  kuwuhagarika. Abahinga bo mu kigo MRC bo mu Bwongereza kijejwe kwihweza indwara zandukira kw'isi kivuga ko umuntu yawanduye ashobora kuwandukiza abantu hafi batatu. Ico kigo kirashima utwigoro abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bariko barakora mu guhangana n'uwo mugera, ariko bakavuga ko hakenewe ko uwo mugera ubu urwanywa gushika ku bice 60% kugira ngo bashobore kuwuhagarika. Ibihugu vya Thailand, Singapore, Ubuyapani, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Koreya y'Epfo, na Nepal biramaze gutangaza ko bifise abanduye uwo mugera. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, Australia yatangaje ko abantu bane bamaze kwandura, mu bisagara vya Melbourne na Sydney. Eka no ku mugabane wa Bulaya uramaze gushikayo, aho u Bufaransa bumenyesha ko umaze gufata abantu batatu. Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nazo nyene ntiziri kure kuko zivuga ko abantu babiri bamaze kuwandura, harimwo umukenyezi ari mu myaka 60 wo muri Chicago yawanduye avuye mu karere ka Wuhan.

column2: Liverpool 0-1 Real Madrid: Umwaka mwiza cane urangiye mu mubabaro inyuma y'imidugararo y'i Paris
column3: Umwaka wiza cane wa Liverpool yari yitezemwo umunezero w'ibikombe bine  waraye urangiye mu marira inyuma y'imidugararo yabereye i Paris imbere y'urukino. Ijoro ryakeye ryabaye akamuna kuri Liverpool n'abafana bayo ku ngero zose umuntu yokwiyumvira mu gihe Real Madrid yoyo yakoze ivyo yama ikora hanyuma iterura igikombe ca Ligue des Champions/Champions League, ku ncuro igira 14. Intsinzi ya Real y'igitsindo kimwe cinjijwe na  Vinicius Junior ku munota wa 59, yandikishije izina ry'umumenyereza  Carlo Ancelotti mu gitabo ntibagiranwa c'amateka atahukanye igikombe kigira kane nk'umumenyereza muri rino higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). Kuri Liverpool uyu musi mubi kuri bo wugaye imisi itandatu y'amarira inyuma y'aho itakarije ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League aho ku musi wa nyuma  Manchester City ariyo yahavuye igitahukana, isumbije Liverpool inota rimwe ritarenga ntirirenguke, hanyuma ikaba yaraye itakaje imbere y'uyu murwi w'igihangange kandi ufise uburambe, Real Madrid. Ariko, uru rukino rwa nyuma rwaraye rukinywe ntiruzokwibukirwa ku gutsindwa kwa Liverpool n'intsinzi ya Real gusa. Ruzokwibukwa kandi ku midugararo yabereye hanze y'ikibuga Stade de France mu masaha makeya imbere y'uko rutangura, aho ibarabara rigana mu nzira yo mu kuzimu hapande y'ikibuga ryuzuye isinzi ry'abafana ba Liverpool  mu buryo buteye ubwoba. Wegereye aba bafana, warashobora kwumva ingene bari bashushe mbere uko iminota yagenda niko uburakari bwagenda bwiyongera mu gihe batashobora kuva aho bari kubera ubwinshi bwabo. Vyari ibintu bitaryoheye ijisho. Mu gihe icuka kibi cagenda kiduga, n'imirongo miremire yagenda yiyongera ku miryango y'ikibuga, vyagiye kurangira igipolisi c'Ubufaransa gikoresheje ivyuka vy'ipiripiri na vya vyuka vyokera kugira birukane abafana, biba ngombwa ko urukino rutangura rucerewe iminota 36 yose mu gihe uruhande rw'ikibuga rwari rwateguriye Liverpool rwagumye rufise abantu bake cane. Liverpool yasavye ko haba amatohoza ku vyabaye mu gihe UEFA ivuga ko inzitiro "zazibiwe n'ibihumbi vy'abafana bari baguze amatike y'amanyanga ataco yabafashije". Iki nico cuka caranze uru rukino aho Liverpool yagerageje incuro nyinshi kurondera igitsindo ariko ikiseka ku munyegori yari yahumaganye, Umubirigi Thibaut Courtois. Mu gihe abakinyi ba Liverpool bari baguye bukwi mu kibuga, Trent Alexander-Arnold wewe yamaze iminota itari mike yajumarariwe, atabona iyo aja n'iyo ava. Jurgen Klopp n'abahungu biwe ntibazokwibagira uyu mwaka w'inkino berekaniyemwo ubuhinga n'inguvu zidasanzwe mu gutsindira ibikombe bibiri ariko ukaza kurangira mu mubabaro. Alexander-Arnold yaboneka ko yari yacitse intege bidasanzwe, atari gusa umubabaro wo gutsindwa,  ahubwo ku kungene Vinicius yamuciye inyuma akamutsindana igitsindo cagiye kuvamwo intsinzi ya Real. Ariko rero hariho ibintu vyo kwihweza neza, cane cane ku murwi nk'uyu w'igihangange kandi uzwi ko usatira bikomeye. Liverpool yatahukanye ibikombe Carabao Cup na FA Cup, vyompi kuri ya mipira itererwa ku metero 11 (penalties) itsinze Chelsea.  Ibi bisigura ko mu nkino zitatu za nyuma zose (finales) Liverpool itashoboye gutsinda igitsindo na kimwe mu kiringo c'urukino, harimwo mbere no mu biringo bibiri vy'inyongera (prolongations/extra-time). Mu gihe uyu murwi ufise abasatirizi badasanzwe nka Mohamed Salah, Sadio Mane, Luis Diaz, Roberto Firmino na Diogo Jota, ntivyumvikana na gato ukungene badashobora gutera ibitsindo. Muri Carabao Cup na FA Cup nta ngaruka vyagize, ariko nijoro vyaragize ingaruka. Hanyuma uwatumye ibi vyose ni Courtois yari yambaye urwaga, mu gukurayo imipira itandatu yose ya Salah wenyene, hamwe n'uwundi ukomeye watewe na Mane  akawuzibira hanyuma useka ku cuma c'igori imbere yo kwisanga hanze. Ijoro ryakeye ryari nk'ukwihora kuri Salah inyuma y'ivyabaye mu 2018 mu rukino rwa nyuma nyene  aho asekaniye na Sergio Ramos bikaba ngombwa ko ava mu kibuga, akorora amosozi y'umubabaro inyuma y'iminota 30 gusa, urukino rukaba rwagiye kurangira Real ikubise Liverpool 3-1 i Kyiv muri Ukraine. Salah azokwama yibaza igihe cose ingene vyanse ko yinjiza igitsindo na kimwe hano. Ashobora kumara amajoro atari make mu ndoto mbi aho azokwama abona Courtois, uyu muntu umwe yamubereye ifuro ry'igiti. Muri zino ndwi za nyuma, Liverpool yaboneka ko isa n'iyishaka gucika intege kubera ingene bitanga bidasanzwe ariko bikanka ko batsinda, kandi vyaraboneka mu minota ya nyuma uravye ingene bita kugira ngo bisubize iteka, ariko bikaba ivy'ubusa imbere y'uyu murwi w'igihangange wiganje muri iri higanwa rya Champions League, uzi kandi n'ingene ukenyura uwo bahanganye. Muri uno mwaka urangiye, Klopp n'abahungu biwe ntaco batakoze, mbere kuri uyu wa Mungu bakaba biteze kwerekana ibikombe vyabo vya Carabao Cup na FA Cup mu mabarabara ya Liverpool, ariko wibaze ingene vyari kugenda iyo baramuka bateruye iki gikombe ca Champions League ku ncuro igira indwi. Nta muntu n'umwe yiyumvira ko Liverpool yari kurangiza uyu mwaka w'inkino mu mubabaro uravye ingene basugereje Manchester City, muri Premier League gushika ku musi wa nyuma. Uyu murwi wa Pep Guardiola wavuye iyo rwotera izuba ku musi wa nyuma w'ihiganwa kuko wabanje guterwa bibiri vyose ku busa na Aston Villa, imbere y'uko bivyukiranya bagatsinda bitatu mu minota itarenga itanu, gutyo babona kwigizayo Klopp n'abiwe. Ariko mu rukino rwa nijoro, iyo ataba ubuhinga budasanzwe bwa Coutrois, iki gikombe ubu kiva kivugira i  Merseyside. Nta nkeka ko Real yaciye mu nzira zitoroshe, kandi nk'umurwi washoboye gutsinda Paris St-Germain, Chelsea, Manchester City na Liverpool, koko urakwiye iki gikombe ca Champions League. Aha nta keka. Kuri Liverpool kumbure nta muntu yovuga ko uyu mwaka wabaye mubi - kuko bawumaze berekana ubuhinga bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru  - ariko akari ukuri karavugwa, urangiriye i Paris mu buryo budashimishije, mu mubabaro.

column2: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

column2: Umwamkazi Elizabeth: Abaganwa William na Harry bahujwe n’urupfu rwa inakuru wabo
column3: Abandika amakuru bashobora kuba bariko bibaza ibintu vyinshi bokwandika ku bijanye “n’aba bantu bavukana bankana urunuka” canke “abavukana bahuriye mu mubabaro”. Kuba abantu babonye abaganwa bavukana, William na Harry, baramukanya n’isinzi ry’abantu bari kumwe kizoba ikintu ntibagirwa kandi kitari citezwe muri ino misi y’umubabaro. Bari kumwe n’abagore babo, Catherine na Meghan, baramukanije n’abantu i Windsor, mu buryo butari bwitezwe mu ndwi iheze, igihe aba basamuragwa basubira mu Bwongereza. Ico gihe havugwa indyane n’ukudacana uwaka hagati y’imiryango ya William na Harry . Bavugwa ko bari mu nzu zegeranye i Windsor, ariko imitima yabo iri kure na kure. Iyi miryango ntiyari bwigere ibonwa iri kumwe ku mugaragaro mu kiringo kirenga imyaka ibiri. Ibi vyose vyagiye guhinduka ku wa kane. Nimba William na Harry ata mugambi wo kubonana bari bafise, bisanze bahuriye hamwe mu buryo ata muntu n’umwe yari avyiteze. Bisa n’uko hari haciye igihe kirekire, ariko inyuma y’aho Umwamikazi, inakuru wabo, vyankiye, igihugu cose kiriko kibaza amakuru y’amagara yiwe, aba bavukanyi vyabaye ngombwa ko bompi bafata ingendo bakaja i Balmoral aho yari arwariye. Imiryango irashobora gucanamwo mu bihe vy’umubabaro. Ivyiyumviro bikaba vyinshi kandi bigahakwa no kuja ahabona. Biroroshe ko impari za kera zivyurwa n’umubabaro. Ariko kandi kubura umukunzi gushobora kugarukana umwumvikano, mukararabira hamwe ibintu hanyuma mugashira ku ruhande ibibatandukanya. Gishobora kuba igihe ciza co gusubirana. Nivyo, ku muntu atabizi, nta n’umwe yomenya ivy’ari vyo akurikiranye imboneshakure yonyene. Mbega uku kwari ukwiyerekana gusa? Boba bari babwiwe ko bategerezwa kunyegeza ibibatandukanya hanyuma bakerekana ubutumwa bwiza? Ibintu ntibigiye kworoha ariko bizoguma hagati y’aba bavukayi.  William na Harry bari bamaze kuba mu bihe bigoye cane bakiri abana, igihe nyina wabo, Umuganwakazi Diana apfa ahitanywe n’isanganya mu 1997. Ku banyagihugu bari babirindiranye igishika, mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko bifatanije umubabaro n’umuryango w’ibwami, bararyohewe cane babonye William na Catherine, Harry na Meghan, baseruka bari kumwe. N’imiburiburi mu kiringo c’iminota mikeya, ibi bihangange bine vy’ibwami vyarasubiranye. Barifatanije n’abanyagihugu. Nk’uko amakuru ava ibwami abivuga, Umuganwa William niwe yasavye Umuganwa Harry na Meghan ko bojana muri uru rugendo. Nivyo ko iki gihe bagiye hamwe, ariko nta nkeka ko ari kandi igihe co kutumvikana gukomeye. Aba bavukanyi bari hafi yo gufata inzira zitandukanye. Igihe Umwamikazi asandavye, William yaciye aba samuragwa w’ingoma. Azotegerezwa kumenya neza igikorwa kimurindiriye. Ari ku rwego rushasha kandi rukomeye gusumba murumunawe. William ubu ni Umuganwa wa Wales, izina bompi, gushika ejo bakoresha mu guhamagara se wabo. Igihe ingoma y’Umwami Charles III itangazwa ejo ku wa gatandatu, William yari ahagaze neza inyuma y’umwami mushasha, ari we se wabo. Bisa n’uko Umwami hamwe na Camilla, uyu nawe ubu akaba ari Umutambukanyi w’Umwami, hamwe na William na Catherine, ari bo bagiye kuba inkingi y’ingoma. Aba bantu bane nibo bari bakunze kuboneka bari kumwe igihe Charles yaserukira nyina wiwe. Umuganwa Harry wewe yafashe inzira itandukanye, aho we na Meghan n’umuryango wiwe bibera muri California  mu vyabo. Bategerezwa gutangura ubuzima bwabo inyuma y’aho bavavanuriye n’ubuzima bw’ibwami, bakaba batakiri kumwe n’umuryango w’i bwami. Baravugwa cane mu banyagihugu, ariko atari neza igihe cose, bikaba bisa n’uko ibinyamakuru bibakorerako cane.

column2: Zinedine Zidane avuga ko rutahizamu Gareth Bale yimirije kugenda
column3: Rutahizamu wa Real Madrid na Wales, Gareth Bale, ntakiri mu bakinyi bashimwa n'umumenyereza Zinedine Zidane kandi bisa nk'aho agire ave mw'iyo kipe. Uwo mukinyi wa Wales w'imyaka 30 ntiyashizwe mu kibuga mu rukino rwo kwitegurira amahiganwa aza, aho Real yatsindwa 3-1 na Bayern Munich muri Amerika. Aho yavuga nyuma y'urukino, Zidane yagize ati: "Turizera ko azogenda vuba. Vyoba ari vyiza kuri twese. Turiko turaraba ko yoronka ikipe nshasha. "Ntaco mpfa nawe ku buryo bwihariye, ariko haragera igihe ibintu bigakorwa nk'uko biba bikeneye gukorwa." Bale asigaje imyaka itatu mu masezerano yagiranye na Real, yatsindiye Champions League inshuro zine kuva aho aguriwe imiriyoni 85 z'amahera y'Ubwongereza avuye muri Tottenham mu 2013, igiciro caruta ibindi vyose ico gihe. Biravugwa ko aronderwa n'amakipe ya Manchester United na Spurs yo muri Premier League mu Bwongereza, Bayern yatwaye igikombe mu Budage co kimwe n'ikipe zo mu Bushinwa. Asubiza ku vyavuzwe na Zidane, uwuhagarariye inyungu za Bale, Jonathan Barnett, yabwiye AFP ati: "Zidane ateye isoni - nta cubahiro na kimwe aha umukinyi yakoreye vyinshi cane ikipe ya Real Madrid." Ingorane z'imvune zatumye uwo mugabo yamuka muri Wales akina gusa inkino 79 muri La Liga mu myaka ine iheze. Yakinye inkino 42 za Real mu mwaha uheze, igice cazo azikina asimbura.

column2: UK: Abarongoye amakompanyi bemeye kwongereza abakozi b'abirabure
column3: Amakompanyi Barclays na Deloitte hamwe n'ayandi atari make mu Bwongereza yiyemeje kwongereza igitigiri c'abakozi b'abirabure, ni mu ntumbero yo kurwanya akarenganyo gakorerwa abirabure. Mw'ikete ryateweko umukono n'abarongoye amakompanyi 40, basavye n'ayandi makompanyi gukora gutyo. Umukuru w'umurwi witaho Uburinganire n'Uburenganzira bwa Muntu mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC  ko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwiha intumbero yo kwongereza abakozi batari abazungu mu nzego zo hejuru. David Isaac avuga ko amakompanyi akeneye "kugira uruhara rukomeye" mu guha ikibanza gikomeye abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Avuga ko urupfu rwa George Floyd muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rwashize ahabona akarenganyo gakorerwa abantu atari abazungu. Icegeranyo ciswe Colour of Power 2020, cakozwe n'ikigo Green Park gitanga ubuhanuzi ku bijanye n'ubutandukane, kivuga ko mu nzego zo hejuru mu makompanyi atari make mu Bwongereza, muri leta no mu bundi butegetsi bw'igihugu, inkehwa zingana n'ibice bidashika 5%. Kivuga ko ibiharuro bisa n'ivyagumye uko muri ino myaka mike iheze. Umukuru wa kompanyi E.On UK, Michael Lewis, yagize ico avuga ku vyo ayo makompanyi yiyemeje akavuga ati: "Tuzokwama duharanira ivyo twemera kandi twerekane ko dushize hamwe mu kurwanya ivanguramoko, kwigisha abandi no kwishimira ubudasa, ivyo bikazoduha inguvu zo guhindura isi ". Mu gutera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko, abarongoye amakompanyi biyemeje gufata ingingo ziboneka mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c'abirabure mu bakozi bayo. Zimwe muri izo ngingo harimwo: Suki Sandhu, uwatanguje akaba ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe Imvolve ryishinze guhimiriza ubutandukane mu buzi, ni umwe mu bari muri iryo sekeza, avuga ko yatewe intege n'igitigiri c'abemeye gushira igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko. Avuga ati: "Akamo katewe n'isekeza Black Lives Matter ntikagiye uko, kandi amakompanyi akeneye guhaguruka agafata iya mbere mu mpinduka zigamije kwongereza abirabure mu buzi". "Ndafise icizere ko, mu gihe abayobozi benshi bateye igikumu kuri iri kete, dushobora gufatira ku ngingo biyemeje tukazana impinduka mu kazi kandi tukaguma dukurikirana ingene biguma bigenda, kuko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwama atanga ivyageranyo  buri mwaka ". Hagati aho, amakenga ntabura mu bakozi bamwe bamwe b'abirabure. Umwe mu bakozi ba Barclays atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nzovyemera ndabibonye". Icegeranyo Colour of Power 2020 kivuga ko mu bantu 1,097 barongoye inzego nkuru nkuru mu Bwongereza, 1,046 bose ari abazungu.

column2: Ku myaka 99 yaronse umudari w'ifeza w'isi mu kunyonga ikinga
column3: Kenneth Judd  afise imyaka 99, ariko mu gukanyaga ikinga/igare ni bitumwako. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka hafi 100 mu kwezi guheze yatsindiye umudari w'ifeza (yabaye uwa kabiri) mw'ihiganwa ry'isi ryo gutwara ikinga ryitabwe n'abantu 5.000. Kugira atsindire ikibanza ca kabiri, Judd yakanyaze ibirometero 3.779 mu minsi irenga 26. N'ukuvuga muri rusangi ibirometero birenga 140 mu masaha 24, ikirere benshi muri twebwe b'imyaka mike cane gusumba tudashobora kumara dukanyaga ikinga ku munsi umwe, ubanje kureka kubikora iyindi minsi 25 ikurikirana. Judd yabikoreye aho avuka muri Yorkshire no muri Lake District (mu Bongereza). Iryo higanwa rimaze imyaka ine ryitwa Road World For Seniors (Isi y'ibarabara y'abageze mu za bukuru). Abemerewe kuryitaba n'abageze mu za bukuru n'abafise indwara zikunda kujana n'ubusaza , abitaba ihiganwa bakaba bakanyaga  amakinga aguma aho ari (nk'arya yo mu nzu zo kwinonora imitsi, gym) akorwa na kompanyi yo muri Norvege Motitech. Ayo makinga aba acometseko imashini  ya ordinateur, nayo ikaba icometse kuri television, uwuriko aranyonga iryo kinga rero akaguma yibona muri  television nk'uko yoba ari mw'ibarabara vy'ukuri. Ubwo buhinga bumaze imyaka bukoreshwa mu ma gym canke ku wushatse kunyonga ikinga ari iwe, ariko  Motiview,  ubuhinga bwa Motitech bwo kwibona muri television, bugenewe cane cane abantu bageze mu za bukuru n'abafise indwara zikunda kujana n'ubusaza. Intumbero n'uko ababukoresha bakanyaga  ikinga bajana na vídeo y'amabarabara, utuyira n'uturere, hafi y'aho babaye bakiri abana canke bakiri imikangara, kugira bagorore imitsi ku mubiri no mu mutwe. Bo nyene canke ababafasha baratora urukurikirane rw'uturirimbo  two kwumviriza kugira bagire ingoga zo kubandanya bakanyaga. Ihinganwa ry'uyu mwaka ryabaye kuva itariki 6 za Nyakanga/Nzeri (ukwezi kw'icenda) gushika kw'itariki ya mbere Gitugutu/Ukwakira (ukwezi kw'icumi). Abatsinze n'abanyonze ikinga ibirometero vyinsi muri ico kiringo -ubwo buhinga buja burandika ikirere bagize. Bwari ubugira kabiri uwo mutama ageze mu myaka ya 90 yitaba iryo higanwa. Uwo yatwara indege mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi, yabaye uw'indwi mu 2020 (kuko na Covid ntiyabujije ko ihiganwa riba), kuva ico gihe akaba yaciye aguma akora imyimenyerezo kw'ikinga rya Motiview kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere kugira yitegurire ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka. Avuga ati: "Nashaka kurusha aho nashitse mu mwaka uheze, nca ndakora kugira menye ibirometero n'amasaha nshobora kugira buri munsi". "Nanyonga ikinga ata wundi n'umwe ari hafi, mw'ijoro cane canke mu masaha ya kare cane. Abakora mw'ijoro bari bameze neza cane, baranzanira ivyo nywa n'ubwo icayi canje caruhira guhora kuko nitaho kunyonga ikinga. "Witaho umuvuduko wawe n'aho ushobora gushika. Hari aho nagenda ndaraba Yorkshire, ikindi gihe-nkaraba ibindi- uturere tw'ibiyaga" Lindy Renaud, ajejwe kubaho neza mu kigo c'abageze mu za bukuru i Londres, avuga ko igituma nyamukuru Motiview iriko irakundwa n'abantu benshi, n'uko abo bageze mu za bukuru banyonga amakinga bahimirizwa kwibuka ubuto bwabo. Avuga ati: "Ni vyiza ku bwenge, umubiri n'umushasha vyabo." "Bibibutsa ibihe vyiza aho baca bavuga bati 'Oh, ico ndacibutse'." N'ubwo abantu bageze mu za bukuru bose badakeneye gukoresha ubuhinga (technologie), hariko harahinduka vyinshi mu gukoresha ubuhinga mu kubafasha guhangana n'ibibazo bitandukanye birimwo kuba inyakamwe, umutekano n'indwara, canke kuguma banonotse. Abantu bageze mu za bukuru baguma baba benshi kw'isi: gushika mu 2050, 16% y'abantu bose kw'isi bazoba bafise imyaka irenga 65, mu gihe gushika ubu bari 9%  ku bw'ibiharuro vy'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. .

column2: Omicron - USA: Biden yakajije ingingo z'ingendo kubera abagwayi bashasha
column3: Prezida Joe Biden yashize ahabona ingingo zikaze zishasha  ku ngendo mu ntumbero yo kugwanya Covid-19 mu gihe Amerika yemeza ko hariho abantu bari ku rushi banduye ubwoko bushasha bwa Omicron mu gihugu cose. Kuva mu ndwi iza, abantu bavuye mu bindi bihugu baja muri Amerika, harimwo n'abanyamerika, bategerezwa kwipimisha Covid umusi umwe imbere yo gufata urugendo, n'aho boba bararonse urucanco. Abaheruka gukira bashobora kwerekana "icemeza ko bakize". Kwambara agapfukamunwa mu ndege, mw'igariyamoshi n'imodoka rusangi zunguruza abantu bizobandanya gushika hagati mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Incanco imiliyoni n'imiliyoni  zitangirwa muhira kandi zirihwa n'amazu y'ubwishingizi zizobandanya kuboneka. Abantu cumi banduye  Omicron baragaragaye muri Amerika: California, Colorado, Minnesota, New York, no muri  Hawai aho abategetsi bavuga ko uwo muntu yayitowe ata rugendo yari aherutse kugira. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu bamenyesheje ko babonye ibimenyetso bidahambaye cane kuri abo bagwayi. Ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa corona gushika ubu bumaze gutorwa mu bihugu 30 nk'uko vyandikwa mu cegeranyo. Ntibiramenyekana nimba Omicron, ubwoko bwa corona bwihinduye cane, bwoba bwandukira cane canke ko bushobora kuba butumva urucanco. Amerika iriko irahimiriza  abantu bakuze bose kwongera gufata urucanco kugira rwongerereze inguvu umubiri, mu gihe hari imburi ko abazokwandura uwo mugera wa Covid bazokwongerekana muri iki gihe c'ubukonje (winter/hiver). Mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu i Maryland, Biden yavuze ati: "Tugiye kugwanya ubu bwoko bushasha dukoresheje ubuhinga n'ukwihuta, nta kajagari no guta umutwe." Yaheruka gusubiramwo kwemeza ko uwo mugambi "utarimwo gusubira kwugaranwa". Abanyamerika barenga imiliyoni 40 baramaze kwongerwa urucanco rwongerereza inguvu umubiri, ariko abashika hafi imiliyoni ijana  bandi barashobora kuruhabwa nk'uko bivugwa na prezida. Ibigo vyo gucandagiramwo  imiryango amajana n'amajana bizoshirwaho mu gihugu cose mu kugerageza kwongereza igitigiri c'abicandagisha mu bana n'urwaruka. Abategetsi bavuga ko amazu y'ubwishingizi ashobora gutegekwa gusubiza abakiriya babo bashika imiliyoni 150 incanco baguze baronkeye muhira, kandi ko incanco imiliyoni 50 zishobora gutangwa ku buntu ku bantu batagira ubwishingizi biciye mu mavuriro n'ibitaro vyo hagati mu gihugu. Hagati aho, gusubizwa amahera y'incanco ntibizoba biratangura gushika mu kwezi kwa mbere, inyuma y'ikiringo c'akaruhuko kariko karabamwo ingendo nyinshi. Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi vyarahagaritse ingendo ziva mu bihugu umunani vyo mu bumanuko bwa Afrika. Abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko kubuza ingendo bizobatwara umwanya wo kwiga ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa Covid. Ku musi wa kane, umukuru w'igisagara ca New York Kathy Hochul yavuze ko hatowe abantu batanu bafise Omicron mu ntara yiwe. Umugabo  yari yitavye inama i Manhattan mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, bamutoye Omicron. Umwe muri abo banduye  n'umugore w'imyaka 67 yari amaze gucandagwa wo mu karere ka Suffolk yari amaze imisi afise ibimenyetso vyo gukorora no kumeneka umutwe, nk'uko bivugwa na Hochul. Abandi bane bari mu gisagara ca New York. Uwundi vyemejwe ko yanduye ku wa gatatu n'uwo i California, hanyuma i Colorado ku musi wa kane habonetse ingenzi zine zaheruka kuva muri Afrika y'Epfo. Uwasanganywe Omicron i Minnesota yaheruka mu rugendo rw'imisi itatu mu gisagara ca New York ahariko harabera inama. Uwo i Hawai, atari bwacandagwe kandi yigeze kugwara coronavirus mu 2020, nta rugendo yaheruka kugira. Ibi vyerekana ko ukwandukizanya mu mibano bishobora kuba vyaratanguye nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi muvyo amagara y'abantu. Uwo i Hawai yari afise ibimenyetso bibayabaye kandi yari yarafashe ingingo yo kutava muhira nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi.

column2: US: Uko abategetsi bamwe barimo n'uw'u Burundi bakiriye intsinzi ya Joe Biden
column3: Kuva Joe Biden yatangazwa ko yatsindiye kuba Perezida w'Amerika - na Kamala Harris akaba Visi Perezida we, ubutumwa bw'abategetsi batandukanye ku isi bwakomeje kwisukiranya - bwinshi muri bwo bw'abishimiye intsinzi ye.

column2: FAO: Ata mafaranga abonetse indege zo kurwanya inzige zirahagarara
column3: Ishami rya ONU rikurikirana uburimyi n'ivyo kurya kw'isi FAO riragabisha ko indege zaryo zose zafasha mu kurwanya inzige zongeye gutera muri Afrika y'ubuseruko zishobora kudasubira gukora hamwe ritoronka amafaranga angana na miriyoni 38 z'ama dolari ($38 million). Izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima zongeye gutera muri Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia aho zigeramiye imibereho y'abarimyi n'abarozi basanzwe bahanzwe n'ingaruka z'izikiza ca Covid-19 n'imyuzure muri ako karere. Ku mwihwezo wa vuba, FAO isanga izo nzige zimaze gutera mu ntara 11  muri Kenya kandi ko ziriko zitera zija mu ntara zo kw'ibahari z'ico gihugu hamwe no muri Tanzania. Zimaze kwonona kandi imirima muri Ethiopia na Somalia uyu mwaka. Ribaye irya  gatatu  muri aka karere hatera inzige mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe. Inzige zateye: Aho ziva, ibyo zangiza, uko zirwanywa...ibyo ukeneye kumenya Icyorezo cy'inzige cyageze muri Uganda na Tanzania FAO iragabisha ko hagiye kuba ikindi gitero c'inzige Izo nzige nshasha zafashijwe gushwara akarere n'igihuhusi Gati  catumye mu minsi mike hagwa imvura ingana n'iyoguye mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri. Vyatumye inzige zoroherwa mu kugwirirana. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ibikorwa vyihuta muri FAO muri Somalia, Ezana Kassa, avuga ati: "Ingaruka n'uko uburimyi n'ubworozi bihungabana cane mu gihugu kidasanganywe amaragamo mu vyerekeye ivyo kurya'' Iryo shami rya ONU rivuga ko gupompa imiti mu kirere no hasi , vyakozwe kuva izo nzige ziteye ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2020, vyari vyatumye hakizwa ibitegwa n'ibitungwa biciye amafaranga aharugwa muri miriyaridi 1.2 z'ama dolari. "Aho inzige zaheruka gutera ku rugero rusa n'uru rw'ubu, mu karere ka Sahel, vyasavye imyaka ibiri n'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 500 z'ama dolari kugira zishobore gutuzwa. Iki gitero kirakomeye gusumba, ariko ibihugu vy'a Afrika y'ubuseruko bisa n'ibizogitsinda-gusa ni bitange amafaranga y'igitoro kugira indege zigume zikora'',  bivugwa n'icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru wa FAO Laurent Thomas.

column2: Burundi: Leta ikemura gute ikibazo c'ikena ry'amahera y'agaciro?
column3: Leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata ingingo mu gisata c'ubutunzi n'urudandazwa benshi bavuga ko zigamije kugerageza kubungabunga amahera y'agaciro ari muri ico gihugu. Muri urwo rwego, Banki ya Republika y'u Burundi iherutse gufata itegeko riraba abinjirana amafaranga muri ico gihugu, harimwo n'abanyamahanga. Iryo tegeko ribabwiriza gukoresha amafranga y'amarundi mu kugura ibintu vyose imbere mu gihugu. Baterezwa kandi  kuvunjisha mu bigo vyemewe n'amategeko amafranga y'agaciro baba bafise, bashaka kuyakoresha. Iyo ngingo yakurikiranye n'iyindi igenga ukudandaza ubutare n'ayandi mabuye y'agaciro muri banki y'igihugu. Ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafatanga y'agaciro mu Burundi bivugwa ko coba kiva ahanini ku bihano u Burundi bwafatiwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya, ryahagaritse amahera ryaha ico gihugu kuva mu 2015 igihe hatangura ingorane za politike. Mu gushaka kumenya vyinshi kuri izo ngingo leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata, Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Faustin Ndikumana, umuhinga mu vy'ubutunzi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro ngaha

column2: Umugwi w'abanyepolitike bo mu Bwongereza wasavye irekurwa rya Byabagamba na Rusagara
column3: Umugwi ugizwe n'abashingamateka hamwe n'abakenguzamateka batandatu b'Abongereza wandikiye ikete umukuru w'igihugu c'u Rwanda, Paul Kagame, umusaba kurekura abahoze ari intwazangabo babiri bari mw'ibohero. Frank Rusagara - yigeze kuba ajejwe kwivuna abansi mu biro biserukiye u Rwanda mu Bwongereza - na Tom Byabagambe, haciye imyaka itanu bafashwe. Bagirijwe gukwirakwiza ibihuha hamwe no gucafuza isura y'igihugu c'u Rwanda na leta yaco. Sentare ya gisirikare yabakatiye ibifunga vy'imyaka 20 na 21 uko bakurikirana. Aba banyepolitike bo mu Bwongereza, bagizwe n'abashingamateka hamwe n'abakenguzamateka, bavuga ko ivyo bipfungo bikabije ugereranije n'ivyo baregwa. Bavuze ko batewe impungenge n'amagara y'abapfunzwe, bagasaba Prezida Kagame kubarekura ku bw'ikigongwe. Ibicishije ku bushikiranganji bujejwe ubutungane, leta y'u Rwanda yanditse ikete isubiza uwaserukiye umugwi w'abo bashingamateka b'Ubwongereza. Mw'iryo keye, ubwo bushikirangani bwavuze ko mu gihe ivyo basaba vyokurikizwa hoba habaye kwivanga mu biraba ubutungane. Ngo ivyo navyo leta canke umukuru w'igihugu ntibashobora kubikora kuko kwoba ari guhonyanga amategeko. Iryo kete risoza rivuga ko ku vyerekeye kurekurwa ku bw'ikigongwe, amategeko y'u Rwanda abitegekanya mu gihe uwuregwa abisavye.

column2: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
column3: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

column2: Umukinyi wa tennis Novak Djokovic yamaze kuva mu gihugu inyuma yo gutsindwa mu rubanza rwa visa
column3: Novak Djokovic yavuye muri Australia inyuma y'aho atsindiwe mu rubanza yarimwo arondera kuguma muri ico gihugu. Abacamanza banse urubanza rw'uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa wa tennis yari yuguruje inyuma y'aho reta y'ico gihugu ihagarikiye visa yiwe ku mvo zo gukingira ubuzima no gukingira umutekano kubera atari bwicandagishe. Iyo ngingo yakuye icizere c'uyu mukinyi co kurwanira igikombe ciwe yatsindiye mw'ihiganwa Australian Open. Djokovic avuga ko ababaye cane ariko yubashe ingingo ya sentare yafashwe hari hasigaye umusi umwe gusa ngo akine urukino rwiwe rwa mbere. Abakunzi biwe baguye mu gahunwe aho bari bakoraniye hanze ya sentare igihe iyi ngingo yatangazwa, mu gihe bwaca akina urukino rwa mbere rwiwe. Umugore umwe mu bafana yabwiye BBC y'uko akaruhuko kiwe ko muci kazoba impfagusa kuko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 34 atazoba ari mw'ihuganwa rya Open. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa AustraliaScott Morrison yakirije yompi iyi "ngingo ikingira imbibe zacu igakingira n'abanya Australia". Djokovic yari yuguruje uru rubanza igihe umushikiranganji abinjira n'abasohoka Alex Hawke  akoreshereje ububasha bwiwe nk'umushikiranganji mu gufuta visa y'uyu mukinyi w'umunya Serbia, avuga ko ari nka hamwe yoramuka yemerewe kwinjira mu gihugu vyoha impigi abarwanya incanco za Covid. Bwari ubwa kabiri visa yiwe ihagaritswe, inyuma y'aho ihagarikiwe ubwa mbere kubera ukutubahiriza amabwirizwa yo kurwanya covid, ingingo yahavuye ifutwa n'uwundi mucamanza. Itegeko rimwirukana mu gihugu ririmwo ingingo imubuza gusubira kugaruka muri Australia mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu, n'aho iyi ishobora kuvanwaho mu bihwe bimwe bimwe. Mu rubanza rwa sentare yashashe uno musi ku wa Mungu, ikaba yari igizwe n'abacamanza batatu, ababuranira Djokovic basiguye bavuga ko ingingo ya reta  "itemewe kandi idafise ishingiro", ariko biba ivy'ubusa. Iyi ngingo yo kuri uyu wa Mungu irangije impari zari zimaze imisi cumi ku bijanye na Visa ya Djokovic yo kwinjira muri Australian. Vyari vyateje uburakari mu gihugu kubona uyu mukinyi yariko agerageza kwinjira adacandazwe. Reta ibandanya ivuga ko ata muntu n'umwe ari hejuru y'amabwirizwa yashinzwe mu ntumbero yo kurwanya iki kiza. Mu gihe Djokovic ataricandagisha, yaranduye Covid-19 incuro zibiri zose, ubwa nyuma hakaba hari ku wa 16 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri guheze. Imirwi ibiri y'abaganga - umwe washizweho n'igisata kijejwe tennis muri Australia, Tennis Australia, uwundi nawo washinzwe na reta y'intara ya Victoria - yari yamucishirijemwo iramuha uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri Australia. Ariko abajejwe gucungera imbibe z'iki gihhugu, Australian Border Force, baramuhagaritse ku wa 05 z'uku kwa mbere kubera atari akwije ibisabwa mu bijanye no kurwanya coronavirus. Mu nyuma, umucamanza  yarafuse iyi ngingo, abonye ko abajejwe gucungera imbibe batari bisunze amategeko igihe yashika, ariko reta ikaba yaciye ifata mu minwe ikibazo ku wa gatanu maze ica isubira guhagarika iyi visa. Djokovic azosubirizwa ejo ku wa mbere n'umutaliyano Salvatore Caruso aza mu kibanza ca 150 kw'isi, mu rukino rwiwe n'umunya Serbia Miomir Kecmanovic.

column2: Filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi Muhammad yahagaritswe mu Bwongereza
column3: Ikigo cerekana za filime co mu Bwongereza, Cineworld, cahagaritse kwerekana mu mazu ya filime (cinema) yaco yose muri ico gihugu filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi w'idini rya Islamu, Muhammad, nyuma y'imyiyerekano yadutse hanze y'ama-cinema amwe amwe. Ico kigo ca cinema cavuze yuko cafashe iyo ngingo "ku bw'umutekano w'abakozi n'abakiriya bacu". Abantu barenga 120.000 bashize umukono ku nyandiko isaba ko filime yitwa The Lady of Heaven (Umudamu w'Ijuru) itokwerekanwa muri za cinema zo mu Bwongereza. Ihuriro ry'imisigiti, The Bolton Council of Mosques, ryavuze ko iyo filime ari sakirirego kandi irimwo amacakubiri afatiye kw'idini. Ariko umukenguzamateka Baroness Claire Fox yavuze ko iyo ngingo "ari icago ku bugenegene kandi ikaba ari mbi cane ku bwigenge bwo gushikiriza iciyumviro". Nayo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Sajid Javid, yavuze yuko "atewe umwitwarariko cane n'umuco wo kwiyamiriza uriko uragwirirana" mu Bwongereza. Iyo filime yakuwe mu bigo vya cinema vy'ikigo Cineworld nyuma y'amakuru y'imyiyerekano mu miji wa Bolton, Birmingham na Sheffield. I Bolton, abantu barenga ijana bagize imyiyerekano hanze ya cinema, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru caho, Bolton News. Mu butumwa bwa email bugenewe Cineworld bwashizwe ahabona na Bolton News, umukuru w'urwego Bolton Council of Mosques, Asif Patel, yavuze ko iyo filime "irimwo ingengabitekerezo y'amacakubiri afatiye ku dini" kandi yuko "ivuga ukutari ko kahise k'idini ikanasuzuguza icubahiro Islamu ihabwa n'amateka yayo". Igitangazamakuru cegamiye idini rya Islamu co kuri internet, 5Pillars, catangaje kuri Twitter amafoto y'abo cavuze ko ari aba-Islamu 200, bari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo filime imbere y'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Birmingham ku munsi wa Mungu. Video yahanahanywe kuri internet isa n'iyerekana umuyobozi w'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Sheffield ariko arabwira abari mu myiyerekano ko iyo filime yahagaritswe kwerekanwa, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Guardian. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Umuhinguzi mukuru (executive producer) ari mu bateguye iyi filime, Malik Shlibak, yabariye BBC ko abari mu myiyerekano bigenza "nk'amabandi arenganya abandi, bakisuka muri za cinema banatera ubwoba abahakora". "Ibi ni ibintu bitari bikwiye kwihanganirwa mu Bwongereza", nk'uko yabandanije avuga, aca agabisha yuko guhagarika kwerekana iyi filime bizoha ingoga abakoresha ukwiyamiriza nk'uko muri kazoza. Yabandanije agira ati "ibi birarengeye filime. Uno munsi hifatiwe mu gahanga filime Lady of Heaven, ejo harashobora kwiyamirizwa ikindi kigushika ku mutima kurusha". Yavuze kandi yuko abakora imyiyerekano batazoshobora kubuza kubaho kw'iyi filime.

column2: Britney Spears yagiriza nyina "gutabagaza ubuzima bwiwe"mu kubushira mu minwe y'uwundi muntu
column3: Britney Spears avuga ko nyina ariwe yatumye ubuzima bw'uwo muririmvyi buja mu minwe y'uwundi muntu mu kiringo c'imyaka 13. Jamie, se w'ico camamare, niwe yamaze iyo myaka yose ariwe ajejwe mu mategeko ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, bisigura ko ico gihe cose yari afise ijambo rito  cane ku biraba ubuzima bwiwe bwite n'amafaranga yiwe. Ariko ku vyo yanditse ku mbuga hwaniro, uwo muririmvyi avuga ko ico ciyumviro cazanywe na nyina wiwe, Lynne. Ati: "Ico abantu batazi `n'uko mama ariwe yamuhaye ico ciyumviro. Iyo myaka sinzokwigera nsubira kuyironka ... yaratabagaje ubuzima bwanje mu mpisho." Muri ivyo yari yanditse kuri Instagram ariko ubu vyafuswe, abandanya ati: "Urazi neza ivyo wakoze. Data nta bwenge afise bwo gupfa yariyumviriye ibintu nk'ivyo vyo gushira ubuzima bwanje mu minwe y'uwundi muntu, ariko muri iri joro, ndaja kumwenyura kuko nzi ko nimirije ubuzima bushasha." Ivyo Spears yanditse bisa n'uko vyoba vyatewe n'uko se yasavye ko hahagarara "ubwo nyene" kandi "ata gisabwe" ivy'uko ariwe abazwa ivy'ubuzima bwiwe. Uko vyari bitunganijwe  kwari nk'uguhabwa uwukujejwe mu mategeko ku bisanzwe bikorerwa abantu badashoboye kwifatira ingingo, nk'ababa bafise indwara zo mu mutwe. Mu nyandiko zo muri sentare BBC yaronse, abashingwamanza biwe bavuze bati:  "Jamie arakunda  kandi arashigikira umukobwa wiwe ata gisabwe. Nta kindi." "Icabaye n'uko mu myaka 13 iheze, ugushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe y'uwundi muntu vyari bikenewe kugira Britney akingirwe  mu nsiguro zose iryo jambo rishobora kugira. Ubuzima bwiwe bwari  mu rudubi kandi yari yugarijwe n'ibibazo bikomeye ku mubiri, mu mutwe, mu kibabarwe no mu mafaranga". "Hamaze kujaho uwubazwa ubuzima bwiwe, Britney yarashoboye kugaruka mu nzira yo kugira amaragamo muri ivyo bisata vyose vy'ubuzima. Ico gikorwa cagenze neza cane, ubu rero hakaba hageze ko Britney asubira gufata ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe." Abunganizi ba Spears bavuga ko ivyo yabisavye atawe abanje kubimenyesha kandi ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ivyo yahora akora vyo  kubazwa ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, avuga ko ata "na kimwe" afise "co kunyegeza". Mu vyo yanditse kuri Instagram ku wa kabiri, Britney yanadomye urutoke ku wahora atunganya imirimo yiwe Lou Taylor avuga ko yagize uruhara mu vyo gushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe  y'uwundi muntu. Yaba we yaba na Lynne Spears nta n'umwe aragira ico abivuzeko. Ubuzima bwa Britney Spears  bwabazwa se wiwe kuva mu 2008 igihe ibibazo vy'amagara yiwe yo mu mutwe vyatuma se asaba sentare ububasha bw'amategeko bwo kugenzura ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe. Inyuma y'imyaka y'agacerre , uwo muririmyi amaherezo  yahavuye ashira ku mugaragaro ico avyibazako mu majambo akomeye cane yavuze mu minota 23 imbere ya sentare y'i Los Angeles mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 39 yavuze ko  ubwo buzima bwo kugenzurwa bwabaye "ihohotera" kuko ngo yahawe ibiyayuramutwe, akanahatirwa  kuririmba atabishaka kandi akankirwa kuvyara abana. Yabwiye umucamanza Brenda Penny kuri terefone ati : "Ubu nshaka gusubizwa ubuzima bwanje". Se wiwe mu kwezi kw'icenda niho yashikiriza inyandiko zisaba ko ivy'uko abazwa  ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe bihagarara, ariko ntiyavuze umwanya  vyofata kugira ivyo bikorwe intambwe ku yundi. Uko kwezi,  umucamanza Penny yaciye aba aramuhagaritse vy'igihe  mu kuba ariwe abazwa ubutunzi bwa Britney (nta bintu vyiwe yabazwa kuva mu 2019). Intahe ikurikira muri urwo rubanza itegekanijwe kuba ku wa 12 uku kwezi kwa 11. Ariko n'aho uwo muririmvyi w'icamamare yokurwako ivy'uko ubuzima bwiwe bubazwa uwundi muntu, ibibazo vyiwe n'ubucamanza bishobora kutazoba birangiye. Umushingwamanza wiwe  Mathew Rosengart yagirije se wiwe  ko yitwaye nabi ku bijanye n'amafaranga kandi ko "yononye miriyoni z'ama dorari z'ubutunzi bw'umukobwa wiwe." Mu kwezi kw'icenda yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko afise "ibibazo bikomeye" ku "bishobora kuba vyarabaye ukwitwara nabi , hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'inyungu zidashbora kubangabanganwa, gukoresha nabi ububasha bwo kubazwa ubuzima bw'uwundi hamwe no kwonona bigaragara ubutunzi bwa Britney Spears" aca arahira ko " azokwihweza gushika mu mizi" inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kibazo. Mu nyandiko yashikirije sentare muri iyi ndwi,  Rosengart yagirije kandi se wa Britney kugerageza kwirengagiza kwishura ibibazo ku bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yacungwa gushika no mu nzu iwe imbere mu buryo bwo kumufata amajwi canke kumwumviriza. Uwo mushingwamanza asaba ivyoba vyarafashwe vyose n'ibikoresho vyakoreshejwe. Jamie Spears  arahakana ivyo yagirizwa vyose, akavuga ko yamye akora mu nyungu z'umukobwa wiwe. Ivyo we nyene yashikirije sentare  vyerekana ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kobazo.

column2: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yitavye Imana
column3: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yaritavye Imana mw’ijoro ryo ku wa kane rishira ejo ku wa gatanu. Indirimbo yiwe yaramenyekanye cane mu myaka ya 1980, akaba yararirimbanye n’abaririmvyi batandukanye bo mu murwi rurangiranwa witwa AMABANO. Hagati aho, nk’uko bivugwa n’umwe mu baririmvyi amuzi, Sylvana Ntiyibagira ntiyigeze aja muri iyo mirwi y’abaririmvyi yari ikomeye nka za AMABANO, NAKARANGA, n’iyindi. Yari mu baririmvyi bakunda kuririmba ari bo nyene (solo). Sylvana yavukiye mu Kabezi mu ntara ya Bujumbura mu mwaka wa 1965, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu murwi w’abaririmvyi ba paroisse kubera yavuka mu muryango w’abakirisu, mu gasengero ka Irtyazo Sylvana ahanura abaririmvyi ba kino gihe kwitonda bagategura neza indirimbo zabo kugira ngo koko bashobore gutanga inyigisho kubera, nk’uko yabivugiye mu kiganiro yari yahaye Radio Isanganiro ikorera mu Burundi, indirimbo za kino gihe usanga ata kanovera zigifise. Sylvana asize aban batatu. Umviriza indirimbo yiwe  WIBUKE USHIME

column2: US - Covid: CNN yirukanye abakozi bagiye mu biro batacandazwe
column3: Ikinyamakuru co muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika CNN cirukanye abakozi batatu kubera bagiye mu biro batacandazwe ngo bakingirwe ca kiza karanda ca Covid, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vya Amerika. Ni  kamwe mu turorero twa mbere tw'amakompanyi ya Amerika yirukana abakozi kubera barenze ku mategeko yayo ategeka abakozi kwicandagisha. Ubu amategeko muri Amerika aha uburenganzira amakompanyi gutegeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha. Amakompanyi menshi akomeye - harimwo Facebook na Google - avuga ko agiye gutegeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha mu gihe ibiro vyayo bizoba vyuguruwe burundu mu mezi ari imbere. Umukuru wa CNN Jeff Zucker yameshejeje iri bogoza mu butumwa bwarungikiwe abakozi (memo) ku wa kane, ibinyamakuru bitari bike bikaba vyarabuhawe. Asubirwamwo ivyo yanditse muri uru rwandiko aho avuga ko urucanco ari ngombwa ku muntu uwo ari we wese aja kurondera amakuru, akorana n'abandi bakozi canke agiye mu biro. Mu majambo yiwe, Zucker yavuze ati: "Reka mvuge neza - dufise poritike yo kutihanganirana kuri iki kibazo". Mu kwa gatanu, reta ya Amerika yatangaje ko abakoresha bafise uburenganzira bahabwa n'amategeko bwo gutegeka abakozi baja ku kazi kubanza kwicandagisha Covid-19. Amakompanyi makuru makuru yunguruza abantu n'indege, Delta hamwe na United Airlines, asaba abakozi bashasha kwerekana icemeza ko bakingiwe, mu gihe ibanki ya Goldman Sachs isaba kumenyesha ibijanye n'icandagwa, n'aho idategeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Associated Press. Perezida Joe Biden yategetse ko abakozi ba reta imiriyoni zibiri bategerezwa kwerekana icemeza ko bacandazwe canke naho atari uko bagategerezwa gupimwa no kwambara udupfukamunwa, banka bemera.

column2: Wagner: Ivyakozwe n'abacangero ba Russia muri Libya vyashizwe ahabona
column3: Amatohoza mashasha ya BBC yashize ahabona urugero rw'ibikorwa vya gisirikare vyakozwe n'umurwi w'abacangero b'Abarusiya ukorera mu kinyegero mu ntambara yo muri Libya, bifitaniye isano n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara n'igisirikare c'Uburusiya. Terefone ngendanwa ya Samsung yatawe n'umurwanyi w'umurwi Wagner irerekana uruhara wagize - hamwe n'amazina yo kwiyoberanya abarwanyi bakoresha. Hanyuma kandi BBC ifise "urutonde" rw'ibikoresho vya gisirikare bigezweho abahinga bavuga ko ahantu honyene vyashobora kuva ari mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya. Uburusiya burahakana ko ataho buhuriye na Wagner. Uwu murwi watanguye kumenyekana mu 2014 igihe wari ushigikiye uruhande rwagomba kwiyonkora, rwari rushigikiwe n'Uburusiya mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Ico gihe, wagiye wibonekeza mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi harimwo Syria, Mozambique, Sudan, no muri Centrafrique. Abarwanyi ba Wagner bagiye kuboneka muri Libya mu kwa kane mu 2019 igihe bahambije ingabo z'umu mujenerali yarwanya ubutegetsi, Khalifa Haftar, igihe agabiye igitero kuri reta y'ico gihugu yari ishigikiwe na ONU ku mugwa mukuru, Tripoli. Iyi ntambara yagiye kurangira habaye amasezerano yo kuyihagarika mu kw'icumi mu 2020. Uwu murwi ukorera mw'ibanga rikomeye, ariko BBC yashoboye kuvugana mu buryo budasanzwe na babiri mu bahoze ari abarwanyi bawo. Barahishuye ibirabwa ko muntu ashobora kwinjira muri Wagner - n'ingene ari umurwi utagira amategeko ngenderwako. Nta gukekeranya ko bica impfungwa  - ikintu umwe mu bahoze ari abarwanyi bawo yemeza atarya umunwa. "Nta n'umwe akeneye kugaburira uwundi munwa". Iki kiza gishigikira ibiri mw'ireresi (documentaire)  yiswe Haftar's Russian Mercenaries: Inside the Wagner Group - yateguwe n'ibisata vya BBC  bitangaza amakuru mu carabu no mu kirusiya. Mu bindi vyerekanwa muri yo harimwo ibivugwa ko ari ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, harimwo n'ubwicanyi bwakorewe abasivire n'ibigirankana. Umunyagihugu wo mu kigwati kimwe avuga ko yigize uwapfuye igihe abo mu muryango wiwe bariko  baragandagurwa. Ivyo yavuze vyarafashije BBC kumenya uwikekwa ko ari we yabishe. Asigura ikindi cerekana ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, umusirikare wa reta ya Libya aribuka ingene umugenzi bakorana yishikanye  ku barwanyi ba Wagner ariko akaba yaciye araswa amasasu abiri mu nda. Kuva ico gihe ntiyigeze asubira kumubona, co kimwe n'abandi bagenzi batatu bafashwe ico gihe nyene. Iyo terefone ya Samsung irerekana kandi uruhara rw'abo bacangero mu gucukura ubutare no mu gutega imitego mu turere tubamwo abasivire. Gutega ama mines udashizeho ikimenyetso ni icaha co mu ntambara. Iyi terefone ngendanwa yatawe n'umurwanyi wa Wagner atazwi igihe abarwanyi w'uwu murwi basubira inyuma bavuye mu turere two mu bumanuko bwa Tripoli  ku mpeshi yo mu 2020. Muri yo harimwo amakarata yanditse mu kirusiya aberekana bari ku rugamba, ivyerekana uruhara rudasanzwe rw'uwu murwi Wagner n'ibikorwa vyawo vya gisirikare. Harimwo amashusho ya drone hamwe n'amazina abarwanyi ba Wagner bakoresha, harimwo n'uwo BBC ivuga ko yamenyemwo. Iyi terefone ngendanwa ibitswe ahadata. Urutonde rw'ibirwanisho n'ibindi bikoresho vya gisirikare ruri ku mpapuro 10  ziri mu rwandiko rwo ku wa 19 z'ukwa mbere 2020, rukaba rwahawe BBC n'umukozi wo mw'igendereza rya Libya, rushobora kuba rwatowe ahahoze hari abarwanyi ba Wagner. Uru rwandiko rwerekana abashobora kuba ari bo batanga uburyo bw'amafaranga mu gushigikira urugamba. Rwerekana ibikoresho bikenewe kugira ngo bashike ku "ntumbero ya gisirikare" - harimwo vya bimodoka vya burende (blinde) bine, inkoho za kalashnikov ziharurwa mu majana hamwe n'ivyuma vya radar bigezweho. Umuhinga mu vya gisirikare yabwiye BBC ko ubuhinga bumwe bumwe bwo guhingura ivyo birwanisho bushobora kuba burangwa mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya honyene. Uwundi muhinga, uyu akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umurwi wa Wagner, avuga ko uru rutonde rushobora kuba rwerekana uruhara rwa Dmitry Utkin. Uyu yahoze akora mu gisata c'igendereza ry'igisirikare c'Uburusiya avugwa ko ari we yashinze uwu murwi Wagner ari na we yawuhaye iryo zina (izina ryahoze ari iritazirano ryiwe). BBC yaragerageje kurondera Dmitry Utkin ariko vyaranse. Hanyuma mu mwihwezo wakozwe kuri uru rutonde hamwe no mu rundi rwandiko, uyu muhinga avuga ko amajambo  Evro Polis na General Director yerekana uruhara rwa Yevgeny Prigozhin, umurwizatunga afitaniye ubugenzi bwa hafi cane na Perezida Vladimir Putin. Igisata kijejwe ikigega ca Amerika (US Treasury) carafatiye ibihano Evro Polis mu 2018, kivuga ko ari ikompanyi y'Uburusiya yakodeshejwe kugira ngo "ikingire" ibibanza vyo muri  Syria bicukurwamwo igitoro "bigenzurwa canke vyegukira" Prigozhin. Amatohoza yakozwe n'abanyamakuru bo mu burengero bw'isi yerekana ko hari isano hagati ya Prigozhin na Wagner. Abandanya ahakana ko ata sano na rimwe afitaniye na Evro Polis canke Wagner. Umuvugizi yabwiye BBC ko Yevgeny Prigozhin ata migenderanire n'imwe afitaniye na Evro Polis canke Wagner. Prigozhin avuga ko ata kintu na kimwe arigera yumva ku vyerekeye ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Libya ryakozwe n'Abarusiya: "Ndazi neza ko iki ari ikinyoma ceruye". Ubushikiranganji bw'Uburusiya bujejwe imigenderanire bwabwiye BBC ko buriko burakora "ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo bushigikire agahengwe n'utwigoro two gutorera umuti ikibazo ca Libya biciye mu nzira ya poritike". Ubu bushikiranganji bwongerako y'uko ibivugwa kuri Wagner muri Libya bishingiye "ku makuru y'ibinyoma" kandi ko bifise intumbero yo "gucafuza poritike y'Uburusiya" muri Libya. Uwu murwi ntubaho ku mugaragaro, ariko abantu bagera ku 10,000 bemeza ko bagiranye amasezerano n'imiburiburi incuro imwe na Wagner kuva itangura kurwana n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine mu 2014. Abarwanyi b'aba Wagner bababa 1000 nibo bavugwa ko barwanye ku ruhande rwa Jenerali Khalifa Haftar muri Libya kuva 2019 gushika 2020. BBC mu Burusiya yarasavye umwe mu bahoze ari abarwanyi gusigura ico ari co Wagner. Yishuye ati: "Ni umurwi ufise intumbero yo gutsimbataza no gushigikira inyungu za reta hanze y'imbibe z'igihugu cacu". Nayo ku bijanye n'abarwanyi bayo, avuga ko hamwe usanga ari "abantu bamenyereye ivyo kurwana", abantu barondera akazi canke abakunda igihugu bashaka kugikorera. Uwundi yahoze ari umurwanyi yabwiye BBC ko ata mategeko ngenderwako atomoye uwu murwi ufise. Iyo uwufashwe ata makuru afise atanga, canke adashoboye gukora nk'"umucakara", aha rero "igikurikira kirazwi". Andrey Chuprygin, umuhinga akorana n'inama mpuzamakungu mpanuzwajambo y'Uburusiya (Conseil international de Russie/Russia International Council), avuga ko Uburusiya bwavuga buti: "Reka binjire muri iki kintu, hanyuma turabe ingene bigenda. Tubonye harimwo akarusho, turashobora kugikoresha ku nyungu zacu. Tubonye ivyaco bibaye nabi, twebwe ntaco tuzokibazwako". Itembagazwa rya Gaddafi mu 2011: Ubutegetsi bwa Col Muammar Gaddafi bwari bumaze imyaka irenga mirongo ine bwagiye kurangira muri ca gihuhusi c'imigumuko y'abarabu. Yaragerageje guhunga ariko yarafashwe aricwa. Igihugu carasambutse: inyuma ya  2014, hadutse imirwi yari ihanganye mu buseruko no mu burengero Intambara zashitse i Tripoli mu kwa kane mu  2019: Jenerali Haftar arongoye ingabo zarwanira mu buseruko, yarateye umugwa mukuru Tripoli na reta yari ishigikiwe na ONU. Impande zompi zari zifise ibihugu vy'akarere bizishigikiye mu vya gisirikare n'imigenderanire, n'aho igihugu cari mu bihano cafatiwe na ONU Agahengwe mu kw'icumi mu 2020: Hanyuma mu ntango za 2021 hashinzwe reta y'ubumwe kugira ngo itegure amatora mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Abarwanyi mvakamkungu n'abacangero bategerezwa kuba bagiye, ariko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakiri mu gihugu.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Ndombele, Bergwijn, Fernandes, Digne, Schick, Mateta
column3: Umukinyi wa mbere wa Tottenham amaze kugurwa amafaranga menshi gusumba abandi bose muri uyo murwi, umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele, 25, yaguzwe imiriyoni zirenga 73 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, arizeye ko ashobora gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwa mbere. (Fabrizio Romano on Twitter) Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 23, ashobora gutera akagere Real Madrid hanyuma agatera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri uno murwi w'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa.
