column2: Ethiopia: Inyeshamba za Tigray ziti 'emera ubutegetsi bwacu canke tubandanya intambara'
column3: Inyeshamba z'intara ya Tigray muri Ethiopia zivuga ko ubutegetsi bwazo butegerezwa kubanza kwemerwa imbere y'uko zemera guhagarika intambara. Mu bindi vyinshi zisaba, zivuga kandi ko ingabo za Eritrea zitegerezwa kubanza kuva mu gihugu. Ubutegetsi bwa Addis Abeba buherutse gutangaza ko buhagaritse intambara ku ruhande rwabwo, inyuma y'aho izi nyeshamba zifatiye igice kinini c'iyi ntara, ingabo z'igihugu nazo zikayanyaga. Iyi ntambara imaze amezi umunani hagati y'izi nyeshamba n'ingabo za reta imaze guhitana ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu. Ishirahamwe ONU rimenyesha ko abarenga imiriyoni zibiri bataye izabo, nayo abantu 400.000 bakaba bahanzwe na kigoyi gishobora gutera abarenga imiriyoni 1.8. Inyeshamba z'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zabanje kuvuga ko ivyo guhagarika intambara vyatangajwe na reta ya Ethiopia ari "ukujajura" zica ziyemeza kwirukana "abansi" bazo muri iyo ntara. Muri bo harimwo ingabo za Eritrea hamwe n'ingabo za Ethiopia ziva mu ntara ya Amhara iri mu bumanuko bwa Tigray. Ariko basohoye urutonde rw'ibindi vyinshi bisabwa kugira ngo bemere guhagarika intambara, harimwo gukora amatohoza ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara bivugwa, gutanga imfashanyo z'ubutabazi hamwe no gusanura ibintu shingiro vyo mu buzima bwa misi yose, harimwo umuyagankuba. Ejo ku wa Mungu, "reta ya Tigray" yasohoye itangazo rivuga riti: "Mu gihe tuzoba twijejwe neza ko umutekano w'abanyagihugu utazohungabanywa n'igitero ca kabiri, twemeye guhagarika intambara". Umunyamakuru wa BBC World Service Africa Will Ross avuga ko mu gihe reta ya Addis Ababa yoramuka yemeye ibi bisabwa n'inyeshamba ko ubutegetsi bwazo bubanza kwemerwa, yoba yerekanye neza ko yatsinzwe intambara kandi ko yananiwe no kwikurako umwansi wayo. Avuga ko amakungu abandanya atera akamo ko intambara zihagarara kugira ngo imiriyoni z'abantu basinzikajwe n'intambara bashobore kuronswa imfashanyo, ariko ko bisabwa ko impande zompi zibanza kwumvikana neza kugira ngo amahoro agaruke. Iyi ntambara yatanguye ku wa 04 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe umwaka uheze, igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed agomorera ingabo za reta ku ngabo z'intara ya Tigray. Ico gihe yatangaje ko yafashe iyo ngingo inyuma y'igitero cakozwe ku kirindiro c'igisirikare ca reta muri iyo ntara. Ibintu vyagiye kuyangara haciye amezi atari make hari icuka kibi hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF. Inyuma y'intsinzi zitari nke cagiye kigira harimwo ugufata umugwa mukuru wa Tigray Mekelle, ibintu vyagiye biba nabi ku gisirikare ca Ethiopia gifashwe mu mugongo n'ingabo za Eritrea n'iz'intara ya Amhara mu ntambara n'inyeshamba za TPLF . Mu ndwi iheze, ingabo za Tigray zasubiye kwigarurira umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Impande zompi muri iyo ntambara ziragirizwa ko zagandaguye abantu zinahonyanga uburenganzira bwa kiremwa muntu. Ku wa gatanu, ingabo ziharurwa mu bihumbi za Ethiopia zafashwe mpiri zarazungurukanywe mu mabarabara ya Mekelle. Gushika ubu, reta ya Abiy i Addis Abeba yaranse kuganira n'abategetsi ba TPLF, mbere akaba yavuze ko uwu ari umuhari w'iterabwoba.

column2: Umugwizatunga Rujugiro ashima icemezo ca sentare kuri UTC ngo ariko ntibikwiye
column3: Umugwizatunga w'Umunyarwanda Tribert Rujugiro avuga ko ashima icemezo ca sentare y'akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko ku vyerekeye inyubako yagurishijwe na leta y'u Rwanda. Ariko uwo mugwizatunga atakiba mu Rwanda kubera kutumvikana na leta y'ico gihugu, avuga ko kumuha amafaranga atari vyo yashaka kuko adashaka kugurisha. Iyo nyubako ivugwa ni inyubako izwi nka Union Trade Centre (UTC) iri mu muji wa Kigali iberamwo ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji, izi zizwi mu Congereza nka Shopping Mall. Sentare y'Ubutungane ya Afrika y'Ubuseruko yafashe icemezo c'uko Bwana Rujugiro ahabwa amafaranga iyo nyubako yagurishijwe akanahabwa ayo yari imaze kwinjiza igihe yari imaze ikora kuva yagurishwa. Ariko we avuga ko naho ashima ingingo ya sentare, ivyo adashobora kuvyemera kuko agaciro k'iyo nyubako ari kanini cane ugereranije n'ayo yoba ahawe. Yagize ati: "Umwanzuro narawushimye kuko weretse amakungu ko rirya tegeko bakoresheje na birya vyo kugurisha bitajanye n'amategeko. "... ngirango umuntu wese azi guharura, inzu yinjiza $1,500,000 ku mwaka, yobona agaciro kayo. Kandi amafaranga bayigurishije ni $6,800,000". Mu 2017 ikigo kijejwe amakoli mu Rwanda cafashe ingingo yo kugurisha inyubako UTC ya Bwana Rujugiro kimwagiraza ko agiheraniye amakoli. Ikigo Kigali Investment Company ni co cegukanye iyo nyubakwa cemeye gutanga amahera arusha ay'abandi (6,877,150,000). Ku vyerekeye kumwagiriza kutariha iryo koli, Bwana Rujugiro avuga ko sentare yabisiguye neza. Yagize ati: "Bwa mbere iyo nzu bari bayifise (urwego rushinzwe amakoli) kuva mu 2013. Iryo deni ry'ikoli bavuga ko mfise barizanye mu 2017, bamaranye inzu imyaka ine. "Noneho waraba amafaranga bafashe yagera ku miriyoni $5 zirenga. Kandi itegeko bagendeyeko ryavuga ko amafaranga yose avuye mu nzu bafashe, 50% bizoja bija muri Banki Nkuru akazohabwa nyene umutungo igihe yoboneka. "Urumva yuko nibaba bari bafise $2.800.000, ideni rikaba ryari $1.100.000, kuki batafashe muri ayo ngo barihe?" Abajijwe niba azokwunguruza ku ngingo ya sentare mu gihe we avuga ko adashaka kugurisha inzu yiwe, yavuze ko yabihaye abashingwamanza biwe nihafatwa ingingo akazoyitangaza. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'uruhande rwa leta y'u Rwanda ariko batubwira ko ata co bashobora kuvuga kuri ico kibazo.

column2: Umunyamabanga w'ubudandaji wa Amerika Wilbur Ross avuga ko coronavirus izotuma ubuzi bwiyongera
column3: Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Wilbur Ross, avuga ko ikiza ca coronavirus mu Bushinwa gishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bwiyongera. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na televiziyo imwe, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Ndibaza ko kizofasha mu kugarukana ubuzi bwinshi muri Amerika ya Ruguru". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump. Ikwirakwira ry'ico kiza ryatumye haba ubwoba ko ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bushobora kugira ibibazo. Yishura ku kibazo yari abajijwe na televiziyo Fox Business nimba ico kiza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwa Amerika, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Si nipfuza kuvuga ko ari intsinzi ntoya mfatiye ku ndwara nk'iyo ije guteza ibibazo, indwara mbi cane". "Ariko ikiriho ni uko ivyo bituma amakompanyi aronka ikindi kintu afatirako mu bikorwa vyayo n'aho akorera... Rero ndibaza ko ivyo bizotuma ubuzi bugaruka muri Amerika ya uguru". Mu nyuma niho ubunyamabanga bw'ubudandaji bwasubiramwo amajambo yiwe buti : "Nk'uko umunyamabanga Ross yabisiguye, igikorwa ca mbere ni ukurwanya uwo mugera no gufasha abawanduye". Umuvugizi wabwo ati: "Ariko kandi ni ngombwa kwihweza neza ibijanye no gukorana n'igihugu kimenyereye kunyegeza ibibazo bihanze abanyagihugu baco n'isi yose". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'umushingamateka w'umu Démocrate Don Beyer abona ko ari ugukina ku muvyimba abantu mu gushaka kwungukira ku kiza ruhonyanganda nk'ico. Eka n'abahinga muvyo ubutunzi baneguye ayo majambo ya Bwana Ross. Simon Baptist umuhinga muvyo ubutunzi wo mu gihugu ca Singapour yabwiye BBC ko yakubiswe n'inkuba yumvise amajambo ya Ross. Avuga ko uwo mugera ushobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika aho kuzana akarusho. Ati: "Ikiriho ni uko Amerika izohahombera cane kuko n'aho bimeze uko bimaze, Amerika irashorera cane mu Bushinwa. Rero iyo ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bugize ibibazo bikomeye, bigira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika". Ishami ry'ishirahamwe ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi OMS ryatangaje ko isi iri mu bihe bidasanzwe kubera uwo mugera  ubandanya ukwiragira hanze y'Ubushinwa. Umaze guhitana abantu bashika 213 mu Bushinwa, mu gihe umaze gushika mu bindi bihugu 18. Abahinga muvyo ubutunzi bavuga ko Coronavirus ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bw'isi gusumba ikiza ca SARS co mu mwaka 2002-2003. Ico kiza candukiye abantu barenga 8000, abarenga 700 nabo bahasiga ubuzima, bikaba vyasavye imiliyaridi zirenga 30 z'amadolari kugira kirwanywe. Muri kino gihe, uwu mugera coronavirus watumye amakompanyi mpuzamakungu akomeye harimwo ay'ubuhinga bwa none, ayakora n'ayagurisha imiduga ahagarika vy'agateganyo ibikorwa vyayo mu Bushinwa.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Foden, Kante, Eriksen, Martinez, Dybala, Raphinha, de Ligt
column3: Amakuru avugwa cane ni uko Chelsea yumyikanye na Manchester City ku giciro c’umwongereza Raheem Sterling akina ku ruhande. Ni mu masezerano y’imiriyoni 50 z’amapawundi, akaba yiteze gushika i Stamford Bridge gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c’imyaka itanu, akaba kandi afise amahirwe yo kwongerako umwaka umwe. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 27 azotegerezwa kubanza gukorerwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga imbere y’uko aya maezerano atangazwe. Umusatirizi w’umwongereza Phil Foden w’imyaka 22 ariteguye gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’imyaka itandatu muri Manchester City ku mushahara w’amapawundi  200.000 ku ndwi. (Star) Arsenal ishobora, mu buryo butangaje, kwegera Chelsea iyisaba umukinyi wo hagati w’umufaransa N'Golo Kante w’imyaka 31. (Star) Manchester United izi neza ko umunya-Danemark akina hagati Christian Eriksen  w’imyaka 30 azokwimukira i Old Trafford n’aho hari amakuru ava muri Brentford ko ashobora kubandanya ayikinira. (ESPN) Ajax yabwiye Manchester United ko yokwongereza amahera ishaka gutanga irondera umunya-Argentina akina inyuma Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24, ikaba yari yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 43 z’ama-euros. (90 Min) Erik ten Hag kandi arashaka kwongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya-Argentina Antony w’imyaka  22 asanzwe akinira Ajax nyene. (Times) United yasabwe kuzana Paulo Dybala nk’uwushobora gusubirira umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 yipfuza gusezera muri rino ci. Uyu musatirizi w’umunya-Argentina w’imyaka 28 arigenga inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Juventus mu mwaka w’inkino waraye urangiye. (Star) Aba ba Red Devils (Amashetani atukura) bariko barasunikwa n’abatanga uburyo ko bogumya Ronaldo, umukinyi yatsindiye ka gashimwe ka Ballon d'Or incuro zitanu. (Mirror) Barcelona yashikanye imiriyoni 60 z’amapawundi, harimwo n’uturusho, zitangwa na Chelsea ku musatirizi wa Leeds United umunya-Brezili Raphinha w’imyaka 25. (Goal) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 yamaze gutegura umutima wiwe ko azoguma muri Barcelona akaba yiteguye kwankira Manchester United. (Sport – mu ki Espangol) Juventus irazi ko hari ibiganiro hagati y’abaserukizi ba Matthijs de Ligt na Bayern Munich ariko uno murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A ntawurigera awushikira awusaba uyu mukinyi w’inyuma wa Hollande afise imyaka 22, avugwa kandi ko aronderwa na Chelsea. (Fabrizio Romano) Chelsea yabwiwe ko Bayern ishobora gushira kw’isoko umukinyi w’inyuma w’Ubufaransa Dayot Upamecano w’imyaka  23, mu gihe uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi Bundesliga woronka De Ligt. (90 Min) Arsenal iriko irategura amahera yotanguza mu gusaba ko Benfica yoyiha umukinyi wayo w’inyuma, umunya-Espagne Alex Grimaldo w’imyaka 26. (Jornal de Noticias, iciye kuri Express) Everton ntabwo iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Watford umunya-Nigeria Emmanuel Dennis n’aho hari amakuru avuga ko yoba yipfuza uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umunyegori wa Albania Thomas Strakosha w’imyaka 27 yigenga inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Lazio. (Talksport) Brighton iri mu biganiro ku masezerano yosa n’ayisumbuye gatoya n’umukinyi wa Espagne akina inyuma  Marc Cucurella w’imyaka 23, mu gihe ariko arabwa ryiza na Manchester City. (Athletic) Everton yongereje icizere co kuronka umusatirizi wa Chelsea  Armando Broja inyuma y’aho uyu murwi wa Stamford Bridge ufatiye ingingo yo kudatwara uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 20 mu bandi bafashe urugendo baja muri Amerika mu ntumbero yo kwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije. (Liverpool Echo) Aston Villa iri mu biganiro na Sevilla ku mukinyi w’inyuma wa Suède, Ludwig Augustinsson w’imyaka 28. (Mail) Umukuru wa Napoli  Cristiano Giuntoli avuga ko umusatirizi w’Ububirigi Dries Mertens w’imyaka 35 yanse amasezerano mashasha n’uyu murwi. (Fabrizio Romano) Borussia Dortmund nta mugambi ifise wo gutiza umusatirizi wayo, umunyamerika Gio Reyna w’imyaka 19 ariko ararabwa ryiza na Rangers. (Fabrizio Romano) Brentford yegereye Wolfsburg iyisaba umunyamisiri akina imbere Omar Marmoush w’imyaka 23, ariko uyu murwi w’Ubudagi uracijijanya imitima ku vyerekeye ivyo kugurisha uyu mukinyi. (Sky Sports – mu kidagi)

column2: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
column3: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! Inkuru yo kuri  BBC Bitesize

column2: Umushikiranganji w’ikigega wa Afrika y’Epfo asaba ko urucuruza rw’urumogi rwemerwa n’amategeko
column3: Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca leta ya Afrika y'Epfo,  Tito Mboweni, asaba leta y'ico gihugu ko urucuruza rw'urumogi rwemerwa n'amategeko kugira ngo amakori yiyongere. Yatangaje ivyo aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, aho yamenyesheje ko ico kibazo azogishikiriza mu nama y'abashikiranganji. Kuri urwo rubuga rwiwe, yashizeko n'isanamu yerekana ingene ico giterwa gitera gikura. Amategeko ya Afrika y'Epfo yari asanzwe avuga ko ukugurisha urumogi, uko rwoba rungana kwose biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Hagati aho, mu mwaka wa 2017, ico gihugu caremereye abantu gukoresha urumogi mu mihana iwabo, ariko nticarekuye kururima canke kurugurisha. Mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika, harimwo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, kurima, gukoresha canke kudandaza urumogi ntivyemewe n'amategeko kubera rufatwa nk'ikiyayuramutwe. Hagati aho, hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe birukoresha ku rugero runini. Muri ivyo harimwo igihugu ca Lesotho gisanzwe gikikujwe na Afrika y'Epfo, aho urumogi rurimwa ku rugero runini cane, rukaba rwemewe mu vyo ubuvuzi gusa. Mu myaka ya 2000, amakuru yavuga ko ibice 70% vy'urumogi rwagurishwa muri Afrika y'Epfo rwava muri ico gihugu ca Lesotho. Abarimyi bo mu gihugu ca Lesotho basanzwe barima urumogi mu ntumbero yo kurukoresha mu mihana iwabo, hamwe no kurugurisha hanze kubera ubukene basanzwe babamwo. Usanga abanyagihugu bato bato barima urumogi bakarurimana n'ibindi biterwa nk'ibigori kugira ngo barushore muri Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Zimbabwe naco nyene giherutse kwemera ko urumogi rushobora kurimwa rukimburwa muri ico gihugu, ni inyuma y'aho cemereye ikoreshwa ryarwo muvyo ubuvuzi n'ubushakashatsi mu 2018. Zambia yoyo iherutse gutangaza ko ubu vyemewe n'amategeko gutunganya urumogi no kururungika mu mahanga ku mpamvu z'urudandaza n'ubuvuzi. Leya y'ico gihugu yafashe ico cemezo mu nama yayo yabaye ku wa 04 z'ukwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze nk'uko vyatangajwe na Dora Siliya avugira leta. Ikindi gihugu gikoresha urumogi ku rugero runini cane ni Korea y'Uburaruko, aho mbere n'amashirahamwe ya reta aja kurugurisha mu bindi bihugu kugira baronke amahera y'agaciro. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bitazwi neza ko hoba hariho amategeko abuza ikoreshwa ry'urumogi, kandi ico gihugu ntikibona ko ikoreshwa ry'urumogi ari ukurenga ku mategeko.

column2: Pep Guardiola arahayagiza umukinyi Raheem Sterling avuga ko adasanzwe
column3: Umumenyereza  wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, arashimagiza uruhara rw'umukinyi "adasanzwe" Raheem Sterling yatsinze ibitsindo bitatu vyose mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere n'umurwi West Ham ejo ku wa gatandatu mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier League. Uyo mukinyi yabonywe nk'uwudasanzwe n'umumenyereza wiwe yatsinze ibitindo bitanu mu nkizo za kivandimwe ziheruka, akaba yarabandanije uwo muvuduko ku munsi wa gatandatu. Guardiola ati: "Ndazi ubuhinga budasanzwe bw'uyu mukinyi, ubwitonzi, inguvu  n'ububasha bw'ugutsinda". "Ku gitsindo ca kabiri, umupira ntiyawufashe neza ariko yatsinze igitsindo ciza, ica gatatu coco cari ciza birengeje". "Aracari mu minsi ya mbere akina nk'umusatirizi, ariko ndizeye neza ko ico kibanza azogikinamwo neza cane, n'aho nzi neza ko ashobora gukina no ku zindi nomero z'imbere". Eka na Alan Shearer yahoze ari umusatirizi w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza yishimiye ubuhinga bw'uyo muhungu w'imyaka 24. Ati: "Iyo ari imbere y'igori, igitangaza conyene ni igihe adashoboye kwinjiza. Aratekanye kandi  ariyemera. Biragoye kumwaka umupira". "Ibiharuro vyo mu myaka ibiri iheze birateye ubwoba - ibitsindo 35, yongera atanga imipira yavuyemwo ibitsindo incuro 32". Hagati aho, Guardiola ashimangira uruhara rw'abandi bakinyi bakinana, akavuga ko Sterling umupira wanka iyo abo bakinana batavyifashemwo neza. Yongerako ati: "Mu gice ca mbere, yakinye nk'uko twariko dukina muri rusangi, hanyuma mu cige ca kabiri arakina neza nk'uko umurwi wose wariko urakina". "Nivyo koko ko ari abakinyi bafise ubuhinga bwinshi, ariko barakeneraniye nk'umurwi uri hamwe. Iyo abakinyi bateye baja imbere bagasatira, nawe akina neza cane". Mu rukino rw'ejo, Man city isanzwe ariyo yatsindiye ihiganwa riheruka,  yatsinze West Ham ibitsindo bitanu ku busa, harimwo ivyo bitatu vya Sterling.

column2: Zinedine Zidane avuye muri Real Madrid ubugira kabiri nk'umumenyereza
column3: Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid yatanze imihoho ubugira kabiri kuva atangiye ako kazi. Umugwi wa Real wananiwe gutahukana igikombe na kimwe muri uyu mwaka, ukaba uheruka gutwagwa igikombe ca La Liga n'umukeba wawo Atletico Madrid ku musi wa nyuma wa shampiyona wo ku wa gatandatu. Mw'itangazo ryayo, Real yavuze ko "bategerezwa kwubahiriza" ingingo ya Zidane. Bashimiye Zidane w'imyaka 48 ku "buhinga, ukwitanga n'urukundo yerekanye muri Real Madrid hamwe n'ico amariye uwo mugwi." Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa, yakiniye Real Madrid kuva mu 2001 gushika mu 2006, yatwaye igikombe ca Champions League  incuro zitatu yikurikiranya hamwe n'igikombe ca La Liga igihe yamenyereza ubwa mbere uwo mugwi hagati ya 2016 na 2018. Yavuye muri uwo mugwi mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2018, ariko aca agaruka inyuma y'amezi cumi, akaba yaciye anatwara igikombe ca La Liga co mu mwaka uheze. Real yavuze iti: "Zidane n'umwe muri rurangiranwa ba Real Madrid kandi iragi ryiwe riruta kure ivyo yashitseko nk'umumenyereza n'umukinyi mu mugwi wacu. "Arazi neza ko afise ikibanza mu mitima y'abakunzi ba Real Madrid kandi ko azoguma yisanga muri Real Madrid." Real yarangije ihiganwa irushwa na Atletico amanota abiri muri La Liga, ibura igikombe gutyo incuro ya mbere kuva mu 2009-2010. Bavuye mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe citiriwe umwami (Copa del Rey) kare cane bakuwemwo n'umugwi wo mu cicaro ca gatatu Alcoyano, banatsindwa na Chelsea mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa rya Champions League. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Zidane, yari asigaje umwaka umwe ku masezerano yiwe, yarahakanye yivuye inyuma ivyavugwa ko yamenyesheje abakinyi biwe ko ashobora gukura meza mu mpera z'uyu mwaka w'inkino. Kazoza kiwe ni ko kaguma kagaruka mu bimenyeshamakuru vyo muri Espagne, bituma haba no guterana amajambo, aho Zidane yavuze ko we n'abakinyi biwe bakwiye icubahiro. Ni we mumenyereza wenyene amaze gutwara igikombe ca Champions League incuro zitatu, akaba yaranatwaye ibikombe bibiri vy'imigwi ya mbere kw'isi, bibiri vya UEFA Super Coupe na bibiri vya Super Coupe ya Espagne.

column2: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza. Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

column2: UK: umushikiranganji yasavye imbabazi inyuma y'amashusho amwerekana asomana n'umufasha
column3: Imiryango yaburiye ababo muri ca kiza karanda Covid-19 iragabisha ko umushikiranganji Matt Hancock yubahutse agasomana n'umufasha mu biro iwe bishobora gutesha urubwa reta, bigatuma abantu bahonyanga amabwirizwa ajanye no kutegerana mu ntumbero yo kurwanya iki kiza. Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu asaba imbabazi inyuma y'aho amashusho avugwa ko yafashwe ku wa 06 z'ukwa gatanu amwerekaniye ariko asomana na Gina Coladangelo. Ishirahamwe riharanira agateka k'ababuze ababo bahitanywe na Covid-19 (Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice) rivuga ko mu gihe vyonanirana ko Hancock yirukanwa bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi nk'izabaye kuri Cummings, maze abantu bagahonyanga amabwirizwa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wewe abona ko ikibazo carangiye. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere avuga ko Boris Johnson yemeye imbabazi zasabwe na Hancock, kandi ko afitiye icizere uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu. Ishirahamwe Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice ryandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson rimusaba kwirukana Hancock mu gihe atotanga imihoho, rikibaza mbere nimba uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu akibereye kuba umutegetsi yofata ingingo zijanye na Covid. Rivka Gottlieb wo mw'iryo shirahamwe yavugiye mu kiganiro The World Tonight ca BBC Radio 4 ati: "Mu gihe yoramuka atangaje izindi ngingo za guma mu rugo canke ayandi mabwirizwa, ubona hari n'umwe yokwumvira umuntu na we ubwiwe adakurikiza amabwirizwa"? "Ivyo twese vyaratubabaje. Kuri Cummings ntacabaye, yibandanirije akazi kiwe, ehe raba ivyabaye, abantu baciye batangura guhonyanga amabwirizwa. Mfise ubwoba ko ivyo ari vyo bishobora kuba". ingingo yo kutegerana ku kazi si itegeko, ariko reta isaba ko abantu batandukana imetero zibiri aho bishoboka - canke imetero imwe, hampande y'izindi ngingo zo kugabanya ikwirakwira, nk'izijanye n'ukwambara udupfukamunwa. Mu kwa gatatu kw'uno mwaka, umuhanuzi mukuru w'umushikiranganji wa mbere ico gihe, Dominic Cummings, yaniramuye afata urugendo rw'ibirometero birenga 418 ava i Londres aja mu karere ka  Durham kandi igihugu cari ingingo za guma mu rugo. Ico gihe reta yari yafashe amategeko akomeye yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza Mu nyuma we n'umugore wiwe bagiye kwandura Covid. Abanyagihugu bariyamirije Cummings, ariko umushikiranganji wa mbere yaramuryamaryamyeko, mu kuvuga ko ata "kundi yari kugira" atari ugufata urwo rugendo. Prof Stephen Reicher, wo kuri kaminuza yigisha ibijanye n'inyifato, University of St Andrews' School of Psychology, avuga ko icatumye inyifato ya Cummings ibonwa "nabi cane" si ukubera vyakozwe n'umuhanuzi wa reta, ariko ni ukubera ingene Boris Johnson yamuvugiye. Prof Reicher yabwiye Newsnight ca BBC Two ati: "Ugusamara kw'umuntu umwe kwatumye abantu bibaza ibibazo ku ntwaro, aho babona ko hari itegeko rituraba twebwe irindi rikaraba abandi". "Mu gihe igihugu gihanzwe n'ibibazo bikomeye, dukeneye reta twizeye, kandi dukeneye reta dushobora kwumviriza". Abashikiranganji bandi bari muri reta bashigikiye uyu mugenzi wabo ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Ariko Sir John Curtice yigisha ibijanye na poritike kuri kaminuza ya Strathclyde yabwiye BBC BBC Radio 4 ivyo ari vyo vyose umushikiranganji Hancock ata mahoro azoronka. Ikinyamakuru The Sun, ari naco ca mbere cerekanye aya masanamu ya Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo kikayashikana mu biro bijejwe amagara y'abantu, yerekana n'ayandi mashusho y'aba bantu babiri ingene bavyifatamwo. Iki kinyamakuru kivuga ko iyi sanamu iheruka yerekana Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo bari mu nzu y'uburiro ku wa 23 z'ukwa gatanu - haciye imisi 17 herekanywe amashusho y'ingene bariko basomana.

column2: Coronavirus: Afrika y’Epfo yatezuye ingingo za guma mu rugo
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo avuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus mu gihugu bisa n'ivyageze kw'isonga, aca atangaza ingingo yo gutezura ingingo za guma mu rugo. Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa amenyesha ko hafi ingingo zose zafashwe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera zizotangura gutezurwa kuva ejo ku wa mbere. Eka n'ingingo yateye impari cane yo kubuza urudandaza rw'inzoga n'itabi izovaho. Ingendo zo hagati mu gihugu, amakoraniro mato mato y'imiryango hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'ubutunzi bizosubira kwemererwa. Hagati aho, avuga ko hariho zimwe zimwe zizogumaho, harimwo izijanye n'abinjira mu gihugu bavuye hanze, amakoraniro y'abantu barenga 50  hamwe n'amakoraniro y'inkino. Mw'ijambo ryiwe rya nijoro ku wa gatandatu kuri televiziyo, Bwana Ramaphosa avuga ko iryo tezurwa rizotuma ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu busubirana itoto inyuma y'igihe kirekire igihugu kiri mu bihe bigoye. Hagati aho, asaba abanya Afrika y'epfo ko batokwijajara imbere ya Covid-19 n'aho hari ibimenyetso "vy'agahengwe", akanagabisha ko ibintu bishobora kuba nabi mu minsi iri imbere. Gushika ubu, iki gihugu gifise abarenga igice c'abanduye coronavirus ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, aho abarenga 570.000 ari bo bamaze kwandura, nayo 11,500 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Afrika y'Epfo kandi nico gihugu kigira gatanu kw'isi mu bitigiri vy'abanduye uwu mugera, inyuma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Brezili, Uburusiya n'Ubuhindi, ariko abandura bakaba batanguye kugabanuka mu minsi iheze. Bwana Ramaphosa avuga ko ibitigiri biherutse gutangazwa vyamanutse biva ku 12.000 bishika ku 5000 mu ndwi iheze. Ibiharuro vy'abakirwaye vyaragabanutse gushika ku 105.000 kandi ibitigiri vy'abakira bikaba vyaraduze gushika ku bice 80%, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'umukuru w'ico gihugu. Mu kwa gatatu, leta ya Afrika y'Epfo yarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo zikomeye cane, aho imbibe z'igihugu zugawe, amashure arugarwa, urudandazwa rw'inzoga rurahagarikwa, maze abanyagihugu bategekwa kuguma muhira. Izo ngingo zizwi ko zatumye umugera wa coronavirus udakwirakwira n'umurindi munini, bituma ibisata bijejwe amagara y'abantu vyoroherwa mu kwakira abarwaye. Agahengwe kamaze kuboneka, leta yaciye itangura gutezura buke buke mu kwa gatandatu, ariko ingingo ruhasha zikaba zasubiriye gufatwa mu kwezi guheze inyuma y'aho ibitigiri vy'abanduye bisubiriye kuduga. Igihugu caciye gishirwa mu mategeko adasanzwe gushika ku wa 15 z'ukwa munani. Ingingo zafashwe zariyamirijwe n'abanyagihugu, mbere n'abafise amazu y'uburiro n'inyobwa bakaba bariyamirije cane iyo ngingo yo kubuza urudandaza rw'inzoga. Intara ya Gauteng, umushinge w'ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu, niyo yasinzikaye cane gusumba izindi.

column2: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

column2: Intambara ya Ukraine: Poland ivuga ko izobaho n'aho Russia yoyima gaze
column3: Pologne ivuga ko izoshobora "kubaho" inyuma y'aho Uburusiya buhagarikiye igurishwa rya gaze muri ico gihugu kuri uno wa gatatu, nk'uko amakuru abivuga. Ikompanyi ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya Gazprom yabwiye Pologne na Bulgarie ko izohagarika igurishwa rya gaze mu bihugu "vy'abakeba" vyanse kuriha mu ma rouble. Amakuru ava mu bigo vy'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bijejwe gaze yerekana ko gaze yahora irungikwa muri Pologne ubu yahagaze. Pologne ivuga ko izoronka gaze ahandi. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba Bulgarie nayo nyene yakatiwe gaze. Ibi bihugu vyompi vyaranse kuriha mu ma roubles - ifaranga ry'Uburusiya. Ikompanyi ya Pologne ijejwe gaze, PGNiG, ivuga ko yari yabwiwe ko imihora yose ya gaze yategerezwa kwugarwa kuva isaha zibiri mu masaha yo mu ci ya Bulaya yo hagati (ni co kimwe n'ay'Uburundi no mu Rwanda). Ubushikiranganji bwa Bulgaria bujejwe amasoko ntanganguvu buvuga ko bwabwiwe ko irungikwa rya gaze muri iki gihugu rihagarikwa kuva kuri uwu wa gatatu. PGNiG igendera kuri Gazprom ku rugero hafi rwose rwa gaze yinjiza mu gihugu, 53% ya gaze yinjije mu gihugu yayiguze mu Burusiya mu gice ca mbere c'uno mwaka. Ivuga ko iri hagarikwa ry'igurishwa ari uguhonyanga amasezerano, ikavuga kandi ko izofata izindi ngingo kugira ngo isubire kuronka gaze. Bulgaria,  igihugu gisanzwe kigendera kuri Gazprom ku rugero rurenga 90% rwa gaze gikoresha, ivuga ko yafashe ingingo zo kurondera ayandi masoko ariko nta mategeko yafashwe ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa rya gaze muri kino gihe. Ubushikiranganji bw'ico gihugu bujejwe amasoko ntanganguvu buvuga ko Bulgarie yakoze ivyo yategerezwa gukora mu masezerano isanzwe ifitaniye na Gazprom kandi ko bwarishe ivyo bwategerezwa kuriha. Buvuga kandi ko uburyo bushasha bwo kuriha bwashizweho n'Uburusiya buhonyanga amasezerano asanzwe ahari. Aya makuru amaze kuja ahabona, ubushikiranganji bwa Pologne bujejwe ikirere buvuga ko iki gihugu gifise amasoko ntanganguvu akwiye. Umushikiranganji ajejwe ikirere Anna Moskwa avuga ko bidakenewe kwikora kuri gaze y'integabizoza kandi ko badashobora guhagarika gaze ku bakiriya. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa Pologne ajejwe imigenderanire, Marcin Przydacz, avuga ko igihugu ciwe cari camaze kwitegura ko Uburusiya bwari gushobora kugabanya igurishwa rya gaz mu gihugu ciwe, gica kirondera ayandi masoko. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Ndazi neza cane ko tuzotorera inyishu iki kibazo". Avuga kandi ko iyi ngingo yo kwugara imihora ya gaze yerekana ko Moscou itari "incuti y'umwizigirwa mu gikorwa ico ari co cose c'ubucuruzi" aca asaba ibindi bihugu vya Bulaya nk'Ubudagi gushigikira ingingo yo guhagarika gukoresha amasoko ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya. Polonge yari isanzwe iri mu nteguro zo guhagarika kugurira gaze mu Burusiya gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka, aho amasezerano y'igihe kirekire na Gazprom azoba arangiye. PGNiG ivuga ko ububiko bwayo bwo mu kuzimu bwari bwuzuye gushika ku rugero rwa 80% kandi ko, kubera ici ririko riregereza, atari benshi bayisaba. Pologne nayo nyene irafise ayandi masoko, harimwo ikigo ca gaze y'amazi (gaz naturel liquéfié/liquefied natural gas, GNL/LNG) kiri ahitwa Swinoujscie. Ku wa 01 Rusama (5), vyitezwe ko uwundi muringoti wa gaze iva muri Lithuania na woe nyene uzokwugururwa, bikazotuma Pologne ironka gaze ivuye muri ico gihugu. Ni mu gihe uwundi muringoti mushasha uva muri  Norvège, uzwi nka "Baltic Pipe", uzotangura gukora muri Gitugutu (10). Ushobora kwuzura rwose gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka ugashobora guca usubirira gaze yose yava mu Burusiya. Ibice vyababa 40% vya gaze ibihugu vyo mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bikoresha isanzwe iva mu Burusiya. Hagati aho, ibihugu vyinshi vyaramaze gufata ingingo yo kuvavanura n'amasoko ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya mu kwihora igitero cabwo kuri Ukraine. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zaramaze guhagarika burundu igitoro, gaze n'ibizuku (charbon) vy'Uburusiya. Ni mu gihe Ubwongereza butegura guhagarika kugurira igitoro mu Burusiya imbere y'uko uno mwaka urangira, hakazokurikira gaze vuba bishoboka, mu gihe Ubumwe bwa Bulaya nabwo buriko buragabanya gaze bugurirayo gushika ku bice bibiri vya bitatu.

column2: Covid: India yagize igitigiri ca mbere kinini kw'isi c'abanduye mu gihe oxygene nayo ikenye
column3: Ubuhindi bwatangaje  abantu bashasha 314.385 batowe  coronavírus mu masaha 24 - igitigiri ca mbere kini gitowe ku munsi umwe ata handi na hamwe cari bwashikweko kw'isi. Abapfa biyongeyeko 2.104 muri ico kiringo, naco nyene nico gitigiri ca mbere kinini Ubuhindi bushitseko ku munsi umwe. Bitumye ico gihugu gishika  hafi ku miriyoni 16 z'abantu bazwi icese ko banduye, ikibanza ca kabiri inyuma ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigeze  ku miriyoni 31.9 bazwi. Ubuhindi bwugarijwe n'umurindi ugira kabiri wo kwandura, nabwo ubukene bukabije bw'umwuka wo guhumeka (oxygene) bukaba bwongereje ubwoba ku nzego  z'ubuvuzi zarengewe. Vyatumye sentare nkuru  y'i Dehli igera aho iruha ikanegura ingene reta mpuzantara iriko iritwara muri ico kibazo ca oxygene muri ico gisagara. Igihe bariko barasoma urubanza rwazanywe n'umuntu afise ibitaro bitandatu vyigenga, abacamanza bavuze bati: "Ibi  biteye isoni. Dukeneye kumenya ico reta iriko irakora ku bijanye  n'uko haboneka oxygene mu Buhindi". Sentare yategetse reta gukora ku buryo oxygene iva aho ihingurirwa igashikira neza ibitaro mu gihugu cose. Hari abantu benshi bamaze gupfa muri ico gihugu barindiriye kuronka umwuka , n'ubwo bitoroshe kumenya ingene igitigiri cabo kingana. N'imbuga  hwaniro aho mu Buhindi zuzuyeko ubutumwa  bw'abatabaza basaba umwuka. Abantu isinzi usanga bakoraniye  imbere y'ibitaro mu bisagara bikuru bikuru vyuzuye abarwayi gushika aho ata kibanza na kimwe gisigara. Hagati aho abategetsi bo mu ntara ikomerewe cane kurusha izindi ya Maharashtra  batangaje ko  hongeweko izindi ngingo zo kugerageza kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara kuva kuri uyu wa kane ku mugoroba, mu gihe ihanganye n'iyongerekana rikomeye ry'abafatwa. Iyo ntaya yari isanzwe iri muri gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo amasaha atari make y'umunsi kuva itariki 14 z'ukwezi kwa kane. Maharashtra niyo ntara ya mbere itunze cane mu Buhindi ikaba ari nayo irimwo igisagara c'ivyashara vyinshi vy'amafaranga, Mumbai. Ninayo yagumye ari ikirimbiro rikomeye rya Covid kuva ico kiza  cadutse,  yonyene ikaba irimwo ica kane c'abandura uwo mugera mu gihugu. Maharashtra ni nayo ntara imaze  gupfamwo abantu benshi kurusha izindi ntara zose, bagera ku 67. 468. Ariko n'ubwo impfu zakomeje kwiyongera, urugero rw'abapfa ugeraranije ruracari hasi. Vikas Pandey, umunyamakuru wa BBC News i  Delhi avuga ko telefone yiwe buri igihe iba iriko irahamagarwa n'abagenzi bihebuye basaba ico yobafasha mu kurondera igitanda mu bitaro hamwe n'imiti. Avuga ko  hari bamwe ashobora gufasha n'abandi atako ari bugire. Ati : " Ndazi ubwanje abarwayi benshi bamaze gupfa kuko batashoboye kuronka oxygene hakiri kare. N'ibintu bibabaje cane ku miryango kwumva ko ibitaro ababo baba bariko baravurirwamwo  vuba bigiye  kuba ata mwuka bifise". Vikas Pandey avuga ko gushika ubu reta yakoze ku buryo ata kaga gokomeye karaba, ariko biruhuta cane ko ibitaro bironswa oxygene kugira bishobore kwitaho ibitgiri vy'abarwayi biguma vyiyongera. Avuga ko abahinga bibaza igituma ibintu bimeze uko mu gihe mu kwezi kwa mbere umuvuduko w'iyo ndwara wasa n'uwahagaritswe. Asigura ko ako kanya k'agahengwe katakoreshejwe kugira hongerezwa uburyo bwo kwitaho abarwayi. Avuga ko ubu rero abanttu bariko baravyishura ku rugero aho ''twese dusanga ataco turi bufashe". Icateye uwo murindi mushasha ni igiki? Ubuhndi bwugarijwe y'iyongerekana rinyaruka cane ry'abandura mu kwezi guheze, ryatewe no gufata minenerwe ingingo zo kwirinda, hamwe n'isabukuru ry'aba Hindu ryitabiriwe na miriyoni z'abantu ukongerako amoko mashasha y'uwo mugera, harimwo ubumaze kwihindura kabiri. Ubwo bwatowe muri 61% y'ibipimo vyafashwe muri Maharashtra , nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kiraba indwara z'imigera. N'amakoraniro y'amatora - arimwo na ministre wa mbere Narendra Modi - nayo ntiyahagaritswe mu ntara ya West Bengal, ahabaye amatora ku bice ku bice  mu ndwi ziheze. N'uyu munsi hari ahari kuba amatora ariko reta yahagaritse ingingo yo kuyabandanya.

column2: Kenya: Imisi 13 niyo yahawe abakozi ba reta bataricandagisha Covid-19
column3: Abakozi ba reta muri Kenya bahawe imisi 13 gusa ngo babe bahejeje kwiteza urucanco rwo kwikingira Covid-19 canke naho bafatirwe ingingo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, umukuru w'igisata kijejwe abakozi ba reta yavuze ko iyi ngingo yafashwe kubera igitigiri gito c'abakozi ba reta baronkejwe uru rucanco, cane cane abigisha n'abo mu gisata kijejwe umutekano. Avuga ko hari abakozi ba  reta batari bake bataye akazi kugira bahunge uru rucanco. Ejo ku wa mbere, Kenya yatangaje ko abantu 745 bashasha banduye uwu mugera wa corona, bituma abamaze kwandura kuva iki kiza gishika mu gihugu bashika 212.573. Mu ndwi iheze, reta yavuze ko imaze gutanga incanco imiriyoni 1,7 za AstraZeneca, nyinshi muri izi zikaba ari doze ya mbere. Kenya itegekanya ko gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka izoba imaze gucandaga abantu imiriyoni cumi.

column2: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
column3: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

column2: Abagore bashika 50 bo muri Afrika y’Epfo 'bagizwe ingumba kubera barwaye umugera wa SIDA'
column3: Amatohoza yakozwe muri Afrika y'Epfo yerekana ko abagore bashika 50 basanzwe baranduye umugera wa SIDA bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu imbere y'uko bibaruka mu bitaro bitandukanye muri ico gihugu. Umurwi ujejwe uburinganire hagati y'abagabo n'abagore muri ico gihugu (CGE) uvuga ko ibitaro vya leta vyahonyanze agateka k'abakenyezi mu gihe "ubugumba batewe ku nguvu butuma bafatwa nabi bakabaho mu gatotezo". Ayo matohoza yashizwe ahabona ejo ku wa mbere yatanguye gukorwa mu 2015 igihe amashirahamwe abiri aharanira agateka k'abagore yitura uyo murwi afise amazina y'abantu 48 bavugwa ko bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Uwo murwi waciye utangura kwegeranya ivyemezo kuri abo bagore bavugwa ko batewe ubugumba. Uwo murwi wasanze abaganga bo mu bitaro bimwe bimwe vya leta batera ubugumba abagore bategerezwa gukorwa mu kuvyara, bababwira ko abanduye umugera badategerezwa kuvyara abana, ngo kandi ko bashobora gupfa mu gihe bosubira kuvyara. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "Rimwe rimwe, mu gihe bari mu bubabare burenze urugero bari ku bise, abo bagore bategekwa gutera igikumu ku nguvu ku rwandiko bagiye kumenya mu nyuma ko rwari urwo kwiyemeza ko batanze uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uburyo bwose kugira babatere ubugumba". Abakoze ayo matohoza basanze hari abaganga muri ivyo bitaro batera ubwoba abo bagore ko mu gihe batotera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko badashobora kubafasha kuvyara. Ubwo bubisha buvugwa muri ico cegeranyo bwakozwe hagati ya 2002 na 2015. Uwo murwi kandi wagiriza abo baganga ko barenze ku "masezerano biyemeje yo kuvura abantu". Ico cegeranyo cashikirijwe ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwa Afrika y'Epfo. Uwo murwi umenyesha ko vyabaye ibintu bigoye kurangiza ayo matohoza kubera amafishe y'abo bagore "yari yatakaye" mu bitaro. Umukuru w'uwo murwi, Tamara Mathebula, avuga ko "bitaboneka neza ingene ico kibazo cifashe muri Afrika y'Epfo, ariko turizeye ko ivyo twasavye bizotuma imiryango yuguruka maze ibinyegejwe bikamenyekana". Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Zwelini Mkhize, yasavye umubonano wihuta n'umupfasoni Mathebula  kugira ngo bavugane kuri ico cegeranyo, nk'uko bivugwa na Reuters isubiramwo ivyavuzwe n'ubwo bushikiranganji.

column2: Tanzania-Dr Philip Mpango:Video y'umushikiranganji abeshuza ko yapfuye yaneguwe cane
column3: Video ibabaje y'umushikiranganji  wa Tanzania ajejwe ikigega ari imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru kubeshuza ibihuha vy'uko yapfuye yaneguwe cane, benshi bakavuga ko bitari bikenewe kandi  ari ukumugirira nabi. Ku ndwi iheze prezida John Magufuli yari yebeshuje ivyo bihuha , avuga ko Dr Philip Mpango akiriho kandi ariko aratora mitende. Ku wa kabiri, Dr Mpango, ahagatiwe n'abakozi bo kwa muganga babiri , batambaye udufukamunwa, yasomye itangazo imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru mu bitaro vyitiriwe Benjamin Mkapa ku murwa mukuru Dodoma. Yarakoroye   aranahagirika kenshi  kugira abashe gusubira guhema neza igihe yariko arasoma iryo tangazo. Ntibizwi indwara agwaye iyariyo ariko yavuze ko yari afise "ingorane zo guhema" kandi ko yari akeneye  umwuka(oxygene). Yavuze kandi ko yakize. Uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Tundu Lisu yaneguye abategetsi baretse ngo iryo tangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru risomwe. Ati: "Ninde yaretse umuntu arwaye ngo akore ivyo, yarakorora kandi ntiyari yambaye agafukamunwa. Yategerzwa kuba ariko araruhuka  anavurwa.'' Lissu yongeyeko ati uko "n'ukwigira sindabibazwa'' Dr Mpango yageze ahantu ikigumbagumba kiramufata igihe yariko arahoza ababuze yongera asaba imbabazi ko atashoboye  imigirwa yo gusezera icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar Sef Sharif Hamad, yapfuye ku ndwi iheze ahitanywe na Covid-19,n'umunyamabanga mukuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu John Kijazi n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa banki nkuru y'igihugu Prof Benno Ndulu. Dr Mpango ati: "Narababaye kubona  ata n'umwe nashoboye guherekeza ariko ndabifuriza amahoro adashira." Hamaze kuvugwa impfu nyinshi zifatiye kuri Covid-19 muri Tanzania ariko ntizigeze zemezwa icese canke naho vyavuzwe ko umugera wa corona atari wo waziteye. Ariko ubu Tanzania  ubu bwa vuba yarahinduye imvugo, ubu abategetsi ntibakivuga koi co gihugu ata Covid-19 ikirangwamwo ahubwo bagahamiriza abanyagihugu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kwikingira harimwo kwambara agafukamunwa.

column2: Caster Semenya agiye kwungururiza muri sentare ya Bulaya urubanza rw'abanonotsi b'igitsinagore bafise testosterone irenze urugero
column3: Umunonotsi  wa mbere mu kwiruka 800m Caster Semenya agiye kwunguruza urubanza muri sentare ya Bulaya y'agateka ka zina muntu ku ngingo ibuza guhiganwa abagore n'abakobwa bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo/umusemburo (hormone) ya testosterone. Semenya ntiyemerewe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na mile (1.609,34m) atabanje gufata imiti igabanya testosterone, kuva urwego rw'ubunonotsi World Athletics rubihinduye mu 2019. Uwo munya-Africa y'Epfo yatsinzwe urubanza yunguruje muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu kwezi kw'icenda ariko n'ubu aracafise icizere ko ashobora kwemererwa kuhiganwa mu nkino zo mu Buyapani uyu mwaka kugira  arwanire  kugumana ikibanza ca mbere muri Olympic. Yavuze ati: "Nta kindi dusaba atari kutureka,rimwe kandi rizima,  tukiruka ata nkomanzi, nk'abagore b'inguvu kandi badatinya nk'uko twamye na mbere hose." Abashingwamanza biwe bazosigura ko Ubuswise bwananiwe mu nshingano zabwo zo kumukingira ihonyangwa ry'uburenganzira bwiwe. Urwego rw'ubunonotsi rwashinze ingingo ivuga ko abanonotsi bafise uko bateye kurenze urugero rusanzwe rw'abandi bahuje igitsina (differences of sex development,DSD) bategerezwa gufata imiti kugira bahiganwe hagati ya 400m na mile canke  biruke ku zindi metero. Abanonotsi bafise DSD bagira urugero ruri hejuru rwa testosterone kama, urwego rw'ubunonotsi rukavuga ko  ivyo bibaha ico barusha abandi  mw'ihiganwa. Sentare ijejwe amatati mu nkino yimye agaciro urubanza rwungurujwe na Semyenya kuri iyo ngingo mu 2019. Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yaciye iba irahagaritse iyo ngingo vy'agateganyo, ariko mu nyuma yisubirako. Vyasigura ko Semenya yabaye uwa mbere  ku 800m mu nkino za Olympic za 2012 na 2016 , yaciye yamburwa uburenganzira bwo gusubira guhiganwa mu nkino z'isi za Doha kuko atari yatsinze urubanza rwo guhagarika iyo ngingo y'urwego rw'ubunonotsi. Mw'itangazo inyuma y'ingingo ya sentare  y'Ubuswise mu  kwezi kw'icenda, World Athletics yagize iti : "Mu myaka itanu ishize, World Athletics yaragwaniye ukungana kw'uburenganzira n'amahirwe ku bagore  n'abakobwa bose mu nkino zacu ubu no muri kazoza. "Nico gituma dushimye ingingo y'uyu munsi ya sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yo kwemeza amategeko yacu ajanye na DSD nk'uburyo bubereye kandi buri hagati na hagati bwo gukingira uburenganzira bw'abanonotsi bose b'igitsinagore mu kwitaba inkino zacu mu buryo atawe burenganya kandi bwumvikana." Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yavuze ko: "kugra amahirwe amwe mu nkino n'umwitwarariko wumvikana kandi kugize ishingiro ryo guhigana mu nkino.Ni kimwe mu nkingi ihiganwa rishingiyeko." Mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2020, Semenya yavuze ko ashaka kwiruka 200m i Tokyo , ico gihe akaba  atokenera kwirirwa arafata imiti. Kugira ashobore guhiganwa, yotegerezwa kubanza kwiruka izo metero mu mwanya w'ama sekunda 22,80 umuha uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa  mu gihe gushika ubu umwanya mwiza afise ari amasekunda 23,49. Itangazo ry'abunganira Semenya, Norton Rose Fulbright, ryo kuri uyu wa kane rivuga riti: "N'ubwo sentare ariyo izotanga ikirangaminsi y'aho izocira urubanza rwacu, Caster agumana icizere kuruta na mbere ko vuba azokwemererwa gusubira kwiruka 800m mu mahingwanwa mpuzamakungu."

column2: Ukraine: Video ya Schwarzenegger igwanya intambara yakwirakwiye henshi mu Burusiya
column3: Ivyo umukinyi wa filime Arnold Schwarzenegger yashikirije abarusiya abicishije kuri Twitter biri mu vya mbere biriko birakwiragira cane mu Burusiya kuri uyu wa gatanu, binavugisha benshi ahantu hatandukanye. Muri iyo video, aragabisha abarusiya ko bariko barahabwa amakuru atari yo ku bitero igihugu cabo kiriko kiragira kuri Ukraine. Yavuze ko ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya vyababeshe n'impaka bivuga ko ivyo bitero bifise intumbero yo "kwirukana" aba nazi" muri Ukraine. Ukraine si yo yasomborokeje intambara, ariko"Abari ku butegetsi mu Burusiya" ni bo babikoze. Abwira prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin, yagize ati:"Ni we watanguje iyi ntambara kandi ushobora no kuyihagarika." Muri iyo video imara iminota icenda, yerekana ubwicanyi n'isamburwa ry'inyubakwa muri Ukraine, uwo mu kinyi wa filime ubu ari umunye politike ahamagarira abantu kumenya inkuru zitari zo na propagande. Agira ati:"Ndiko ndabwira mwebwe uyu musi kuko hari ibintu biriko biraba mw'isi babanyegeje, ibintu biteye ubwoba mwategerezwa kumenya." Uwo yahoze arongoye intara ya California yanibukije ko prezida wa Ukraine ari umuyahudi, ko"Ukraine ntiyasomborokeje iyi ntambara, canke itanguzwe n'aba 'nationalistes' canke aba Nazi." Ati:"Iyi si intambara y'abanyagihugu b'abarusiya." Uwo yahoze ari umunonotsi wo gukomeza umubiri yambuka muri Autriche - filime yakinyemwo ya Red Heat yabaye iya mbere yo muri Amerika ikiniwe mu 'kibanza gitukura' i Moscou - yavuze no ku gishika afitiye abarusiya. Yagize ati:"Inguvu n'umutima vy'abanyagihugu b'abarusiya vyagumye ari icitegererezo cane. Ari na co gituma nizeye ko mundeka nkababwira ukuri kuri iyi ntambara ya Ukraine." Yabandanije avuga ati:"Iyi n'intambara y'ububeshi. Ubuzima bwanyu, ibihimba vyanyu, kazoza kanyu vyatanzweko inkuka mu ntambara itagira mvura yiyamirizwa n'amakungu yose." Iyo video imaze kurabwa n'abantu bababa imiliyoni 24 abandi barenga 310.000 baramaze kuyikwiragiza, ikaba iri mu nkuru ziri kuri Twitter ziriko zimaze gukwiragizwa cane ku wa gatanu mu gitondo. Abakurikirana cane uwo mukinyi wa filime kuri Twitter  harimwo abarusiya bakoresha ikirusiya n'abakoresha icongereza. Amajambo yiwe yashimagijwe n'abarusiya badashigikiye intambara. Ku rubuga rwa Telegram, uwutavuga rumwe na reta y'Uburusiya Lev Shlosberg yagize ati:"Arnold Schwarzenegger afise ubushobozi yisangije bwo kugondoza uwo ari we wese, mu cubahiro no mu majambo atarengera. Umutima nama, ubushobozi n'ubutungane. Vyiyumvire. Utahure." Uwundi, umumenyeshamakuru Anton Orekh yagize ati:"Ndazi ko wabonye amajambo ya Arnold Schwarzenegger. Murazi igituma ari meza? Yavuzwe aduha icubahiro, twebwe abarusiya. Dusigaye turi ibicibwa kw'isi kandi urwanko rw'abanka abavuga ikirusiya rwahira rukoreshwa muri propagande, kubwo imana mbi ruriko ruraja mu bikorwa.  Arnold n'umwe mu bantu bake avugisha abarusiya nk'abantu atari inyamaswa zataye inzira." Ariko urubugwa rw'uwiyita Barack Obmana ashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya kuri Twitter we yakoresheje imvugo itandukanye:"Ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire ya Amerika bwibaza ko ivyiyumviro vy'abantu baguzwe na Amerika bifise ico bivuze kuri twebwe. Uburusiya bwagumye busemerera ko intambara yo muri Ukraine ari "ibikorwa bidasanzwe" vyo gukingira abanye Ukraine bavuga ururimi rw'ikirusiya.
