column2: Iran: 'Abanyabulaya icenda' bahagaritswe mu myiyerekano ibandanya
column3: Abanyabulaya icenda bahagaritswe mu myiyerekano yo muri Irani yandurutse ku mugore yapfiriye mu gasho, ikaba imaze guhitana abatari bake. Abajejwe igendereza bahagaritse abantu bikekwa ko ari “abakozi b’ibigo vyo mu mahanga bijejwe igendereza” bamwe bari mu myiyerekano nyene, abandi nabo bagakorera binyegeje, nk’uko ibinyamakuru vy’ico gihugu bibivuga. Iyi migumuko nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko yimirije guhagarara, mu gihe abapfa babandanya biyongera. Iyi migumuko yadutse ku mugwa mukuru Tehran ica ikwira igihugu cose inyuma y’aho umugore w’umu-kurde, Mahsa Amini, apfiriye inyuma y’imisi ari mu gasho k’igipolisi. Uyu mugore w’imyaka 22 ava mu gisagara ca Saqez kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero, yahagaritswe i Tehran ku wa 13 z’uku kw’icenda n’abapolisi bajejwe imico myiza, bamwagiriza ko yahonyanze itegeko risaba abagore gupfuka imishatsi yabo na wa mwambaro wa hijab canke n’igitambara co mu mutwe. Abategetsi ntibavuga aho aba banyabulaya bahagarikiwe ariko batanga uburorero cumi bavuga ko ari ubwo abanyamahanga bagizemwo uruhara hamwe n’imirwi itavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi iri hanze ifise uruhara muri ino myiyerekano. Aba bahagaritswe bava mu bihugu vya Pologne, Suède, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano, Ubufaransa hamwe n’Ubuholande, nk’uko ubushikiranganji bwa Irani bujejwe igendereza bubivuga. Ibiro vy’ubuserukizi bw’Ubudagi, Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza n’ubwa Suède, biri mu vyagabishijwe ku ruhara rw’abakozi bavyo muri iyi myiyerekano yo kurwanya reta, nk’uko ubu bushikiranganji bubivuga. Buvuga kandi ko imbere be n’igihe c’iyi myiyerekano, habanje kuba izindi nteguro nyinshi mu kuyitegurira canke kugira ngo bihurirane, harimwo ibitero nyabwonko hamwe n’ikwiragizwa “ry’amakuru y’ibinyoma ashigikira imigumuko” buvuga ko vyakorwa n’ibinyamakuru bitegamiye reta, nk’igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’igi perse, hamwe na Iran International. Uyu mugore Amini yaguye mw’ibohero yari yatwawemwo kugira ngo “yigishwe” akaba yapfiriye mu bitaro aho yari amaze imisi itatu yataye ubwenge (coma). Umuryango wiwe wemeza ko yakubiswe n’abapolisi ariko igipolisi kibandanya gishimangira ko yapfuye ahitanywe n’indwara y’umutima yamufashe giturumbuka. Iran yagiriza “abansi b’abanyamahanga” ko bafise uruhara mu kaduruvayo kakurikiye, kakaba kamaze guhintana ababarirwa muri mirongo. Mu biharuro vyaryo biheruka vyacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter, ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Iran Human Rights (IHR), rifise icicaro muri Norvège/Norway, rivuga riti: "Abantu n’imiburiburi 83, harimwo n’abana, nibo bamaze kwemezwa ko bapfuye muri iyo migumuko ya Iran”. Abandi 19 bavugwa ko bapfuye ejo ku wa gatanu inyuma y’imishamirano hagati y’igipolisi n’abari mu myiyerekano ku kirindiro c’igipolisi i Zahedan, umugwa mukuru w’intara ya Sistan-Baluchistan  iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko. Muri aba bapfuye harimwo umukoroneri wo mu gisirikare, nk’uko vyandikwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru AFP, n’aho bitashotse bimenyekana nimba iyi mishamirano ifitaniye isano n’iyo migumuko yatewe n’urupfu rwa Amini. Buramatari w’intara Hossein Khiabani  yabwiye imboneshakure y’igihugu ati: "Abantu 19 barishwe abandi 20 barakomereka muri iyi mishamirano. Uwushinzwe igendereza rya gisirikare mu ntara Koloneli Ali Mousavi nawe nyene yishwe”. Intara ya Sistan-Baluchistan isanzwe ihana urubibe na Afghanistan hamwe na Pakistan ikunze kuberamwo imishamirano n’imirwi y’inkozi z’ikibi idandaza ibiyayuramutwe, hamwe n’inyeshamba zo mu nkehwa z’aba Baluchi hamwe n’imirwi y’intagondwa z’aba Islam bo mw’ishami ry’aba Sunni. Mu gatondo k’ejo ku wa gatanu, ibinyamakuru vya reta vyatangaje ko inzego zijejwe umutekano zarasanye n’abitwaje ibirwanisho bari batye ikirindiro c’igipolisi i Zahedan.

column2: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
column3: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

column2: Premier League: Imirwi igiye kuvugana uko ihiganwa ryorangira ku wa 30/06
column3: Imirwi iri mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League, itegekanya kuganira ejo ku wa gatanu ingene iryo higanwa borirangiza ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. Imirwi yose ntiyashoboye kugira ico ishikirije mu mibonano yagiye iraba gushika ubu, ariko beneyo bariko bihweza ingene hatoba ingorane mu masezerano bafitaniye n'abakinyi. Ivyo biri uko mu gihe icizere c'uko iryo higanwa rishobora gusubira gutangura mu kwa gatanu kiri kure nk'ukwezi. Hari abakinyi batari bake amasezerano bafitaniye n'imirwi yabo azorangira ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. Abo ni nka Willian akina hagati muri Chelsea, hamwe na Jan Vertonghen akina ku ruhande rw'inyuma muri Tottenham. Hambavu y'ivyo, hariho nka Liverpool itegekanya guhagarika amasezerano ifitaniye na New Balance yo kubakorera impuzu, ikagiranira ayandi masezerano na Nike. Eka n'imirwi ya Watford na NewCastle nayo nyene itegekanya guhindura amakompanyi asanzwe abakorera impuzu. Ishirahamwe FIFA risanzwe rizi ico kibazo, rikaba ririko ririhweza ingingo zofatwa, nk'ukongereza ibiringo vy'amasezerano, kubera amahiganwa yahagaritswe mu kiringo kitazwi biturutse ku kiza ca coronavirus. Ariko rero mu mategeko, abakinyi ntibashobora gusinyishwa amasezerano ku nguvu, ivyo bigashobora gutuma hari imirwi itakaza abakinyi babo bakomeye imbere y'uko ihiganwa rirangira. Ni naco gituma habaye ivyiyumviro vyinshi aho abatari bake bashikirije ko, uko bizoba bimeze kwose muri Premier League, iyo tariki ya 30/06 itegerezwa kuba ntarengwa. Ivyo bizotuma haboneka umuco kw'ihiganwa riza rya 2020/2021 rifatwa ko ariryo rizoba rikomeye gusumba iry'uyu mwaka, nk'uko abatari bake babibwiye BBC Sport. Gushinga igenekerezo ntarengwa ry'iryo higanwa birimwo ibibazo vyinshi, cane cane bishingiye ku kungene imirwi iduzwa mu gice ca mbere, hamwe n'iyimanurwa mu gice ca kabiri. Hari n'abandi babona ko icoba ciza ari uko boduza imirwi ya Leeds na  West Brom iri imbere mu gice ca kabiri, gutyo Premier League ikazoba igizwe n'imirwi 22, ariko ngo ivyo navyo vyozana izindi ngorane. Ivyo nivyo bibazo bizokwigwa n'abarongoye ihiganwa rya Premier League muri iyo nama itegekanijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu. Hagati aho, nta nyishu ntabanduka yitezwe kuko ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya,UEFA, ryasabiye abajejwe amahiganwa mu mirwi y'ibihugu vya Bulaya ko bohabwa umwanya ukwiye kugira ngo bazoshikirize aho bahagaze kubijanye n'ingene borangiza amahiganwa yabo i Bulaya, ivyo navyo bikaba vyitezwe hagati mu kwa gatanu. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umukuru w'umuri Sheffield United, Chris Wilder, abona ko ata tariki ntarengwa y'ihiganwa izohava ishingwa. Mu kiganiro Today ca Radio 4 yegukira BBC, yavuze ati: "Ndazi neza ko tuzokwitunganya dufatiye ku bihe turimwo. Ndazi ko, ku neza y'iri higanwa nyamukuru ry'u Bwongereza be n'ayandi mahiganwa makuru makuru ya Bulaya, bose bazokwipfuza ko amahiganwa arangira neza". "Ndizera ko bizokunda ko twitunganya ukundi mu  mahiganwa y'umwaka uza, dufatiye ku bihe vy'amahiganwa mpuzamakungu, be n'uko inkino zimwe zimwe zishobora gushirwa hagati mu ndwi". "Turashobora gutegura tukarangiza ihiganwa neza, vyose bivana n'integuro be n'ingene twitunganije". "Ariko nk'uko n'abandi bose babivuga, kandi ndabihagararako, aho ni mu gihe ibihe vyoba vyorohereza bose. Kandi dutegerezwa kugendera ku vyo leta idusaba".

column2: Iragi rya Bob Marley ryatewe iteka n’umwuzukuru wiwe mu giteramo i Birmingham
column3: Ibiserukuru bitatu vy’umuryango wa Bob Marley baza kuba bari mu giteramo co kuri uno wa kabiri mu gisagara ca Birmingham mu Bwongereza -  imyaka 50 inyuma y’igiteramo ca mbere uyu muririmvyi yagiriye muri ico gisagara. Umwuzukuru wiwe Skip Marley araza kuririmba muri kino giteramo kiza kuba gihagarariwe n’uwari umugore akongera akanafasha kuririmba uyu yahoze ari umunyamuziki rurangiranwa, Rita, ari kumwe n’umukobwa wiwe Cedella. Iki giteramo kiza kuba kigizwe n’indirimbo ziwe zisubirwamwo mu murwi w’abaririmvyi  Chineke! Orchestra  baza kuba bari kumwe na Skip n’abandi. Trevor Nelson niwe aremesha iki giteramo – kizocishwa kuri BBC hanyuma. Iki giteramo kiri mu bikorwa bitegekanijwe na BBC vyo guhimbaza imyaka 60 igihugu ca Jamaica  - ari co gihugu ciwe c’amavukiro - kimaze cikukiye, hamwe kandi no mu birori vyo gutanguza inkino za Commonwealth 2022 zitegekanijwe kubera i Birmingham. Skip Marley ati: "Nditeguye kuririmbana na Chineke! Mu gutera iteka umuziki wa Sokuru. “Kuririmba mu giteramo co mu Bwongereza aho umuziki wa sokuru usanzwe ukundwa cane rwose biza kuba ari ibintu bidasanzwe”. Skip Marley ni umunyamuziki w’imyaka 26 yavukiye muri Jamaica, nyina wiwe ni Cedella Marley umunyamuziki akomeye kandi yatsindiye  udushimwe dutatu twa Grammys awards akaba ari umukobwa wa Bob Marley. Haraciye imyaka 41 Bob Marley asandavye yishwe na kansei i Miami muri Reta Zujnze Ubumwe za Amerika, ku myaka 36.

column2: East Africa: Miriyoni 28 bashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikabije - Oxfam
column3: Abantu bashika miriyoni 28 muri Afrika y'ubuseruko barashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikomeye cane kubera iduga ry'ibiciro bitumwe n'intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe n'ikena ry'imvura muri uku kwezi kwa gatatu, nk'uko ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza Oxfam rigabisha. Kenya, Somalia na Ethiopia vyugarijwe n'ikena ry'imvura rya mbere rikaze mu myaka 40, aho ni mu gihe Sudan y'Epfo yo ihanzwe n'imyuzure, nk'uko Oxfam ibandanya ivuga. Iryo shirahamwe ryerekana kandi ico ryita ugusamazwa kw'amakungu n'ingwano yo muri Ukraine, ituma hatitabwaho ikibazo c'ikena  ry'ivyo kurya mu karere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko. Itangazo rigenewe ibinyamakuru rivuga ko utwigoro mpuzamakungu two guhangana n'ico kibazo dufise uburyo budahagije na gato kuko ku miriyaridi 6 z'ama dorari ONU ikeneye mu 2022 kugira igarukire ku bari mu kaga muri Ethiopia,  Somalia na Sudan y'Epfo, 3% yonyene niyo amaze kuboneka. Madame Gabriela Bucher, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa mpuzamakungu wa Oxfam yagabishije avuga ati: "Ibice vya Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan y'Epfo n'ahandi vyimirije guhura n'akaga. N'aho imvura yogwa muri uku kwezi, kwivyukiranya bizoba nk'ibidashoboka kiretse hari igikozwe  ubu nyene." Abandanya ati: "Ingaruka z'ingwano yo muri Ukraine kw'ihererekanywa ry'indya kw'isi zizoshika mu bice vyose vy'isi, ariko abasanzwe bari bakenye n'abafise intege  nke nibo zizosesereza cane kuruta abandi kandi  vyihuse kuruta." Ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubuseruko bivana  90% y'ingano bikenera muri Ukraine n'Uburusiya, nk'uko itangazo ribandanya rivuga. "Kubera uruzuba,  indogobwa zacu zarapfuye, izo dusigaranye nazo ziragoyagoya ku buryo zidashobora gukwega intunduguru  z'imizigo", ivyo bivugwa na Ahmed Mohamud Omar, umurimyi  wo muri county ya Wajiir muri Kenya. "Nguma nibaza ico umuryango wanje uzorya, aho ico bazorya ejo kizova,  niba ejo nzoronka indobo canke ibido y'amazi."

column2: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
column3: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

column2: 'Igituririre ni cinshi muri Afrika y'Epfo' - Akanama ka Zondo
column3: Inyuma y'icegeranyo gishira ahagaragara ubusuma bw'ama miriyaridi y'amadolari mu kigega ca reta ya Afrika y'epfo ku ntwaro y'uwamubanjirije, prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yariyemeje ko "ivyo bitazosubira kuba ." Ariko abanye Afrika y'epfo ntibemera ko hari icigwa bakuyemwo. Barababajwe no kuba amahera yibwe yari gukoreshwa mu bisata vy'amagara y'abantu n'uburezi muri ico gihugu. Ayo matohoza akomeye ku giturire co ku ntwaro ya prezida Jacob Zuma yerekanye ingene nk'ibisata vyose vya reta vyanigiwe mu menshi, birononwa n'abategetsi ba ANC  (African National Congress), uri ku butegetsi kuva mu 1994 harangiye intwaro y'abazungu bari ku rushi. Iki cegeranyo cagiriza ahanini uwo mugambwe. Prezida Ramaphosa ubwiwe yabwiwe n'ako kanama karongowe n'umucamanza, ko atakoze ibikwiye mu gukumira ubwo busuma igihe yari icegera ca Zuma. Impapuro zirenga 5.000, akanama Zondo - kiswe izina ry'umucamanza wo mu rwego rwo hejuru akarongoye - karerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene ubutunzi bwa reta bwibwe. Kiranerekana ingene abagwizatunga bavukana bo mu muryango wa Gupta, bagerageje kugira uruhara mu ngingo za politike n'ubutunzi mu ntumbero yiswe  "kwigarurira reta". Zuma yirukanywe ku butegetsi mu 2018 yagirizwa igiturire caguma congerekana, hanyuma Ramaphosa aca afata ubutegetsi yiyemeje guhanagura ivyo vyose. Igice ca nyuma c'ico cegeranyo c'akanama ka Zondo cashikirijwe ku musi wa gatatu. Prezida akaba yavuze ko ivyo babonye ari "iceyi kuri demokrasi yacu kandi vyahonyanze uburenganzira bw'abanye Afrika y'Epfo bose." Ariko bimwe muvyo ico cegeranyo casozerereyeko ni gusigira ibibazo prezida ahari ubu ategerezwa kwishura vyerekeye impamvu vyabaye arorera. Ico cegeranyo kigira kiti: "Hari inkuru nyinshi zifise ifatiro zamenyekanye (...) zashobora kumutuma agira amatohoza akanafata n'ingingo kuri bimwe bivugwa bikomeye. "Nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, yari afise ububasha bwo kubikora." Mu ntango ayo matohoza yategerezwa kuba mu misi 180, ariko ukurengukisha abantu vyatwaye imisi 400 aho ivyabona 300 vyabajijwe. Ico gikorwa cose catwaye imyaka ine. Ivyemezo vyarerekanye ingene abategetsi ba ANC, harimwo abashikiranganji b'ubu n'abakera bagiye canke bafashije mu busuma  vyatumye igihugu gihomba amahera menshi. Muri ivyo harimwo kubuza gukora igisata kijejwe gutoza amakori mu gihugu, gupfukama mu nda ishirahamwe ry'indege South Africa Airways, kwiba amahera mu gisata kijejwe ingendo za gariyamoshi muri ico gihugu no mu kwivanga mu biraba ikinyamakuru ca reta, SABC. Igisata kijejwe iperereza na co nyene caragabanuwe inguvu mu kugena abakozi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru babujije ko haba amatohoza babisabwe na Zuma n'abandi bantu bifatwa ko bamwegereye.

column2: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
column3: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

column2: Burundi: Rusansuma y’abashomeri, bamwe barizeye akazi abandi bati ‘nta gishasha’
column3: Igikorwa catanguye ku wa gatandatu uheze co kwandika urwaruka rwahejeje amashure rudafise akazi kizobandanya kubera ubwinshi bwabo, ni mu gihe vyari vyitezwe ko kirangira kw'isaha zitandatu ejo ku wa mbere. Mu minsi itatu, leta y'u Burundi ivuga ko yashoboye kwandika abashika 245.000, ariko kandi ko gushika ejo ku wa mbere hari hakiri benshi bakirindiriye kwandikwa. Abandikwa bavuga ko babazwa vyinshi harimwo ibijanye n'amashure bize hamwe impamyabushobozi bafise, igihe bayizonkeye, n'ibindi. Ntaco babwirwa uretse ko ari rusansuma rw'abashomeri bariko barakora. Bamwe bavuga ko ibi nyene vyabaye no mu myaka myinshi bandikwa buri mwaka, bakabona ko ata gishasha, ariko ubu bamwe barizigiye ko leta ishobora kubafasha. Igihe arahiza abashikiranganji ba leta yiwe, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yatangaje ko yiyemeje gushigikira urwaruka "cane cane bamwe bafise impapuro z'umutsindo ariko batararonka ico bakora". Umwe mu bavuganye na BBC, hampande y'amashure n'impamyabushozobi, avuga ko yabajijwe ubwoko bw'akazi yipfuza canke umutahe abona yoshobora gukoresha mu gihe yoba afise umugambi wo kurangura. Mu gihe abiyandikisha ari abahejeje amashure bakirondera akazi nk'uko binavugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, uyu mushomeri avuga ko ataco babwirwa kuri iki. Ati: "Nta wuzi ko bagomba kuduha akazi, canke imitahe, gushika ubu turarindiriye". Uwundi mukenyezi atipfuje kuvugwa amazina yavuganye na BBC, avuga ko ico babwiwe conyene ari uko hariko hakorwa rusansuma y'abashomeri. Ati: "Jewe sinibaza ko ari akazi bashaka kuduha, kuko ivy'akazi baheruka gukoresha ikibazo, abaronse bararonse. Ariko baratubwira ko bibaye ngombwa tuzoja hamwe hanyuma bakaduha imitahe tugakorera hamwe". Uyu afise icizere gito kuko ngo sibwo bwa mbere yandikwa kuva ahejeje amashure. Ati: "Nama mbona batwanditse bigaherera iyo, turamenyereye kwiyandikisha. "Kuva umwaka wa mbere mpejeje amashure mu 2014 nta mwaka urengana batatwanditse. Maze imyaka itandatu nguma nandikwa, ariko nta cahindutse". Hagati aho, aremeza ko iri yandikwa ry'ubu ritandukanye n'iryari risanzwe rihari afatiye kuvyo yabajijwe. Yongerako ati: "Mfise icizere ko nzohava nkaronka umutahe kuko muvyo bambajije barambajije umutahe noba nkeneye kugira nshobore kurangura umugambi wo kwiteza imbere". BBC yashatse kuronka insiguro kuri kino gikorwa kimaze iminsi ine co kwandika abahejeje amashure ariko batigeze baronka akazi, uruhande rwa leta ntaco rwashimye gutangaza bikiriko birakorwa. Hagati aho, mw'ijambo ryiwe arahiza leta nshasha Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko mu migambi yiwe itandatu yihutirwa harimwo kuzamura urwaruka, cane cane abahejeje amashure batararonka akazi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati:"Abo nibo cane cane nshaka ko bazoba intwazangabo zirongora abandi mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ubukene ku rwego rw'intango". "Aho bukera tugira dushware mu makomine yose agize Uburundi, tuje kwegeranya urwo rwaruka mu kibiri, batwereke imigambi bafise, bashaka gukora. "Aho tuzosanga batoye kworora tuzobafasha kworora, aho tuzosanga batoye uwundi mugambi, tuzowubafasha". Ikiriho ni uko biboneka ko abashomeri biyandikisha ari benshi cane mu gihugu, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ku munsi wa mbere gusa batanguye ico gikorwa handitswe abashika 45.000. Mu gihe gushika ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa mbere, abashika 245.000 ari bo bari bamaze kwandikwa mu gihugu cose, abandi barenga 35,000 bari baraye bategerejwe kwandikwa.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Saul, Locatelli, Haaland, Hudson-Odoi, Coman, Jesus, Ronaldo
column3: Nta gishasha ku bijanye n'ivya Saul Niguez vyo kuva muri Atletico Madrid akaja muri Barcelona, umuserukizi w'uyu mukinyi w'umunya Espagne w'imyaka 26 akaba ariko aravugana n'imirwi itari mike, harimwo Liverpool na Manchester United ashobora kwimukiramwo. (AS - in Spanish) Arsenal irashaka kuriha Sassuolo imiriyoni hafi 47 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika zisabwa ku mukinyi wo hagati, umutaliyano Manuel Locatelli w'imyaka 23. (Fabrizio Romano via Sun) Chelsea "ntirota irekura" mu rugamba rwo kurondera wa musatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20, n'aho bivugwa ko amahirwe ari make.  (Sky Germany - in German) Aba Blues kandi bemeye gutanga umwongereza akina ku ruhande Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 20 kuri Bayern Munich kugira ngo uyu murwi wo mu Budagi nawo ushobore kumuha umufaransa na we nyene akina ku ruhande Kingsley Coman w'imyaka 25. (L'Equipe - in French) Arsenal yinjiye mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Norwich umwongereza Max Aarons w'imyaka 21- asanzwe kandi arabwa ryiza na Bayern Munich - aba Gunners bakaba barondera uwushobora gusubirira umunya Espagne Hector Bellerin w'imyaka 26. (Express) Everton iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umwongereza akina ku ruhande Andros Townsend w'imyaka 30 asanzwe afise uburenganzira bwo kwigira mu murwi uwo ari wo wose ata gisabwe inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Crystal Palace. Aho rero agashobora kuba umukinyi wa mbere aguzwe n'umumenyereza Rafael Benitez w'aba Toffees. Uyu murwi kandi uriko urarondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Bayer Leverkusen umwongereza Demarai Gray w'imyaka 25. (Mirror) Everton kandi ni umwe mu mirwi ibiri, iri kumwe n'umukeba wayo wa Premier League  West Ham, imaze kwegera Barcelona kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umufaransa Clement Lenglet w'imyaka 26.  (AS - in Spanish) Juventus itegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 59 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umusatirizi wa Brésil Gabriel Jesus akina muri Manchester City. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 24 asanzwe asigaje imyaka ibiri mu masezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe ari mu baronderwa cane n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A.  (Calciomercato - in Italian) Juventus iriko kandi irarondera ingene yokwegera umurwi wo mu Bufaransa Paris St-Germain kugira ngo irabe ingene woyitiza umunya Argentina akina hagati Leandro Paredes w'imyaka 27 kugira ngo akine mu kibanza c'umunya Brésil Arthur Melo w'imyaka 24 yavunitse. (La Repubblica via Football Italia) Barcelona irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Lille umunya Portugal Renato Sanches nk'intizo, ariko kandi ikanashobora kumugura mu gihe yomugomwa. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 23 ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni 41 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, igiciro Barcelona idashobora kwemera. (AS - in Spanish) Barca ishobora kandi kwima ikibanza Philippe Coutinho mu murwi mukuru mu gihe yoyanirwa no kugurisha uyu mukinyi akina hagati wa Bresil muri rino ci. (AS - in Spanish) Brighton iripfuza umusatirizi wa Barcelona umunya Danemark  Martin Braithwaite w'imyaka  30, asanzwe kandi aronderwa na Wolves hamwe na West Ham. (Sport - in Spanish). Christiano Ronaldo yanditse kuri Instagram ati "umunsi w'icemezo" haciye umusi ikinyamakuru l'Equipe cari cavuze ko umunye-Argentine Mauro Icardi w'imyaka 28, ivyo kuva muri PSG aja muri Juventus bizovana n'uko Ronaldo w'imyaka 36, azoba avuye muri Juventus. (AS - in Spanish) Manchester United ni wo murwi Kieran Trippier yipfuza kwimukiramwo ariko Atletico Madrid iriko ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo igumane uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 30 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo. (AS - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer avuga ko umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28 muri kino gihe ari mu bakinyi bazokoreshwa, inyuma y'umwaka wose yari amaze akina muri West Ham kandi akaba yaravyifashemwo neza. (Manchester Evening News) Arsenal iriko irarondera kugurisha umusatirizi w'umufaransa striker Alexandre Lacazette w'imyaka 30, mu ntumbero yo kurondera amahera yo kugura abandi bakinyi muri rino ci.  (Mirror) Bayern Munich iripfuza kugurisha umufaransa akina hagati Corentin Tolisso ku miriyoni hafi 24 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 asanzwe kandi arabwa ryiza na Juventus hamwe na Napoli, ni mu gihe asigaranye umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi wa Bundesliga watsindiye iri higanwa. (L'Equipe via Get French Football News) Umufaransa akina ku ruhande Thomas Robert, umuhungu w'uwahoze akina ku ruhande muri Newcastle Laurent Robert, ariko yimenyereza mu murwi Burnley mu gihe uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yizeye ko ashobora kwinjira muri uyo murwi ku ruhande rw'abatarenza imyaka 23.  (Sun) Burnley iriteguye kuronka umunyegori w'umunya Pays de Galles/Wales Wayne Hennessey ataco irinze gutanga inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 34 aviriye muri Crystal Palace kubera amasezerano yari afitaniye nayo yari arangiye. (Mail) Newcastle United yemeye kugurisha umufaransa akina inyuma Florian Lejeune w'imyaka 30 kuri Alaves, akaba yari amaze umwaka wose akina muri uyu murwi wa Espagne aho yari yaratijijwe. (Chronicle)

column2: Cynthia Ishimwe: Umurundikazi  wa mbere  w'umuhagarikizi wa Beach Soccer  muri Afrika
column3: Cynthia Ishimwe ni we mugore wa mbere muri Afrika w'umuhagarikizi muri Beach Soccer, umupira w'amaguru ukinirwa ku musenyi. Ari mu bahagarikizi bitavye ihiganwa rya Afrika CAF ririko rirabera muri Mozambique. U﻿wo murundikazi ni na we abaye umugore wa mbere ahagarikiye inkino nk'izo muri Afrika. U﻿mviriza ikiganiro Cynthia Ishimwe yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango. Avugana na Florentine Kwizera

column2: Ivyo tuzi gushika ubu kw'igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu wa Haiti
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Haiti Jovenel Moïse yagandaguwe n'abicanyi bateye ku muhana iwe ku mugwa mukuru , Port-au-Prince, ku wa 07 z'uku kw'indwi. Ng'ibi ibizwi gushika ubu. Akarwi k'abantu bitwaje inkoho karateye ku muhana wa Perezida Moïse uri muri karitiye Pelerin, hari isaha indwi z'ijoro mu masaha yo muri ico gihugu, aho hakaba hari isaha imwe mu gatondo mu masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda, ku wa gatatu 07 z'uku kw'indwi. Barashe uyu mukuru w'igihugu amasasu 12 yose. Perezida Moïse basanze agaramye hasi, ishati yiwe yuzuye amaraso, ijisho ryiwe ry'ibubamfu barinokoye, nk'uko bivugwa n'umucamanza.  Yari afise ibikomere vy'amasasu mu ruhanga, n'ayandi menshi yarashwe mu gikiriza no mu nda. Yapfiriye aho nyene. Umutambukanyi wiwe, Martine Moïse, na we nyene yararashwe ariko ntiyacikana. Yaciye anyarukanwa n'indege kuvurirwa muri Florida, muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kandi amakuru avuga ko yoba ameze neza. Umukobwa wabo mukuru, Jomarlie Moïse, yinyegeje munsi y'igitanda ca musazawe kandi ntaco yabaye. We na basazawe babiri bari "ahantu bacungerewe umutekano" nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Ireresi itaremezwa neza n'uruhande rwigenga ariko ivugwa ko yafashwe igihe abo bicanyi binjira muri uwo muhana, yerekana umurwi w'abantu bafise inkoho bashika bari mu mamodoka yera yo mu bwoko bwa  SUV . Hari umugabo aboneka ko yategetswe kuryama hasi yubitse inda, mu gihe hari uwundi nawe yumvikana avuga cane mu congereza akoresheje ivyuma vyongereza amajwi ati "Ni igikorwa ca DEA [US Drug Enforcement Administration}, mwese hasi!" DEA [US Drug Enforcement Administration} rero ni igisata ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya ibiyayuramutwe. Uwuserukira Haiti muri Amerika, Bocchit Edmond, avuga ko n'aho abateye bari bambaye impuzu z'abajejwe kurwanya ibiyayuramutwe ba Amerika, yemera ko ata kuntu boba koko ari abanyamerika. Abategetsi bavuga ko ikibanza kiri hagati ya bariyeri y'inzu yiwe cari cuzuye ibirombora vy'amasasu, ivyerekana ko hari amasasu menshi cane yarashwe, Abo bakoze ico gitero baraboshe babiri mu bakozi bo mu nzu, mu gihe babandanya bavuza induru bavuga ngo "DEA operation" (igikorwa ca DEA). Barasahuye ibiro vya Perezida Moïse baca biba n'igitabo ca banki (carnet de chèques) carimwo amazina yiwe n'umugore wiwe, banatwara kandi imashini z'ububiko nyabwonko (serveurs) zarimwo amasanamu ya kamera zikoreshwa mu gucungera urugo (camera de surveillance). Abategetsi babiri b'igisata kijejwe gucungera umutekano wa Perezida Moïse bariko barakorwako amatohoza, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko bumvirizwa na sentare ku magenekerezo ya 13 na 14 z'uku kw'indwi. Gushika ubu, hari amakuru make cane ku vyerekeye amasaha yakurikiye ico gitero. Umukuru w'igiporisi ca Haiti yatangaje haciye amasaha 24  Moïse agandaguwe ko hari ukurasana gukomeye muri karitiye Pelerin . Léon Charles ati: "Twarazibiye [abakoze iki gitero]  bariko barasubira inyuma bahejeje gukora iri shano. Kuva ico gihe, turacarasana nabo". Uyu mukuru w'igiporisi avuga kandi ko bashoboye kurokora abaporisi batatu bari bafashwe mpiri n'abagirizwa gukora iki gitero. Mu ntango yavuze ko bane muri abo bicanyi bishwe muri uko kurasana, ariko ico gitigiri caragabanijwe gushika kuri batatu. Hari amakuru yavuze ko 11 mu bikekwa ko ari bo bakoze ico gitero bahungiye mu rupangu rw'ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa i Port-au-Prince. Abategetsi ba Taiwan bavuga ko igiporisi ca Haiti cabamenyesheje ko abo bagirizwa ubu bwicanyi bari binyegeje muri urwo rupangu ku wa 08 z'uku kw'indwi, inyuma y'amasaha 24 bakoze ico gitero. Taiwan yarahaye uburenganzira igiporisi kwinjira muri urwo rupangu maze gihagarika "ata ngorane" abo bantu bose 11 bikekwa bari binyegejeyo. Babiri muri abo bagirizwa ubu bwicanyi bari binyegeje mu kabande barafashwe n'abanyagihugu bariko barafasha abajejwe umutekano guhiga izo nkorabara. Ikiziga c'umwe mu bikekwa ko ari bo bakoze ico gitero cagiye gutorwa mu gisenge c'inzu, aho yari yinyegeje maze akavirirana gushika n'aho apfa. Abandi babiri muri bo basanze bapfiriye hafi y'umuhana wa Perezida  Moïse. None ni bande bakoze ico gitero? Igiporisi ca Haiti kivuga ko: Umukuru w'igiporisi Charles avuga ko 26 ari abanya Colombia, abandi babiri nabo bakaba ari Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti. Abo banyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti bamenyekanye ku mazina ya James Solages w'imyaka 35, na Joseph Vincent w'imyaka 55. Bompi barapfunzwe. Umucamanza ariko akora amatohoza avuga ko aba babiri babwiye abajejwe amatohoza ko bahawe akazi nk'abakarimani ku rubuga rwa internet. Aba babiri bavuga ko batari bazi ko hari integuro yo kwica umukuru w'igihugu, ariko bemera ko bari gukora nk'abakarimani igihe bafatwa. Indimi zivugwa muri Haiti ni igi Creole n'igifaransa, mu gihe aba bicanyi bo muri Colombia bobo bavuga iki Espanyole. Aba banya Colombia bahagaritswe, barerekanywe imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru aho abategetsi ba Haiti banerekanye ibitabo vyabo vy'inzira hamwe n'ibirwanisho bari babafatanye. Colombia yemeje ko n'imiburiburi batandatu muri abo bantu bayo bafashwe bahoze mu gisirikare c'igihugu. Aba banya Colombia babiri basanze bapfiriye hafi y'urugo rwa Perezida bamenyekanye ku mazina ya Mauricio Javier Romeo Medina na Duberney Capador Giraldo. Ikinyamakuru ca  Colombia El Tiempo kivuga ko bompi bahoze ari abasereja (sergeants), bafise imyaka 45 na 40. Abategetsi ba Haiti bavuga ko umwe mu bafashwe yavuze ko uyu murwi wari umaze "amezi atatu" muri Haiti, ariko amatohoza yakozwe na El Tiempo yerekana ko bamwe muri bo bari binjiye muri Haiti ku wa 06 z'ukwa gatandatu, bajabuka urubibe bavuye muri République Dominicaine/Dominican Republic ihana urubibe na Haiti. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ico kinyamakuru, bamaze imisi ibiri muri République Dominicaine, aho mbere banagendeye n'imiburiburi ikibanza kimwe c'iratiro. Amasanamu yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro zabo aberekana bariko bifotoreza ku cibutso c'umurondezi Christopher Columbus. Abategetsi ba Haiti baremeza neza ko aba bantu bahagaritswe ari abacangero kandi ko bari bahawe amafaranga ngo bice umukuru w'igihugu. Bavuga ko igikorwa nyamukuru ari ukumenya "abateguye" iri gandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu. Umushikiranganji wa mbere mfatakibanza Claude Joseph avuga ko Perezida Moïse aterekwa ''bamwe mu bashaka kurengera inzego mu gihugu, kandi turemeza ko ibintu nk'ibi bidashobora kubura ingaruka mbi". Gusa ntavuga vyinshi kuri ibi yikeka. Nta gukekeranya ko Perezida Moïse, yari asanzwe ashorera hanze ibitoke imbere y'uguhabwa ayo mabanga, yagize abansi benshi mu gihe yari umukuru w'igihugu. Abamunegura bamwagiriza gusesagura itunga ry'igihugu no gukoresha ututrwi tw'inkorabara mu gutera ubwoba abatavuga rumwe nawe, ivyo yagumye yiyamiriza. Mu 2018, harabaye imyiyerekano mu gihugu igihe ashakiye kuduza igiciro c'igitoro, mu ntango z'uno mwaka naho haraba impari zikomeye zishingiye ku kiringo c'ubutegetsi bwiwe zatumye abanyaporitike bakomeye bamusaba gutanga imihoho. Kubona ubutegetsi bwiwe bwari bushingiye ku mategeko wenyene yasohora (décrets) mu kiringo c'umwaka wose n'igice inyuma y'aho igihugu kinaniriwe no gutegura amatora y'abashingamateka yari ategekanijwe mu kw'icumi 2019, vyatumye yagirizwa ko yariko ategura intwaro y'igikenye. Umugambi wiwe wo gutegura amatora ya kamarampaka kw'ibwirizwashingiro wabandanije utera inzigo abo bamwagiriza ko yashaka kwongereza ububasha bw'umukuru w'igihugu. Ariko igihe mu kwa kabiri amenyeshereje ko hari umugambi wo kumwica no gutembagaza reta yiwe waburijwemwo, benshi baranse kuvyemera bavuga ko ari amayeri yo kurondera ingene ahendahenda abanya Haiti benshi bari bashavuye. Ariko gusa, n'aho Haiti yagiye ica mu bibazo vya poritike, umukuru w'igihugu yaheruka kwicwa ari ku butegetsi yihswe mu 1915, hari haciye imyaka irenga ijana.

column2: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
column3: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
column3: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

column2: Ibintu bitanu bisigura Messi avavanura na Barcelona
column3: Ivya Messi muri FC Barcelona birarangiye. Inyuma y'imyaka 21 muri uno murwi wo mu ntara ya Catalan, uyu musatirizi nta yandi masezerano agiye kuronka, n'aho impande zompi zari zamaze gushika ku masezerano y'intangamarara, hasigaye akanyuma gusa. Ariko hari akantu kabaye mu minota ya nyuma. Ico Barcelona yakoze conyene, kwabaye ukumenyesha ko ata masezerano mashasha "ashobora kuba kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mafaranga n'inzego". Ivuga iti: "Impande zompi zirababajwe n'uko ivyipfuzo vy'uyu mukinyi be n'umurwi bidashobora kuja mu ngiro". "Barça irakengurukiye n'umutima wayo wose uruhara rw'uyu mukinyi mu gukomeza uwu murwi, ikaba imwipfurije kuroranirwa mu buzima bwiwe bwite, ndetse no mu mwuga wiwe". Messi ntaco yashimye gushoka atangaza. Nk'uko amakuru aca mu kinyamakuru ca Catalan,  Mundo Deportivo, abivuga, "uyu musatirizi wa Argentina arababaye cane", ku buryo ata mugambi afise wo kugira ico abivuzeko. Ariko none, ni ibiki vyoba vyatumye iyi migenderanire, imwe mu yikomeye cane mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi muri kino gihe, itabandanya? Nta kintu Messi atatsindiye mu gihe cose amaze muri Barca: ibikombe cumi vyose vya La Liga, ibikombe bine vyose vya Champions League/Ligue des Champions (Ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya), ibikombe indwi vy'ihiganwa ryitiriwe umwami (Copa del Rey), ibikombe bitatu vya European Super Cup/ Supercoupe d'Europe (urukino ruhuza imirwi yatsindiye Champions League na Europa League), hamwe na bitatu vya Club World Cup (ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku migabane). Ku gatwe kiwe, avuye muri uwu murwi awutsindiye ibitsindo 672 vyose, bikiyongera ku mupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or ) yatahukanye incuro zitandatu zose. Messi, ubu afise imyaka 34, yaboneka ko yorangirije umwuga wiwe muri uwu murwi yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13. Ariko rero, Messi nta munezero yari agifise muri Barcelona. Mu mwaka uheze, yariyamirije uburongozi bw'uwu murwi, anamenyesha ko yipfuza kuwusezerera, mu kuvuga ati: "Haciye igihe ata nteguro ihari kandi nta kintu, babandanya bafyinata bapfukapfuka gusa". Ico gihe, mu kiganiro n'ikinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi, Goal, yavuze ati: "Umukuru w'umurwi [Josep María Bartomeu] yahora avuga ko ihiganwa rirangiye nshobora guhitamwo niba nshaka kugenda canke niba nshaka kubandanya, amaherezo yiwe ni uko ivyo yiyemeje ata na kimwe yakurikije". Kugira ngo yirinde impari mu butungane, uyu munya Argentina yahisemwo kwihangana mu bubabare hamwe no kwinumira kugira ngo ntahangane n'umurwi wamukujije. Igenda rya Josep María Bartomeu n'umuzo wa Joan Laporta ku burongozi bw'uwu murwi wa Catalan, vyahinduye imigambi ya Messi. Uyu mukinyi yari yishimiye imigambi ya Laporta yo kunagura uyu murwi. Mw'ihiganwa rirangiye, uwu murwi ntiwashoboye gushika ku ntego zawo zose: waratsindiye Copa del Rey, ariko warangije ihiganwa rya La Liga ari uwa gatatu, unatsindwa mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Spanish Super Cup (ruhuza umurwi watahukanye ihiganwa La Liga rya Espagne n'umurwi watsindiye igikombe ca Espagne), unatsindirwa mu gice ca kabiri ca Champions League. Ariko n'aho vyagenze uko, Messi na Laporta barumvikanye ko bogiriranira amasezerano agira 11 n'uyu mukinyi. Ariko ibibazo vy'amafaranga uwu murwi ufise vyaje kwica vyose. Nk'uko bimeze no mu yindi mirwi, FC Barcelona iri mu bibazo vy'amafaranga vyatewe n'ikiza karanda ca coronavirus, bituma ubutunzi bugabanuka. Messi yari yemeye kugabanirizwa umushahara yari asanzwe ahembwa gushika ku bice 50% - akaba yari asanzwe ahembwa hafi imiriyoni 165 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nk'uko ibinyamakuru vyandika amakuru y'inkino bibivuga - akabandanya akinira FC Barcelona gushika mu 2026. Haciye imisi yicandagishije, Messi yasubiye i Barcelona, aho ku wa kane yari yiteze gutera igikumu kuri aya masezerano mashasha. Ariko si ko vyagenze. Guha amasezerano mashasha Messi vyasigura ko Barça yategerezwa kwongereza amafaranga yo kuriha imishahara y'abakinyi, ivyari gutuma yisanga yarengeje urugero rw'amafaranga imirwi yemerewe gukoresha mw'igihangwa rya Espagne. Ibi navyo biva ku mafaranga yinjizwa, aya nayo akaba ari make kubera iki kiza karanda ca corona. Mu gihe mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2020-2021 yari yemerewe gukoresha amafaranga agera ku miriyoni 600 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu mwaka uza yemerewe kutarenza imiriyoni zababa 410. Hanyuma kandi, kugira ngo Messi ashobore gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha, vyari ngombwa ko haba abakinyi bagurishwa kugira ngo uwu murwi ushobore kuriha imishahara y'uyu kizigenza wa Argentina. Aha rero, mw'itangazo ryo ku wa kane, uwu murwi watangaje ko hari "inzitizi zishingiye ku butunzi n'inzego", wisunze "amategeko ngenderwako ya La Liga", aya nayo akaba ajanye n'urugero ntarengwa rw'imishahara. Aha, La Liga ntaco yashotse itangaza. Mu gihe bari bakiri mu biganiro, ku wa gatatu hatangajwe amasezerano hagati ya La Liga n'ikompanyi iguriha imitahe, CVC Capital Partners. Aya masezerano, ataremezwa n'inama nkuru y'uwu murwi gushika mu misi iri imbere, ashobora gushiramwo imiriyoni 3000 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu mupira w'amaguru muri Espagne, muri yo ibice 90% bikagabanganwa hagati y'imirwi. N'aho igice gito cane (15%) ari co gishobora gukoreshwa mu kuriha imishahara, uwu mutahe ushobora gufasha kwongereza urugero rw'umushahara. N'aho uwu mutahe utarangije ibibazo vy'imishahara uwu murwi ufise, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko bwari uburwo bwo gutorera inyishu ikibazo c'amasezerano ya Messi. Kuri FC Barcelona, iyo ntiyariyo nyishu, kuko ku wa kane yamenyesheje - haciye amasaha ivya Messi bishikirijwe - ko itemera aya masezerano. Barça yavuze ko idakwiye gutera igikumu kuri aya masezerano kubera impungenge zibonekeza mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru muri kino gihe. N'aho Messi yari yemeye umushahara yari guhabwa kugira ngo abandanye akinira FC Barcelona, hari ibindi bintu uwu murwi udashobora kumuha. Ibinyamakuru vyo muri Espagne vyemeza ko uyu munya Argentina yasavye ko bagura mugenziwe Cristian Romero, ariko uwu murwi ntiwashoboye gushika ku masezerano n'uyu mukinyi w'inyuma. Mu ndwi ziheze, warashoboye kugura  Sergio Kun Agüero na Memphis Depay, ariko Messi yabandanije avuga ko batari bahagije kugira ngo uwu murwi ushobore guhangana n'iyindi mirwi ikomeye. Laporta yari yatangaje ko ejo ku wa gatanu yari kubonana n'abanyamakuru kugira ngo asigure vyinshi ku bijanye n'itangazo yasohoye ryateje nyamugigima mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru. N'aho vyagenze uko vyagenze, umuhinga Andy West  abona ko ibi bishobora kuba bidasigura ko imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na FC Barcelona irangiriye aha. Uyu muhinga mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru muri Espagne yabwiye igisata ca BBC kijejwe inkino, BBC Sport, ati: "Mu vy'ukuri, n'aho ari ingingo ya nyuma, ishobora gutuma umurwi utakaza igihagararo mw'ihiganwa rya La Liga". "Impera n'imperuka turashobora gusubira kubona Lionel Messi mu mwambaro wa Barcelona". Kuva mu mwaka uheze igihe atangaza ko yipfuza gusezera uwu murwi, Manchester City na Paris Saint Germain, yompi ni yo mirwi yaboneka ko uyu musatirizi wa Argentina ashobora kwimukiramwo. N'aho imiryango yasubiye kwugururwa kuva iri tangazo rishizwe ahabona ku wa kane, Manchester City, ihejeje kwerekana uwundi musatirizi, Jack Grealish,  azoba yambaye inomero 10 mw'ihiganwa buca ritangura. Messi  avuga kandi ko yamye afise icipfuzo co kuba muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kugira ngo akine mw'ihiganwa ryo muri ico gihugu MLS Uko vyogenda kwose kuri kazoza kiwe, ikizwi ni uko ubu Messi ari umukinyi yedegemvya, inyuma y'aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na FC Barcelona arangiriye, hari ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu, 2021.

column2: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ibihugu vya Africa biriko biterwa igitsure ku kutagira aho bihagaze
column3: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw'ishirahamwe ONU avuga ko ibihugu vya Afrika bidashobora kubandanya vyerekana ko ataho bihagaze ku ntambara ya Ukraine. Avugana na BBC, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ko mu matora yo kwiyamiriza igitero ca Ukraine yabereye mu nama ya bose muri ONU iheruka, ibihugu 17 vyose vya Afrika vyanse kugira uruhande vyegamiye, nayo umunani bindi navyo bihitamwo kudatora. Thomas-Greenfield avuga ko ata rubuga rw'abatagira aho begamiye rushobora kubaho, mu gihe iyi atari intambara y'ukwikekana (Guerre froide/Cold War) hagati y'ibihugu vy'Uburengero n'Uburusiya. Umupfanosi Thomas-Greenfield avuga ko Amerika iriko irahiga ahandi ibihugu bisanzwe bigurira mu Burusiya bishobora kuguriramwo ivyo bisanzwe bivana hanze. Uyu aserukira Amerika muri ONU avuga kandi ko Amerika ishigikiye icipfuzo ca Afrika y'Epfo co guhuza Ukraine n'Uburusiya. Mu matora yabereye mu nama rusangi idasanzwe ya ONU yabaye ku wa 02 z'uku kwa gatatu, mu bihugu 193 bigize iri shirahamwe mpuzamakungu ibihugu 141 vyashigikiye iki cemezo, 35 biranka kugira uruhande vyegamira, bitanu biragihakana, mu gihe hari ibindi bitatoye. Uburundi bwashimye kutagira aho buhagaze, mu gihe Urwanda rwemeje iki cemezo. (tugomba kukivuga, ndibaza ko ari icyo gushyira mu kato Uburusiya no kwamagana iyi ntambara) Ibindi bihugu bitashatse kwerekana aho bihagaze ni Afrika y'Epfo, Algeria, Uganda, Senegal, Sudani, Sudani y'Epfo, Mali,  Mozambique, Namibia, Angola, Zimbabwe, Guinée équatoriale, Centrafrique, Madagascar, Tanzania na  Congo. Igihe atangaza ko Afrika y'Epfo yasabwe kugira uruhara muri iyo ntambara, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa yavuze ko igihugu ciwe canse kugira uruhande cegamiye kubera "iki cemezo kitashize imbere ivyokworohereza impande zompi", congera cagiriza Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kunanirwa mu mabanga yayo yo kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano. Uganda yoyo yavuze ko yirinze kugira uruhande yegamira kugira yubahirize kuba hagati na hagati kuko ariyo igiye kurongora ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu bidafise aho vyegamiye, rizwi nka Mouvement des non-alignés/Non-Aligned Movement, NAM, rihurikiyemwo ibihugu 120 bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere.
