column2: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
column3: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano. Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

column2: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
column3: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

column2: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
column3: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Athènes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Athènes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Athènes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

column2: Abakuru ba US na China bavuganye kuri terefone ubwa mbere mu mezi indwi
column3: Prezida w'Ubushinwa  Xi Jinping yavuganye na mugenziwe wa Amerika Joe Biden ku wa kane, bukaba ari bwo bwa mbere bavuganye kuri terefone mu mezi indwi. Itangazo ry'ibiro vy'umukuru wa Amerika, Maison Blanche/White House ryavuze ko bavuganye "vyinshi bijanye n'aho inyungu zabo zihurira". Bubabye ubwa kabiri gusa bavugana kuri terefone kuva prezida Biden ashitse ku butegetsi. Imigenderanire hagati y'Ubushinwa na Amerika imaze igihe irangwa  n'icuka kibi,   bitumwe n'imvo zirimwo kunyinyana ku bijanye n'urudandazwa, ukwabura n'ikiza ca  Covid. Itangazo rya Maison Blanche ryongeye riti: "Uko kuvugana, nk'uko prezida Biden yabisobanuye neza, kwari mu murongo w'utwigoro Amerika ibandanya tw'uko  Amerika n'Ubushinwa vyokwitwara neza mw'ihiganwa hagati yavyo". "Abo bategetsi babiri bavuganye inshingano za buri gihugu zo kwirinda ko ihiganwa hagati yavyo  ridahinduka rikavamwo intambara." Mu ntango  z'uyu mwaka, ibiganiro vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru hagati y'ubutegetsi bwa Biden n'Ubushinwa vyaranze no guterana amajambo hagati y'intumwa z'ivyo bihugu. Abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bari bagirije Amerika gukokeza ibihugu "gutera Ubushinwa", nayo Amerika ivuga ko Ubushinwa "bwaje kwiyerekana neza gusa". Ni ibiki Ubushinwa na Amerika batumvikanako? Ni vyinshi cane ugiye kubiraba. Hari ibibazo bitari bike bikomeye cane ivyo bihangange bibiri mu butunzi binyinyanirako - kimwe muri ivyo kikaba ari uburengenzira bwa zina muntu na demokrasi. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa gukora ihonyabwoko ku bwoko bw'aba Uighur mu ntara ya Xinjiang. Ivuga kandi ko reta y'Ubushinwa ihonyanga uburenganzira bwa demokrasi muri Hong Kong biturutse kw'itegeko rishasha ry'umutekano abarinegura bavuga ko rikoreshwa mu gucinyiza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Ubushinwa nabwo bumaze kubwira Amerika kenshi guhagarika kwivanga mu vyo buvuga ko ari ibiraba ico gihugu ubwaco, bukagiriza Amerika "gukengera" umugambwe w'aba Communiste. Hari n'ikibazo c'urudandazwa. Ivyo bihugu vyompi biri mu ntanbara y'urudandazwa yatanguye mu 2018 ku ntwaro ya prezida Donald Trump. Amerika yashinze  amafaranga arihwa ku bidandazwa  biva mu Bushinwa biciye miriyari 360 z'ama dorari , Ubushinwa nabwo buca bubikora ku bidandazwa biva muri Amerika biciye miriyariri 110 z'ama dorari. Joe Biden ntaco arahindura ku hari hahagaze uwo yasubiriye ku vyerekeye imigenderanire n'Ubushinwa mu bijanye n'urudandazwa, ivyo rero bikaba bibushavuza cane. Ariko na Afghanistan ishobora kuba iyindi mvo yo kutumvikana. Muri iyi ndwi, umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'Ubushinwa bujejwe imigenderanire Wang Wenbin yaneguye cane ukuvana  ingabo za Amerika muri Afghanistan avuga ko ari "ugusiga akajagari". Yagirije kandi Amerika kuba yetumye Abanya-Afghanistan "batakaza vyinhi cane".

column2: Covid: Vladimir Putin avuga ko 'incanco za Sputnik zizewe nka Kalashnikov
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin avuga ko urucanco rushasha rwahinguwe n'Uburusiya "rwizewe nka ya nkoho ya Kalashnikov". Aya majambo yayavuze nijoro ku wa kane mu nama yariko agirana n'icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere Tatyana Golikova ku buhinga bwa videwo. Ayavuze mu gihe abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu bemeje ejo ku wa kane ubundi bwoko bw'urucanco rwa Sputnik V rutangwa nka doze imwe gusa, rukaba rwahawe izina rya Sputnik Light. Perezida Putin yagereranije urwo rucanco n'iyi nkoho yahinguwe ku butegetsi bw'aba Soviyeti (Union Sovietique/ Soviet Union) yabaye rurangiranwa mbere ibandanya ikoreshwa cane gushika ubu. Yasubiyemwo amajambo yavuzwe n'umuganga wo muri Autriche/Austria mu ntango z'uno mwaka igihe yavuga ku nguvu z'uru rucanco. Urucanco rwa Sputnik V rukora co kimwe n'izindi ncanco zakozwe n'amakompanyi Oxford/AstraZeneca na Janssen/Johnson & Johnson. Abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Putin bari bafise amakenga ko abajejwe kugenzura imiti i Moscou bihuse kwemeza uru rucanco mu mwaka uheze, ariko igerageza ryakozwe mu nyuma ryerekanye ko rukingira Covid-19 ku rugero runini cane. Ubwoko bwa mbere bw'uru rucanco rutangwa incuro zibiri bumaze kwemezwa mu bihugu bitari bike kw'isi. Uru rucanco rushasha rwa Sputnik Light, ubwoko bwa Sputnik V umuntu aterwa rimwe gusa, rwemejwe mu Burusiya ejo ku wa kane. Mw'itangazo basohoye, abarukoze bavuga ko doze imwe gusa ikingira uwurutewe ku rugero rwa 79.4%, aho hari mw'isekeza ryo ucandaga riheruka mu gihugu. Iri tangazo rivuga riti: "Uru rucanco rutangwa kuri doze imwe gusa rwatumye abantu benshi bakingirwa mu mwanya muto, ivyatumye urugamba rwo kurwanya iki kiza igihe cariko kirarandagata rutera imbere". Iyi ngingo yo kwemeza uru rucanco ije mu gihe impari ari nyinshi kw'isi nimba amahinguriro y'incanco yokuraho inzitizi kugira ngo ibindi bihugu kw'isi bishobore guhingura izi ncanco kugira ngo zibe nyinshi.

column2: Coronavirus: Umuti wa Remdesivir wariko urageragezwa kuyivura warananiwe
column3: Igerageza rya mbere ry'umuti wari wizewe ko ushobora kuvura coronavirus rivugwa ko ataco ryatanze. Hari icizere c'uko umuti remdesivir wari gushobora kuvura Covid-19. Ariko igerageza ryabereye mu Bushinwa ryerekana ko uwo muti ataco washitseko, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icegeranyo caciye mu ryahumye umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko uwo muti utashoboye no gutanga ka mitende kubarwayi canke ngo ubure ugabanye n'umugera mu maraso. Ihinguriro ryo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ryakoze uwo muti,  Gilead Sciences, rivuga ko iryo geragezwa ryafashwe ukurati ko. Amakuru y'uko iryo gerageza ataco ryashitseko yagiye kumenyekana inyuma y'aho OMS yerekaniye ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwayo icegeranyo c'ivyavuye muri iryo gerageza, ariko mu nyuma ikaza kugikurako. OMS ibandanya ivuga ko habaye ukwihenda mu gushira ahabona ico cegeranyo. Ico cegeranyo cerekana ko iryo geragezwa ryakorewe ku barwayi 237, aho abashika 158 bahawe uwo muti kugira ngo barabe ko hari igihinduka bagereranije n'abandi 79 bobo bahawe iyindi yo gupfupfahaza. Inyuma y'ukwezi, ibice 13.9% vy'abarwaye bahawe uwo muti barapfuye, mu gihe ibice 12.8% vya bamwe bahabwa imiti yo gupfupfahaza aribo bapfuye. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "remdesivir nta kintu yamariye abawufashe, haba mu kubavura canke mu kugabanya ubukari". Gilead iriyamiriza ico cegeranyo ca OMS. Umwe mu bavugizi ba Gilead avuga ati: "Twibaza ko inkuru yatanzwe yarimwo ibintu bitari vyo ku vyerekeye iryo gerageza". Yongera ko y'uko iryo gerageza ryahagaritswe haciye akanya gato kubera atari benshi baryitabiriye, vyumvikana ko ibitigiri bitari bikwiye. Ati: "Ikiboneka ni uko iryo gerageza ritarangiye, kuko ibiharuro vyerekana ko remdisivir ishobora kugira akarusho, cane cane mu gihe abarwaye bivujije hakiri kare". Hagati aho, si ukuvuga ko ivy'uwo muti birangiriye aha, kuko ibikorwa vyo kuwugerageza bibandanya mu minsi iri imbere bikazoshobora kwerekana neza isanamu nyayo ku vyerekeye ikoreshwa ryawo.

column2: Covid-19: Ubushinwa buvuga ko urucanco rukiri mw'igeragezwa rwerekana ko rukora
column3: Abashakashatsi batangaza ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwakorewe mu Bushinwa rwerekana ko rukora neza mu gihe rukiri mw'igeragezwa. Hari incanco zitari nke ziriko zirageragezwa mu Bushinwa, mbere zimwe muri zo zikaba ziriko zirakoreshwa. Nk'uko aba bashakashatsi babivuga, urucanco Sinovac Biotech rwatanguye gukora mu mwanya muto mu gihe rwari ruhawe abantu bashika 700. Ibi bitangajwe inyuma y'aho izindi ncanco zahinguriwe i Bulaya no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zitangarijwe ko zikingira umuntu  inyuma y'aho zigeragerejwe ku murwi munini w'abantu. Incanco zitatu zahinguriwe muri Amerika, mu Budagi no mu Burusiya, ziramaze gutangazwa ko zikinga ku rugero ruri hejuru ya 90%, inyuma y'aho zigeragerejwe ku bantu baharurwa mu bihumbi mirongo. Nk'uko biri mu bindi bice vy'isi, Ubushinwa buri mu rugamba rwo guhingura urucanco rwa Covid, bukaba bugeze ku ncanco zine ziri mu gice ca nyuma c'igeragezwa, hakaba harimwo na rumwe rwahinguwe n'ikompanyi ihingura incanco Sinovac Biotech. Hagati aho, ivyavuye mu gice ca mbere n'ica kabiri c'igeragezwa rya rumwe gusa muri zino ncanco zine nivyo bimaze gutangazwa mu kinyamakuru c'ubuvuzi, The Lancet. Nk'uko biri muri iki cegeranyo , urucanco CoronaVac rwa Sinovac Biotech rutangura gukingira umuntu haciye akanya gato, n'aho ibi vyigwa vyakozwe mu kwa kane n'ukwa gatanu biterekana urugero rw'ubushobozi bwa runo rucanco. Zhu Fengcai, umwe mu banditse kino cegeranyo, avuga ko ivyavuye muri rino geragezwa ryakorewe ku bantu 144 mu gice ca mbere hamwe na 600 mu gice ca kabiri, vyerekana ko uru rucanco rushobora "gukoreshwa mu bihe bidasanzwe". Ivyavuye mu gice ca gatatu c'iri geragezwa ririko rirakorerwa ku murwi munini w'abantu ntibiratangura gutangazwa. Mu gihe Ubushinwa buvuga ko bwashoboye kurwanya iki kiza karanda mu gihugu cose, iki gice kigira gatatu c'igerageza ry'izi ncanco zine kiriko kibera mu bihugu vya Pakistani, Arabia Sawudite, Uburusiya, Indoneziya, hamwe na Brezili. Abategetsi bavuga ko abantu bashika 60.000 bari bamaze guhabwa urucanco gushika mu ntango z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe. Mu ndwi iheze, ibikorwa vyo kugerageza urucanco rwa Sinovac Biotech muri Brezili vyarahagaritswe umwanya muto, ariko bikaba vyaciye bibandanya bimaze kuboneka ko urupfu rw'umwe mu bakorerabushake bariko bararugeragerezwako  ata sano rufitaniye n'uru rucanco. Incanco zishika zitatu nizo zihabwa abakozi nyamukuru mu mugambi udasanzwe wo kurwanya iki kiza, mu gihe urundi rwemejwe gukoreshwa mu gisirikare mu kwa gatandatu. Kuva mu minsi mike iheze, hari amakuru ava mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi avuga ibijanye n'incanco zifise ubushobozi bwo gukingira umuntu. Ubwa mbere, hari urucanco rwahinguwe n'amakompanyi abiri Pfizer na BioNtech yo mu Budagi na Amerika ruvugwa ko rukora ku bice birenga 90% inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku bantu barenga 43.000. Inyuma y'aho, ikompanyi yo muri Amerika Moderna yatangaje ko urucanco rwayo rukora ku rugero rungana hafi ibice 95%, inyuma y'aho narwo nyene rugeragerejwe ku murwi munini w'abantu. Kuri izi zompi, ibi ni ibiharuro vy'intangamarara kandi nta na rumwe ruremezwa. Mu nyuma, Uburusiya bwatangaje ko urucanco rwabwo rukora ku rugero rwa 92% inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku bantu 16.000 gusa, ni mu gihe  rwari rwamaze kwemezwa ko rushobora gukoreshwa mu bihe bidasanzwe mu kwa munani. Abashakashatsi bariko bariga izi ncanco zose zitatu baramaze gutangaza ivyo batoye mw'igerageza ryo ku rwego rwo hejuru gusumba Ubushinwa. Hagati aho, Sinovac Biotech nayo iriko irakora igerageza nk'iri nyene, ariko n'aho ataco iratangaza ku bijanye na ryo, si ukuvuga ko aba bashakashatsi bandi hari ico bayisumbije. Ubu ikiriho, ni ukumenya urucanco ruzotangura gukoreshwa ku mugaragaro. Ukwemeza no guhingura uru rucanco ku rugero runini nico gikorwa nyamukuru kizokurikra, abahinga bakagabisha ko abantu batokwitega amasekeza akomeye yo gucandaga imbere y'umwaka uza.

column2: China: Umufotozi yasavye imbabazi kubera ifoto ya Dior y''amaso mato'
column3: Umufotozi w'Umushinwakazi  akorana n'abanyamideri yasavye imbabazi kubera ''kutamenya" inyuma y'aho ifoto yafashe igakoreshwa na kompanyi y'imideri yo mu Bufaransa Dior yiyamirijwe n'abatari bake. Ifoto ya Chen Man yerekanye umugore bamwe mu Bashinwa bakoresha internet cane (netzens) bavuga ko ikomeza kubandanya yerekana ingene Abanyaburaya bishizemwo ingene Abanya-Asia basa. Madame Chen w'imyakab 41, yahavuye yandika ku rubuga-hwaniro rwa Weibo ati: "Ndiyagiriza jewe nyene kuba nkiri ikitazi [mu bikorwa maze gukora]." Dior yavuze ko iyo foto iherutse gukoreshwa mw'ihayanishwa i Shanghai, kuva ico gihe yaciye ivanwako. Iyo kompanyi y'ivyambarwa bigezweho yanditse kuri konte yayo ya Weibo ku wa gatatu ku mugoroba iti: "Dior, nk'uko yama, irubaha ingene Abashinwa biyumva... bishitse hakaba ukwihenda, [Dior] itegerezwa kwuguruka ikakira ivyo abantu bavuga hanyuma igakosora mu mwanya mwiza", yongerako iti "iyo foto ntiyari iyo gukoresha mu kwamamaza". Iyo foto yatanguye kuja ahabona ku wa 12 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa  11),  ariko buno nyene ica iriyamirizwa na bamwe mu bakoresha internet cane - hamwe n'ibinyamakuru vy'aho mu Bushinwa. Urukoba rwera n'amaso manini nivyo ku bisanzwe bifatwa nk'ibimenyetso vy'ubwiza mu Bushinwa - akenshi mu kwamamaza hakaba hakunze gukoreshwa imideri iriko ivyo bimenyetso. Mu kwerekana igihushaneb, kimwe mu binyamakuru vyo mu Bushinwa, Beijing  Daily, mu nkuru y'ibanze canditse ko iyo foto ya Dior yerekana "isura yijiriwe" kandi y''amaso y'ikibi". Iyo nkuru y'ibanze yavuze iti: "Haheze imyaka myinshi abagore b'Abanya-Asia bama berekanwa bafise amaso mato  n'ikibibi (freckles) nk'uko Abanyaburaya bavyishizemwo". "Umufotozi yerekanye uko Abanyaburaya babibona." Abashinwa bakoresha imbuga hwaniro baciye bafatira ngaho,  bavuga ko amafoto ya Madame Chen ari "igitutsi" c'ingene Abanyaburaya bibaza ko abagore b'Abashinwakazi basa. Umwe mu bakoresha Weibo yavuze ati: "Uko niko Abanyaburaya bibaza ko dusa, bongerako ko Chen Man yakagoboreyemwo. Benshi bongeyeko ko batazogura ibihingurwa n'iyo kompanyi igurisha ivyo abifise. Bamwe mu Bashinwa bakoresha imbuga hwaniro bavuze ko iyo foto ya Madame Chen yibutsa urukurikirane rw'amafoto yiwe yo mu 2012, yari yafatiye i-D Magazine. Ariko si bose bavyumva uko. Bamwe barashigikiye Madame Chen, aho umwe mu bakoresha Weibo yavuze ati: "Kuki umugore w'Umushinwakazi w'amaso mato adashobra gufatwa ko ari mwiza? Je nta  ngorane n'imwe  ndabibonamwo." Mw'itangazo ryiwe ku wa gatatu, Madame Chen yavuze ko "yavyiyumviriye cane" akumva ko ategerezwa gusaba imbabazi amaze kwihweza buri "kintu cose kibi " cavuzwe ku gikorwa ciwe. Avuga ati: "Navukiye kandi nkurira mu Bushinwa. Ndakunda cane igihugu canje . Nk'umuhanzi, ndazi neza ico njejwe mu kurondera kumenya neza imico y'Ubushinwa kugira ngaragaze ubwiza bw'Ubushinwa mu vyo nkora." "Ubu ngiye kuzokwiga neza kahise k'Ubushinwa, nitabe ibiteramo bishobora kumfasha kuruta, hanyuma nteze imbere ivyiyumviro nsanzwe ngenderako...Nzokwihatira kuvuga Ubushinwa ndabicishije mu vyo nkora." Madame Chen n'umufotozi azwi cane mu gisata c'imideri mu Bushinwa. Amaze gufata amafoto menshi yakoreshejwe mu binyamakuru vy'imideri bizwi cane, yarafotoye na ba rurangiranwa nka David Beckham na Fan Bin Bing. (Uko isekeza ry'ubwiza bw'abiraburekazi hagiyemwo politikek

column2: Uganda: Uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican yahagaritswe yagirijwe kurenga ibigo
column3: Ishengero rya Anglican muri Uganda ryahagaritse uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru Stanley Ntagali, mu mabanga yo gusoma misa no guserukira iryo shengero gushika ingingo ihindutse, yagirizwa kurenga ibigo. Ntagali yatanze imihoho mu mabanga mu kwa gatatu kw'umwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 43 yari amaze ari umupasitori. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa 13 z'uku kwa mbere ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'ishengero rya Anglican, uwamusubiriye, Dr. Stephen Samuel Kaziimba, yavuze ko Ntagali yarenze ibigo aryamana n'umugore afise umugabo, kandi na we nyene akaba yaravyiyemereye. Dr Kaziimba ati: "Yarahemukiye ibiro vy'abepiskopi, arenga indahiro yiwe yo kwimikwa, hamwe n'ivyo yari yiyemeje mu nyifato yiwe." Dr Kaziimba avuga ko ishengero rya Uganda ryiyemeje gukorera mu muco no kwitwararika abo bose bagizweko ingaruka n'ivyabaye, asaba ko abagore bompi bosengerwa, abihana bakihana, abakizwa bagakizwa. Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri Amerika ya Ruguru, Foley Beach, na we nyene yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko ababajwe n'ivyabaye. Ati: "Stanley ni mwenewacu muri Kristo, kandi ndashima ingene twakoranye mu myaka iheze. Birambabaje cane kwumva ko yatirimutse kw'ibanga". "Ndasaba Imana ko Stanley yobandanya n'inzira yo kwihana, yongere ihe ukwihangana abo bose bakozweko n'icaha ciwe". Uyu yahoze ari umwepiskopi mukuru ntiyabonetse kugira ngo ashobore kugira ico abivugako. Ariko abanya Uganda bazokwama bamwibukira ku majambo yavuze ku vyo yafata nk'ubutabanga mu gihugu. Mu 2019, yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ariko ahanura abantu ko "bokwigumya mu vyipfuzo vyabo mu bijanye n'uguhuza ibitsina". Ishengero Anglican muri Uganda rifise abanywanyi bashika imiriyoni 13.

column2: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
column3: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

column2: Covid-19: Africa irasaba UN gutegura inama yo kwiga ingene incanco zotangwa ata bugunge
column3: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Afrika CDC gisaba ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU gutumako inama idasanzwe kugira ngo higwe ingene incanco za Covid-19 zitangwa ata kugunga ibindi bihugu. Umukuru w'iki kigo, Muganga John Nkegasong, avuga ko bafise amakenga ku kungene ibihugu bitunze biriko birakorana n'amahinguriro akora imiti kugira ngo bibe ari vyo vyironkera izi ncanco. Ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza rivuga ko, mu gihe iki kibazo kitokwigwa vuga bwango, ibihugu bikenye  vyokwisanga igice kimwe kw'icumi c'abanyagihugu bavyo ari bo bonyene bashoboye gukingirwa. Mu gihe abajejwe ubuvuzi muri Canada n'Ubwongereza bamaze kwemeza urucanco rwa Pfizer/BioNtech, abahinga mu vyo ubuvuzi babona ko ibi bihugu bitunze biriko vyigungirako incanco. Iri huriro ry'amashirahamwe, ribona ko vyovyo gushika mu mpera za 2021 bizoba vyamaze gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo bose. Muganga Nkegasong avuga ko bizoba bibabaje cane mu gihe ibi bihugu bitunze bizoba vyitekaniye Afrika nayo iriko iratarataza irondera incanco. Bitegekanijwe ko uyu mugabane ushobora kuronswa incanco zigera ku miriyoni 220 z'incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu wiswe  COVAX. Izi ncanco zizotegerezwa gusaranganywa mu bihugu 55 vyose. Hagati aho, hari ababona ko izi zidahagije. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika vyatanguye kwegera aya mahinguriro y'imiti vyo nyene ubwavyo, co kimwe n'ibifise ubucuti bwa hafi n'aya mahinguriro, kugira ngo bishobore kuronswa izo ncanco. Ariko ikigo CDC ca Afrika kibona ko vyoba vyiza ibihugu vyose vya Afrika bigeye hamwe maze bigashobora kwegera aya mahinguriro ari ikintu kimwe, hako buri gihugu kigenda ukwaco. Aya makenga ku kungene izi ncanco ziriko ziratangwa ashizwe ahabona mu gihe ubwandu bw'iki kiza karanda bwiyongereye ku bice 7.8 kw'ijana mu karere ka Afrika yo musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara mu minsi indwi iheze. Gushika ubu, abarenga imiriyoni 2.3 ku mugabane wose wa Afrika nibo bamaze kwandura Covid-19.

column2: Lil Uzi Vert: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika yihomye mu gahanga diyama ya miliyoni 24 $
column3: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika Lil Uzi Vert yavuzweko vyinshi ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi inyuma yo gukoresha amadolari imiliyoni 24 mu kugura ubutare bupima kara 11 yahomye kuruhanga rwiwe. Inkuru zitangwa na BBC igisata ca Pidgin, zivuga ko yaguze ubwo butare mu nzu y'ubudandarizo ya Elliot Eliante ku madolari imiliyoni 24. Lil Uzi Vert yatumye haba amajambo menshi y'abakunzi biwe kw'isi yose igihe yerekana video y'ingene ubu asa, agaca anandika ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ya Instagram ngo " Ubwiza burababaza" (Beauty is Pain). Izina nyaryo rya Lil Uzi Vert ni Symere Bysil Woods, umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika w'umudiho wa Rap, akaba n'umwanditsi w'indirimbo. Yavutse itariki 31 mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 1994 mu buraruko bwa Philadelphia i Francisville muri Amerika. Ikintu gituma uwo muririmvyi atandukana n'abandi, n'ibicapo afise ku mubiri (Tatoo), n'ingene yagiye aritobora mu maso, ingene agenda ahindura uko yisokoza n'inyambaro ya kera. Lil Uzi yamenyekanye cane inyuma yo gushira ahabona ururirimbo rwiwe rwa Luv is Rage mu mwaka wa 2015. Izindi ndirimbo zatumye aba rurangiranwa ni nk'ururirimbo rwiwe  Money Longer yaririmvye mu 2016, You was Right, Gucci Mane, Bad na Bouje iza mu kibanza ca 100 kuri Billboard muri Amerika hamwe na Tour Life rwatumye ahabwa agashimwe ka MTV k'ururirimbo rwa mbere mu gihe c'ubushuhe. Bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yoba afise ubutunzi bushika ku miliyoni 16 z'amadolari, ariko ko hagati y'umwaka wa 2017 na 2018 yoba yararonse imiliyoni 20 avuye mu ndirimbo aririmbira ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi hamwe n'ibiteramo vyiwe.

column2: Ebola - Uganda: uturere tubiri turataramuwe mu kiringo c’indwi zitatu
column3: N﻿a Elsa Maishman BBC News Reta ya Uganda yatangaje ingingo zo kwugara uturere tubiri tubangamiwe n’ikiza karanda ca Ebola, mu gihe ico gihugu kiriko gikora uko gishoboye kugira gituze iki kiza. Ububare, amazu y’ubutambiro y’ijoro, ibibanza vyo gusengeramwo be n’ivyo kwinezereza vyugawe i Mubende na Kassanda bihana urubibe, kandi hashizweho n’amategeko yo kutava muhira(couvre-feu/curfew). Iyi ngingo ni ukwisubirako ku mukuru w’igihugu ca Uganda yari aherutse kuvuga ko ingingo nk’izi zidakenewe. Iki giza kimaze guhitana ubuzima bw’abantu 19 muri 58 bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye. Gusa, igitigiri nyezina c’abanduye n’abamaze gupfa gishobora kuba kirenga aho. Iki kiza catanguye mu ntango z’ukw’icenda i Mubende akarere kari ku birometero vyababa 80 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Kampala, kandi kabandanya ari ikiririmbiro ryaco. Imbere y’aha, Perezida Museveni yari yiyamirije ivyo gutaramura, avuga ko Ebola atari umugera uca mu muyaga, ko rero idasaba ingingo nk’iza Covid-19. Ariko nijoro ku wa gatandatu yahagaritse uruja n’uruza rwose mu turere twa Mubende na Kassanda mu kiringo c’imisi 21. Avuga ariko ko amakamyo atwara ibintu azobandanya yinjira asohoka muri utwo turere, ariko ko ibindi bikorwa vyose vyo kwunguruza abantu bizotegerezwa guhagarara. Muri iryo jambo yacishije ku mboneshakure, yavuze ati: "Izi ni ingingo z’igihe gito kugira ngo duhagarike ikwirakwira rya Ebola. "Dutegerezwa gukorana n’abategetsi kugira ngo duhagarike iki kiza mu gihe gito gishoboka”. Perezida Museveni yari yamaze gutegeka igipolisi guhagarika umuntu uwo ari we wese yiketsweko uwu mugera ariko akanka kwitaramura. Yabujije kandi na ba rumenyi/abapfumu kudahirahira ngo barondere kuvura abanduye uwu mugera. Mu biza vy’imbere y’aha, ba rumenyi bagiye bagirizwa ko bari mu batuma umugera ukwirakwira. Umuntu wa mbere yishwe n’iki kiza ni umugabo w’imyaka 24 w’i Mubende. Abantu batandatu bo mu muryango wiwe nabo nyene barapfuye. Cahavuye gishika no ku mugwa mukuru Kampala, aho umwe aherutse gupfa muri kuno kw’icumi. Ariko abajejwe amagara y’abantu bavuga ko ata mugera uranwa muri iki gisagara, kuko uyo mugabo yapfuye yari avuye i Mubende. Iki kiza c’ubu giterwa n’umugera wamuka muri Sudani, uwu nawo ukaba ata rucanco rwawo ruraboneka. Umugera uzwi “nk’umugera wa Zaire” - umugera wahitanye abantu 11.000 mu kiza karanda cadutse muri Afrika y’Uburengero kuva 2013 gushika 2016 - wowo urucanco rwawo ruriho. Ebola yandukira iyo umuntu akorakoye amazimazi y’umubiri w’uwanduye canke ikintu canduye. Mu bimenyetso vyayo harimwo kudahwa, gucibwamwo, rimwe na rimwe kandi no kuvira amaraso imbere canke hanze. Igihe co kwibonekeza gishobora kuva ku misi ibiri gushika ku ndwi zitatu, kandi uwu mugera ushobora kugiriranira isano n’izindi ndwara nka malaria na typhoid.

column2: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
column3: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

column2: Papa Francis yagenye abakardinali bashasha: Harimwo Umunyarwanda Antoine Kambanda
column3: Papa Francis ahejeje gutangaza amazina y'abakardinali bashasha 13 muri bo hakaba harimwo Musenyeri mukuru wa Kigali, Antoine Kambanda. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda ni we Munyarwanda wa mbere agenywe kuba umukardinali. Muri abo 13, icenda bari munsi y'imyaka 80, bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu murwi w'abakardinali bashobora gutora umusubirizi wa Papa mu gihe yokwitaba Imana canke agatanga imihoho. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda afise imyaka 61, yavukiye mu Bugesera, mu 2018 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize Musenyeri mukuru (Arkepiskopi) wa Kigali canke umukuru wa Ekleziya Gatolika mu Rwanda. Kambanda yize amashuri mato n'ayisumbuye mu Burundi, muri Uganda no muri Kenya imbere yo kurangiza  ivyigwa vya Tewolojiya muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda mu Rwanda. Inyandiko za Ekleziya mu Rwanda zivuga ko mu kwezi kwa cenda mu 1990 aribwo Papa Paul II yamugize umupatiri. Kuva mu 1993 yagiye kwiga i Roma aho yavanye impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga muri Tewolojiya. Inyuma y'amashuri yiwe, igihe kinini yari umwigisha muri seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, aza no kuyiyobora kugeza mu 2013. Muri uwo mwaka wa 2013 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo kugeza mu 2018 ahabwa amabanga yo kuyobora kiliziya mu Rwanda. Kardinali ni rwo rwego rukuru rwo mu butegetsi bwa ekleziya umuntu ashobora kugerako imbere yo kuba Papa, umuyobozi wa Ekleziya Gatolika kw'isi. Ekleziya Gatolika yari isanzwe ifise abakardinali 219, muri abo 29 gusa ni bo bo muri Africa, mu gihe igihugu nk'Ubutaliyano conyene gifise abakaldinali 41. Ibihugu vya Africa bisanzwe bifise abakardinali ni: Aba bakardinali bashasha 13 batowe na Papa Francis bazemezwa kuri iyo mirimo kw' igenekerezo 28 z'ukwezi kwa 11 nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ya Vatican. Muri bo harimwo uwitwa Mauro Gambetti yari asanzwe ari umupatiri. Urwego rw'abakardinali rumeze nka reta ya Papa. Bamwe bakorera i Vatican abandi baguma bakorera mu bihugu vyabo bakajayo igihe batumijwe. Amategeko abagenga avuga ko Abakardinali igikorwa cabo ca mbere ari ugutora umu Papa mushasha iyo uwusanzwe ahari apfuye canke avuye mu mirimo. Gusa muri bose, 120 ni bo baba bagize inama itora Papa mushasha. Bashingwa kandi iyindi mirimo itandukanye harimwo gukurikirana ibikorwa vy'abasenyeri, guhagararira amashuri ya Ekleziya, ivugabutumwa, eka bakagira n'inteko ijejwe sentare zitatu za ekleziya. Abakardinali ariko kandi baba bajejwe guhagararira diyoseze n'imiburiburi zibiri canke zirenga mu bihugu bakomokamwo. Abakardinali bambara ibara ry'umutuku kuvyo amategeko ya katolika asobanura ko baba "biteguye kumena amaraso yabo mu gukorera uwo basubiriye intumwa Petero."

column2: Israel - Palestina: Abapfa biyongereye, Israel yishe intwazangabo ikomeye muri Gaza
column3: Israel yishe uwundi mutegetsi mukuru w’inyeshamba zo mu muhari w’abarwanyi ba Palestina, bazwi nka Palestinian Islamic Jihad, mu gihe ibitigiri vy’abagwa muri ibi bitero vy’indege muri Gaza. Abana batandatu hamwe n’abarwanyi batari bake ba PIJ  - harimwo intwazangabo Khaled Mansour na Tayseer Jabari – bari mu banya-Palestina 32 bavugwa ko bamaze kwicwa. Ibisasu vya muzinga hafi 600 nivyo bimaze guterwa muri Israel kuva ku wa gatanu, nk’uko bivugwa n’umutegetsi bwa Israel. Israel ivuga ko ibi bitero vyaje inyuma “y’uko yari itewe” n’uyo murwi. Iyi niyo mishamirano ikomeye hagati ya Israel na Gaza, haraciye umwaka urenga. Intambara yamaze imisi 11  mu kwa gatanu kw’umwaka uheze wa 2021 yahitanye abanya-Palestina barenga 200 n’abanya-Israel bababa cumi imbere y’uko bashika ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara. Igisirikare ca Israel kiragabisha ko iki gikorwa ca gisirikare – cataziriwe Breaking Dawn – gishobora kumara iyinga ryose. Uno musi ku wa Mungu, ibisasu vya muzinga vy’abanya-Palestina vyarasiwe mu karere ka Gaza vyaguye mu gisagara ca Jerusalem ubwa mbere kuva kuri ya ntambara yo mu 2021. Ibi bitero  bibaye inyuma y’aho Israel yiciye umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa PIJ Khaled Mansour mu gitero c’indege cakozwe ku nzu iri mw’ikambi y’impuzi iri ahitwa Rafah mu bumanuko bwa Gaza. Iyi ntwazangabo yari imaze guhakwa kwicwa n’igisirikare ca Israel incuro zitanu, kikaba kimwagiriza gutegura ibitero vy’abarwanyi hanze y’akarere ka Gaza. Hampande y’ibitero vy’indege kuri Gaza, aho Israel ivuga ko mu bibanza yiziziye harimwo inzira yo mu kuzimu ikoreshwa na PIJ, abahagarikwa babandanya bahagarikwa mu karere ka Cisjordanie/ West Bank kigaruriwe na Israel. Abanywanyi ba PIJ batari bake bamaze guhagarikwa nk’uko bivugwa na Israel. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y’abantu muri Gaza avuga ko "igitero ca Israel" cishe abanya-Palestina, gikomeretsa abanda barenga 200. Israel yagiriza abarwanyi ba PIJ ko ari bo bihekuye  mu kwihenda bakica bamwe muri abo bapfuye – ikavuga ko ejo ku wa gatandatu igisasu ca muzinga ciyatse uyo muhari kikica abana batari bake i Jabalia, mu karere ka Gaza. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza yo nyene ubwayo ibi bivugwa. Ariko gushika ubu, Hamas, umuhari mukuru muri ako karere – ukaba usangiye ivyiyumviro n’umuhari Islamic Jihad mbere ukaba ukunze gukorana ibikorwa nawo – isa n’uko ata bisasu vya muzinga biriko biraraswa biva mu bubiko bwayo bunini. Ni naco gituma ata makuru avuga ko Israel yoba iriko irakora ibi bitero vy’indege kuri Hamas. Mw’ijoro ryo ku wa gatanu,  Hamas yasohoye amatangazo akomeye ivuga ko “imirwi yo kwirwanako” yishize hamwe. Ariko kubera irongoye Gaza ifise ibintu vyayo ibanza kwitondera, ibi bigashobora gutuma itinjira muri iyi mishamirano. Ibiharuro vya Hamas bishobora guhinduka, nk’akarorero mu gihe igitigiri c’abasivire bapfiriye muri Gaza cokwongerekana. Mu gihe yoramuka ifashe ingingo yo kwinjira muri iyi ntambara, aho rero ibintu bishobora guca bikomera gusumba. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, ikigo ca Gaka kimwe rudende gisanzwe gitanga umuyagankuba carugaye kubera kitigeze kironka n’ima rimwe ry’igitor, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuvugizi w’ikigo kijejwe umuyagankuba. Ibiro vy’umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire asaba impande zompi kwifata – bikavuga ko bishigikiye ko Israel ifise uburenganzira bwo kwirwanako, mu gihe ariko bivuga ko bitewe impungenge n’abasivire bashobora kugwa mu mporero, nk’uko vyandikwa n’itirorokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters. Mu cizere ko ishobora kuzibira iyindi mishamirano, Misiri nayo nyene yafashe umugambi wo kuja hagati y’izi mpande zibiri, mbere bikavugwa ko yoba yarungitse intumwa muri Israel ejo ku wa gatandatu kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano ibaye inyuma gato y’aho Israel ihagarikiye Bassem Saadi avugwa ko arongoye  PIJ muri Cisjordanie, mw’ijoro ryo ku wa mbere. Yahagaritswe ari mu karere ka Jenin mu rukurikirane rwo guhagarika abikekwa inyuma y’ibitero vyakozwe n’abarabu ba Israel na Palestina vyahitanye abanya-Israel 17 n’abanya Ukraine babiri. Babiri mu bakoze ivyo bitero bavuye mu karere ka Jenin. PIJ, umwe mu mihari y’abarwanyi biyitirira Islam ikomeye irwanira muri Gaza, ishigikiwe na Irani kandi icicaro cayo kiri ku mugwa mukuru wa Syria, Damas/Damascus. Irakora ibitero bitari bike, harimwo ibisasu vya muzinga biterwa Israel. Mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019, Israel na PIJ  vyaratanye mu mitwe mu kiringo c’imisi itanu inyuma y’aho Israel yiciye intwazangabo ya PIJ ivuga ko yariko arategura igitero. Imishamirano yahitanye abanya-Palestina 34 n’abandi 111 bakomeretse, abanya-Israel 63 nabo bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko bajanwa kwa muganga. Israel yavuze ko 25 mu banya-Palestina bishwe bari abarwanyi, harimwo n’abatewe bariko barategura kurungika ibisasu vya muzinga.

column2: Coronavirus: OMS iti ‘Afrika ntizoba urubuga rwo kugerageza urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose".
column3: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi,OMS/WHO ariyamiriza amajambo "y'ivanguramoko" yashikirijwe n'abaganga babiri b'Abafaransa aho bavuze ko urucanco rwa covid-19 rwogeragerezwa muri Afrika. Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS ati: "Afrika ntishobora kuba kandi ntizigera iba urubuga rwo kugeragerezako urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose". Ayo majambo yashikirijwe mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo yarateye icuka kibi, abo baganga bakaba baragirijwe ko bafata Abanyafrika "nk'imbeba z'inzungu". Vyabaye ngomwa ko umwe muri bo asaba imbabazi. Abajijwe ku bijanye n'ivyashikirijwe n'abo baganga mu kiganiro OMS yariko igirana n'abanyamakuru, Dr. Terdros yabonetse ko arakaye, aho yavuze ko ivyo vyerekana  "ivyiyumviro vy'ubukoloni". Ati: "Ni ibintu biteye isoni kandi bibabaje kwumva mu kinjana ca 21 hakiri abahinga bashobora gushikiriza amajambo nk'ayo. Turavyiyamirije twivuye inyuma, kandi turabijeje ko ivyo bitazigera bisubira". Mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo y'abafaransa LCI, ku wa 01 z'uku kwa kane, Dr Camille Locht  ajejwe ubushakashatsi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu n'ubushakashatsi (Inserm), yariko avuga ibijanye n'igerageza ry'urucanco i Bulaya na Australia. Niho rero Dr Jean-Paul Mira, ajejwe kuvura indembe ku bitaro vya Coshin i Paris yinamura akavuga ati: "Ngerageje kuvuga mu majambo yo nyayo, kubera iki tutogeragereza urwo rucanco muri Afrika, ahantu ata dutambara two kwikingira bafise, ata miti bafise, ata n'uburyo bafise bwo gutabara indembe?" "Erega ni nk'uko bisanzwe bigenda ahandi mu bushakashatsi bumwe bumwe kuri SIDA. Nko mu ba maraya, turahakorera igerageza kuko tuzi ko ari bo babangamiwe kandi kubera tuzi ko batikingira". Niho muganga Locht, yaca ashigikira mugenziwe, muganga Mira, avuga ati: "Uvuze ukuri, turategekanya ubushakashatsi nk'ubwo bwokorwa no muri Afrika". Imbere y'aho, muganga Mira yari yerekanye amakenga kuri iryo gerageza ririko riraba, avuga ko atizeye ko bashobora gushika ku vyo bipfuza muri Australia n'i Bulaya kubera bobo bafise ibikoresho vyo kwikingira iyo bari ku kazi. Ayo majambo yatumye Abanyafrika mu bice vyose vy'uwo mugabane bashangashirwa, harimwo n'uwahoze ari umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru, Didier Drogba, yavuze ko ayo majambo ari ayo ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yavuze kandi ati: "Kirazira ko abanya Afrika bafatwa nk'imbeba! Ako ni akagaye". Mugenziwe Samuel Eto'o nawe nyene yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa umupira w'amaguru, wewe yavuze ko abo baganga ari "abicanyi". Amajambo y'abo baganga kandi yongereje ubwoba bwari busanzwe buhari muri Afrika ko Abanyafrika bashobora gufatwa nk'imbeba z'inzungu bakageragerezwako urucanco rushasha rwa coronavirus.

column2: Coronavirus: Putin avuga ko urucanco rwemejwe ko rushobora gukoreshwa
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burusiya, Vladimir Putin, avuga ko urucanco rwakorewe muri ico gihugu rwo gukinga Covid-19 rwamaze kwemezwa ko ari nyarwo inyuma y'amezi adashika abiri ruriko rurageragerezwa ku bantu. Perezida Putin avuga ko urwo rucanco rwakorewe umwihwezo wose utegerezwa, yongerako y'uko n'umukobwa wiwe yamaze kuruhabwa. Abategetsi bavuga ko bafise integuro yo gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abahinga berekanye amakenga ku kuntu urwo rukingo rwihutishijwe n'Uburusiya, bakabona ko abashakashatsi bashaka gufata inzira ya hafi. Mu gihe hari ubwoba ku ngaruka zarwo, umuryango witaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, mu ndwi iheze wasavye Uburusiya gukurikiza amategeko mpuzamakungu ku bijanye no gukora urucanco rwa Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rw'Uburusiya ntiruri ku rutonde rw'incanco zitandatu za OMS zemewe kugeragezwa ku rugero rwa gatatu, harimwo no kuzigeragereza ku bantu. Mu gihe avuga ko ari urwa mbere kw'isi, Perezida Putin amenyesha ko uru rucanco rwakozwe n'ikigo Gamaleya c'i Moscou, ari "urukingo nyarwo" rwo kurwanya coronavirus. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Mikhail Murashko, avuga ko uru rucanco "rwerekanye ko rukora neza kandi ko ata ngaruka rufise", akavuga ko ari intambwe ikomeye mu nzira yo gutsinda Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rwiswe Sputnik V,  izina rifatiye ku kigendajuru ca mbere c'igihingurano cabaye kw'isi, rigafatwa n'Uburusiya nk'intsinzi kuko kibaye igihugu ca mbere kwemeza urucanco, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu bategetsi b'iki gihugu asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Kirill Dmitriev arongoye ikigega c'Uburusiya, RDIF,  avuga ko iki gihugu kimaze kuronka ibihugu birenga 20 vyamaze gusaba urwo rucanco ku rugero runganga n'umuliyaridi. Mu ndwi iheze, leta y'Uburusiya yatangaje ko yariko irategura gutangura gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga inyuma y'aho imenyeshereje ko yakoze igerageza ry'urwo rucanco. Kw'isi hari incanco zirenga 100 ziriko zirakorwa, zimwe muri zo zikaba ziriko zirageragerezwa ku bantu. N'aho urwo rucanco rwihuse, abahinga nka bose babona ko ata rucanco ruriko ruraboneka kw'isi yose imbere ya 2021 hagati. Kw'igenekerezo rya kane rya kuno kwezi kw'umunani, umuvugizi wa OMS, Christian Lindmeier, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Rimwe na rimwe abashakashatsi ku giti cabo baravuga ko babonye ikintu, ni vyo ko ico kiba ari ikintu gikomeye". "Ariko ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukuronka urucanco rukora, kandi bibanje guca mu nzira zose zikenewe".

column2: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Putin asabwa kuja mu biganiro 'amaso mu yandi' na Zelensky
column3: Abakuru b'igihugu vy'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi  basavye Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya kuja mu biganiro "amaso mu yandi kandi ashimitse", n'umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiro vy'umukuru wa reta y'Ubudagi. Emmanuel Macron, umukuru w'igihugu  c'Ubufaransa, hamwe na Olaf Scholz umukuru wa reta y'Ubudagi (Chancelier/Chancellor) bavuganye na Perezida Putin kuri terefone mu kiringo c'iminota 80. Aba bategetsi babiri "bashimangiye ko ari ngombwa ko intambara ihagarara vuba bwango kandi ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zitahukanwa", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiro vy'umukuru wa reta y'Ubudagi. Nk'uko bivugwa na Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya), Perezida Putin yababwiye ko Moscou yiteguriye gusubira mu biganiro na Kyiv. Ntivuga ariko ko ibiganiro amaso mu yandi bishoboka hagati ya Perezida Putin na mugenziwe wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky. Imbere y'aha, Perezida Zelensky yari yavuze ko ata shaka afise ryo kuja mu biganiro, ariko akavuga ko ari vyo bishobora kuba inzira nyyo yo kurangira intambara. Intumwa z'Uburusiya n'iza Ukraine ziramaze kubonana incuro zitari nke amaso mu yandi canke bari kure na kure  kuva Uburusiya butanguye igitero ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), ariko utu twigoro twahavuye duhagarara. Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi kandi vyasavye Putin kurekura abarwanyi ba Ukraine 2500 bafashwe mpiri ku rugamba bakagirwa imbohe z'intambara kuri rwa ruganda rw'ivyuma rwa  Azovstal i Mariupol. Uru ruganda runini rwabaye agace ka nyuma k'isekaniro muri ico gisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja, camaze igihe cose gicucagirwa amabombe y'urutavanako n'ingabo z'Uburusiya ubu kikaba ari umusaka. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, abategetsi ba Moscou bavuze ko abarwanyi ba nyuma bariko barwanira uru ruganda bamanitse amaboko, mu gihe Perezida Zelensky avuga ko bahawe uruhusha rwo kuhava. Uburusiya bwari bwavuze ko abarenga 900 muri abo barwanyi batwawe mw'ibohero ryuguruwe rya Olenivka, ikigwati kiri mu karere kari mu minwe y'Uburusiya muri Donesk. Bakeya muri bo bakomeretse cane batwawe mu bitaro mu gisagara ca Novoazovsk, muri Donesk nyene. Ukraine yizeye ko bazorekurwa mu mugambi wo guhanahana impfungwa - ariko Uburusiya ntiburavyemeza. Bamwe mu bashingamateka bavuga ko aba barwanyi bakwiye kurengutswa mu bucamanza canke mbere bakanyongwa. Muri ico kiganiro nyene, aba bategetasi b'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi basavye kandi Putin kwugurura ikivuko ca Odesa muri Ukraine cugawe n'Uburusiya, kugira ngo intete zishobore gushorwa hanze. Kremlin ivuga ko Perezida Putin yemeye ko agiye kuraba icokorwa, kugira ngo ntihahave haba ikibazo c'imfungurwa kw'isi - ariko akaba yasavye Uburengero ko bwokuraho ibihano bwafatiye igihugu ciwe. Uburusiya kandi bwagabishije Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi ku ngendo yavyo yo kwongereza ibirwanisho biha Ukraine, akavuga ko bishobora gutuma indyane ziyongera kandi zikamara igihe kirekire. Abategetsi ba Ukraina bavuga ko intambara zibandanya mu mabarabara y'igisagara ca Severodonetsk kiri mu buseruko, akarere ko hirya cane mu buseruko kakiri mu minwe ya Ukraine. Buramatari w'intara ya Luhansk, Serhiy Haidai, avuga ko Abarusiya babandanya bacucagira amabombe ico gisagara, n'aho ingabo zabo zahatakarije ibitari bike. Ku wa gatanu, abategetsi bavuze ko bibiri vya bitatu vyaco vyagoswe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Buramatari Haidai yamenyesheje ko ingabo za Ukraine zashobora kuva muri Severodonetsk, mu kuvuga ati: "Birashoboka ko biba ngombwa ko bavayo kugira ngo ntibahave bugaranirwayo". Avugana na BBC ejo ku wa gatandatu, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ukraine, Denys Shmyhal yavuze ko igitero c'Uburusiya ku gihugu ciwe cabomoye ibirometero 25.000 vy'amabarabara, ibiraro bitari bike, hamwe n'ibibuga vy'indege 12. Ibigo birenga 100 vy'amashure, amavuriro arenga 500, hamwe n'amahinguriro 200, navyo nyene vyaratikiye canke birononwa, nk'uko abivuga. Asaba ko Uburusiya bwotegekwa kuriha ivyo "bwasambuye", akavuga ko amatungo y'Uburusiya yafashwe yorungikwa muri Ukraine kugira ngo akoreshwe mu bikorwa vyo gusanura igihugu.

column2: Tanzania: Sentare ivuga ko inyandiko zo kuraga itunga ryose Jackline Ntuyabaliwe zitakurikije amategeko
column3: Umupfakazi wa nyakwigendera Reginald Mengi, Jackline Ntuyabaliwe, yerekanye akababaro kiwe ku ngingo ya sentare nkuru ya Tanzania yerekeye uwohagarikira itunga ryasizwe n'umugabo wiwe. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Kirakwiye... icegeranyo co kwa muganga ca Dr Reginald Mengi cerekanywe nk'icemezo. Ukuri ku bantu bakunda ukuri. Umugabo wanje yamaze ubuzima bwiwe yubashwe, akerebutse kandi yafashije ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abatanzania." Ntiyari umukehabwenge! Ushobora kuvuga ivyo ushatse vyose, ufate ivyo ushatse, ariko kuri ivyo, nzomuvugira gushika mpfe. Jackline yanditse kuri urwo rubuga hwaniro ashirako n'icegeranyo ca muganga wiwe, yanditse ivyerekeye amagara yiwe, ko ingwara yamufashe ya AVC itatumye atakaza ubwenge. Mu misi iheze, mu gusoma urubanza rw'impapuro 72, umucamanza Mlyambina yavuze ko inyandiko zo kuraga za nyuma za nyakwigendera Dr Mengi zanditswe itariki 17 z'ukwezi kw'umunani mu 2017 zitakurikije amategeko agenga kuraga. Muri urwo rubanza, abana ba Dr Mengi bariko bariyamiriza izo nyandiko zo kuraga bivugwa ko zasizwe na nyakwigendera se wabo, n'umukono wari kuri izo nyandiko nta ho bisa bisana n'izindi ziwe, kandi muri ico gihe se wiwe nta nguvu yari afise zo kwandika kubera ingwara yari afise kuva mu 2016. Abana bakuze ba nyakwigendera bavuga ko izo nyandiko zo kuraga zabirengagije, iragi ryose rihabwa Jackline Ntuyabaliwe n'abana biwe b'amahasa, rero ko izo nyandiko zitakurikije amategeko  kubera zashize ku ruhande abandi bana ata mpamvu. Jackline Ntuyabaliwe azwi kw'izina ry'ubuhizi rya K-Lynn muri BongoFleva yamenyekanye cane mu ndirimbo Nalia Kwa Furaha. Bahuriye n'umugwizatunga w'umutanzania Reginald Mengi mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza mu 2010. Mu 2014 ikinyamakuru candika ku butunzi ca Forbes canditse ko uwo mugabo yari afise imitahe mu bimenyeshamakuru no mu mashirahamwe yimba ubutare, yari afise ubutunzi bungana na miliyoni 560 z'amadolari. Bari bubakanye mu 2015 mu bugeni bwabereye mw'izinga rya Maurice, Dr Reginal Mengi akaba yarusha umupfasoni wiwe imyaka 36. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ari i Dubai afise imyaka 75  itariki 2 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 2019, mu gihe Jackline Ntuyabaliwe yari afise imyaka 39.

column2: Covid: Ico kiza cagabanije umunezero w'umwaka mushasha hirya no hino kw'isi
column3: Amategeko yo kwikingira mu misi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha ariko arashirwaho hirya no hino kw'isi mu gihe ibihugu vyinshi bihanganye n'iyongerekana ry'abagwayi ba coronavirus. Ukurasa ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka mu kirere hamwe n'ayandi makoraniro ntibirekuwe kuva i Sydney gushika i New York. Ibirori ntibizoba na cane cane i Buraya, mu gihe hari ubwoba ko hari ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwadutse. Ubufaransa bwategekanije abapolisi 1000.000 bo kugenzura imisi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha no kwubahiriza amasaha y'umukwabu. Abantu barenga umuliyoni 1.8 baramaze gupfa bahitanywe na coronavirus hirya no hino kw'isi kuva ico kiza giteye haraciye umwaka. Abantu barenga imiliyoni 81 baramaze gufatwa n'iyo ngwara. Ingene ibihugu vya Aziya na Pacifique vyabangamiwe? Kimwe mu bihugu vya mbere vyashikiriye umwaka mushasha ni Australia. Ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka birabandanya kuraswa mu kirere, ariko nta bantu baza kwemererwa gukoranira ku kivuko co muri ico gisagara mu kuwigina. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa New South Wales, Gladys Berejiklian avuga ati:"Ntidushaka gutuma haba imisi mikuru ikwiragira hose ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha." Benshi mubaba i Sydney baza kuguma imbere y'imboneshakure, aho abantu bazoba barekuriwe kuja hamwe batarenga batanu, nk'uko umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC ari muri ico gisagara, Phil Mercer abivuga. Mu Bushinwa, ibirori vy'umuco w'amatara vy'umwaka mushasha mu gisagara ca Pekin vyahagaritswe. Imisi mikuru yagabanuwe cane mu bisagara vyo muri ico gihugu. Ubuyapani bwahagaritse umusi mukuru usanzwe uhimbazwa buri mwaka mushasha aho igikomangoma Naruhito n'abandi bo mu muryango wiwe baramutsa isinzi ry'abantu. Mu Buhinde, i Delhi no mu bindi bisagara vyinshi hashizweho umukwabu hamwe n'izindi ngingo zibuza amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ku mwaka mushasha. I Buraya ho gute? Mu Bufaransa, reta yategetse ko haba abajejwe umutekano bagaragara mu bisagara hose kuva isaha zibiri z'ijoro ku musi wa kane, isaha umukwabu utangurirako. I Paris, igice c'itereni zica mu kuzimu kizoba cugaye ku mugoroba. Ubufaransa bumaze kwiyugarana incuro zibiri, ububare, inzu z'uburiro hamwe n'ibibanza vy'akahise bizoguma vyugawe ku musi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha. Mu Bwongereza - aho coronavirus nshasha iriko irakwiragira vyihuta kandi abantu imiliyoni 20 bamerewe nabi cane  mu turere dusinzikaye cane,  bategetswe kuguma mu mihana yabo - Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yahamagariye abantu gukurikiza amategeko yo kwikingira Covid. Ku musi wa gatatu yavuze ati:"Ibi ntibisigura ko mubonana n'imiryango hamwe n'incuti mu mazu yanyu, kiretse igihe musanzwe mubana, kandi mukwiye kwirinda amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ayo ari yo yose." Igipolisi co mu bisagara cateye akamo abakunda kugira imisi mikuru i Londres "ko bohimbariza umwaka mushasha mu mazu yabo." Irlande irongereza ingingo zo kwikingira kuri uyu wa kane, ibuze imigenderanire hagati y'amazu, yugare ubuguriro budakenewe cane ihagarike no kuja ku birometero bigera kuri bitanu mu kiringo c'amezi atatu. Ubudagi buri mu mategeko yo kugaranwa gushika itariki 10. Reta yahagaritse ibintu biturika birwaswa mu kirere, ishiraho n'ingingo zindi zikomeye ku gitigiri c'abantu bashobora guhurira hamwe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Jens Spahn yavuze ko igihugu gishobora "kugira umusi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha w'agacerere" utazopfa wibagiwe. Holande na yo nyene iri mu ngingo zo kutava ku muhana, zitegekanijwe kurangira itariki 19 z'ukwezi kwa mbere. Uguharura umwanya usigaye ngo umwaka mushasha ushike, kuza kubera ku kibuga ca Amsterdam, ata mu ntu n'umwe ahari. Turkia kiratangura imisi ine yo kwiyugarana kuva ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha. Muri Amerika, abategetsi bashizeho ingingo zo guhagarika imisi mikuru mu ntara no mu bisagara vyinshi. I new York, umupira wakaka uri mu kibanza ca Times Squares uraza kururutswa mu mihango y'umugenzo wo guharura umwanya usigaye ngo isaha zitandatu z'ijoro zishike, ariko nta bantu bazoba barekuriwe kuza muri ico kibanza. Ibintu biturika kandi bica ibibatsi biraswa mu kirere vyahagaritswe mu bisagara harimwo San Francisco na Las Vegas.

column2: China: Ikirere kibi cahitanye abanonotsi 21 biruka ibirometero vyinshi
column3: Abanonotsi bapfuye inyuma yo kubangamirwa n'ikirere igihe bariko bariruka ibirometero birebire mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Imiyaga ikaze n'imvura ivanze n'imbeho yabangamiye abariko bariruka ibirometero 100 mw'ishamba rya Yellow River Stone, ikibanda c'ingenzi kiri mu ntara ya Gansu ku musi wa gatandatu. Iryo siganwa ryahagaritswe igihe abanonotsi 172 baburirwa irengero, hanyuma ibikorwa vyo gutabara bica biratangura. Benshi mu banonotsi bivugwa ko bari bakanye cane. Liang Jing, rurangiranwa mu kwiruka ivyo birometero birebire, hamwe na Huang Guanjun, yabaye uwa mbere mu bagabo bagendana ubumuga bwo kutumva mw'ihiganwa rya Olempike ryo mu Bushinwa mu 2019, bari mu bapfuye, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Abategetsi bavuga ko abanonotsi 151 vyemezwa ko bakomeye, ariko ko umunani muri bo bakomeretse. Isiganwa ryari ryatanguye isaha 09:00 yo mu Bushinwa (01:00 GMT) ku musi wa gatandatu, bamwe mu basiganwa bakaba bari bambaye amabutura gusa n'udupira. Abarokotse bavuga ko ibipimo vyerekana ko haza kuba imvura n'umuyaga, ariko ko bitari kuba bibi cane nk'ivyo babonye. Inyuma y'amasaha atatu isiganwa ritanguye, igice kimwe co mu misozi c'ahabera iryo siganwa caguyemwo urubura, imvura nyinshi hamwe n'umuyaga vyatumye hakanya cane, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi b'igisagara kihegereye ca Baiyin city. Umunonotsi umwe, Mao Shuzhi, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Reuters ko yaciye asubira inyuma abonye ikirere gihindutse. Umwigeme Mao, yari amaze kugira ibirometero 24 ico gihe, kandi akaba atari bwashikiri iyo misozi, yavuze ati:"Imvura yaguma yongerekana." Yaciye afata ingingo yokwisubirira mw'ihoteli amaze kwumva akanye cane, ariko abandi babandanije canke bari bamaze gushika ahameze nabi cane. Bivugwa ko abanonotsi benshi bazimiye kubera ko bitakunda ko babona aho baca. Abashinzwe gutabara1.200 ni bo barungitswe, bafashijwe n'indege zitagira umudereva nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru ba reta. Ibikorwa vyarabandanije mw'ijoro gushika ku w'Imana mu gitondo, aho imbeho yongerekanye bituma ibikorwa vyo gutabara bigorana gusumba, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ry'Ubushinwa, Xinhua. Urwo rupfu rwatumye haba ishavu ryinshi ku mbuga hwaniro zo mu Bushinwa, aho batunga agatoka cane cane abarongoye akarere ka Baiyin, bakaba banashavujwe no kuba hatabaye imyiteguro ikwiye. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu w'Imana, umukuru w'igisagara ca Baiyin, Zhang Xuchen yavuze: Nk'abatunganije ibi birori, ni twebwe twobazwa ivyabaye kandi turababaye. Turahojeje imiryango yabuze ababo n'abakomeretse."

column2: Umuti wa mbere wa SIDA uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire wemejwe
column3: Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barwaye umugera wa SIDA bagiye guhabwa umuti uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire, maze bagahagarika vya binini bama bafata buri musi. Abagiraneza bishimiye cane uyu muti mushasha wemejwe n'ikigo kijejwe ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza NHS. Uyu muti utuma umugera ugabanya inguvu, ukaba ukora co kimwe na vya binini vyo gupfupfahaza bisanzwe bifatwa buri musi. Vyitezwe ko mu Bwongereza abantu bababa 13.000 bashobora guca bahindukirira uyu muti. Imiti Cabotegravir (uzwi kandi kw'izina rya Vocabria ukaba wahinguwe n'ikigo ViiV Healthcare) hamwe na rilpivirine (uwu nawo ukaba uzwi kandi nka Rekambys wahinguwe na Janssen) ni imiti iterwa incuro zibiri rumwe rumwe ukwarwo rimwe mu mezi abiri. Hagati aho, uwu muti ugirira akamaro gusa barya bantu bageze ku rugero rw'aho umugera utakiboneka mu maraso inyuma y'igihe bariko barafata vya binini. Abahinga bavuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugirira akamaro abantu benshi. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Chloe Orkin, akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umugera wa SIDA kuri kaminuza ya Queen Mary i Londres/London, avuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugabaniriza abarwayi umuzigo wo kwama bafata vya binini buri musi, kuko wowo bazowuterwa incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka. Muganga Sanjay Bhagani, arongoye ishirahamwe European Aids Clinical Society, avuga ati: "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye cane". "Kunenwa ni ikibazo gikomeye cane ku banduye umugera wa SIDA, kandi abatari bake ntiboroherwa no gufata ibinini imisi yose. Ibi rero bizotuma abenshi baronswa uwu muti uterwa mu rushinge". Alex Sparrowhawk w'i Manchester, asanzwe akora mw'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya SIDA rizwi nka Terrence Higgins Trust. Haciye imyaka 12 yanduye umugera wa SIDA, kuva ico gihe akaba ari ku binini vya  ART imisi yose. Avuga ko ari ikintu kiryoheye ugutwi kwumva ko hari uwundi muti ushobora kugabanya uwu muzigo. "Iyi nkuru ni ikintu abantu benshi bari bamaze igihe kirekire barindiranye igishika. "Iciyumviro co guterwa umuti incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka hagufata imiti ya misi yose ni ikintu gishimishije cane. Kwibuka ko wama ufata imiti ya SIDA  buri musi vyama bwikwibutsa ko urwaye SIDA  kandi ntibishobora kukuvamwo. "Hari abantu bashobora kuba babana n'abandi batazi ko banduye canke batanduye umugera, canke usanga bakora mu buzi bubatuma bazunguruka irya n;ino kw'isi, ibi bigashobora kuba inzitizi ku kwama umuntu afata imiti imisi yose". Kubw'iwe, abakwiye gushirwa imbere mu kuronswa uwu muti ni abo bose bawukeneye cane gusumba abandi, nk'akarorero abasanzwe bahura n'ikibazo co kunenwa.

column2: Chris Brown yagirijwe ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca amusambanya ku nguvu mu bwato
column3: Chris Brown yagirizwa ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca aramusambanya ku nguvu, ubu akaba ariko mu rubanza rushobora kumutwara imiriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Iki caha co gufata ku nguvu kivugwa ko cabereye mu bwato (yacht) ku wa 30 kigarama (ukwa cumi na kabiri) 2020 i Miami mu ntara ya Florida. Ikiganiro Newsbeat ca Radio 1 cagerageje kuvugana n'abaserukira Chris Brown kugira ngo bagire ico bavuze ariko gushika ubu ntaco barishura. Chris Brown asa n'uwishuye aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram, aho avuga ko ariko arakurikiranwa kubera ariko ategura gusohora umuziki. Yanditse ati: "NDIBAZA KO ARI IVYO MUBONA MWESE....ni igihe cose ngiye gusohora umuziki canke mfise imigambi kanaka". Uru rubanza rwugurujwe n'umunyamuziki atashatse kumenyekana, azwi gusa kw'izina rya 'Jane Doe' mu nzandiko z'amategeko. Izi nyandiko zerekana ibirego bitanu bitandukanye kuri uyu munyamuziki - gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, guturubika n'ibigirankana, guturubika umuntu kubera urwangara hamwe no gupfunga umuntu atabifitiye uburenganzira kandi amuturubitse. Uyu mugore avuga ko afise "ubwoba ko ashobora kwicwa canke gutakaza akazi" . Avuga ko yahawe ubutumire muri ubwo bwato bwegukira umunyamuziki wo mu mudiho wa rap (rapper) akongera kaba n'umu 'producer',  Diddy, ari naho habereye iki caha kivugwa. Nk'uko uru rwandiko Newsbeat yashoboye kubona rubivuga, uyu mugore avuga ko amaze gushika, Brown  yamuhaye ikinyobwa mu nyuma aca yumva "umubiri urahindutse giturumbuka mu buryo atashobora gusigura". Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko "yataye umutwe, inguvu ziramuherana, aca afatwa n'itiro", imbere y'uko atwarwa mu gitanda ariho bivugwa ko Brown yaciye amwambura impuzu amusambanya ku nguvu. Brown avugwa ko ku musi wakurikiye yahamagaye uyo mugore, amubwira ko yofata imiti kugira ntasame imbanyi. Newsbeat kandi yagerageje no kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Diddy, ariko nta nyishu baratanga.

column2: Kerala: Menya uyu muhindikazi atereka ubwanwa
column3: Ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mugore wo mu Buhindi atereka ubwana bwiwe arashimirwa ariko kandi akanegurwa n’abantu. Ariko wewe avuga ko adahungabanywa n’ibivugwa vyose ku bwanwa bwiwe. "Ndakunda ubwanwa bwanje," Shyja w’imyaka 35 niko yanditse kuri WhatsApp, musi y’ifoto yiwe. Yama abazwa – n’abantu babona amafoto yiwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook canke bahura nawe amaso mu yandi – igituma atereka ubwanwa. Avuga ati: “Ikintu conyene novuga ni uko gusa ndabukunda. Cane”. Shyja, izina ryonyene akoresha, aba mu karere ka Kannur  mu ntara yo Kerala iri mu bumanuko bw’Ubuhindi. Nk’uko bimeze ku bagore batari bake, yaramaze imyaka itari mike atsiba ubwana bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu gihe yama amwa ingohe ziwe, Shyja avuga ko atigeze yumva ko akeneye kumwa ubwanwa bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu myaka itanu iheze, bwatanguye kuba bwinshi buboneka neza kandi Shyja arabureka abinezererewe cane. Ati: "Ubu si mbona ko noshobora kubaho ntabufise. Igihe ikiza ca Covid gitangura, naranka kwambara agapfukamunwa igihe cose kubera kanzibira isura”. Abantu benshi bamubona bamusaba ko yokwikurako ubu bwanwa bwo hejuru ariko Shyja ntavyumva. "Sinigeze numva ko ndi mubi kubera ndabufise canke ko ari ikintu ntategerezwa kuba mfise”. Abagore bama babwirwa ko imishatsi yo kw’isura atari myiza kuri bo, ko rero botanga amafaranga kugira ngo bayibakure – canke bakayigabanya – igihe cose. Amahinguriro akora imiti yo kubuza imishatsi kumera aregeranya amamiriyaridi n’amamiriyaridi y’amadorari mu gukora amavuta, inzembe n’ibindi bishobora kurandurana n’imizi imishatsi, bigurwa n’abagore bashoboye kubigura. Ariko muri ino myaka ya vuba, abagore benshi bahisemwo kwemera mbere no kwishimira ubu bwanwa. Mu 2016, Harnaam Kaur aharanira ukwiyemera kw’umuntu uko aba ameze kwose (Body positive body positivity) yabaye umugore wa mbere akiri muto kw’isi yose yameze ubwanwa ku munwa wose no kw’itama nk’umugabo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo Guinness World Records. Mu biganiro yagiye atanga, yamye avuga ukungene ukwemera ubwanwa bwiwe kwabaye igihe gikomeye co kwiyemera imbere y’abamuzomera. Ku bwa Shyja, gutereka ubwanwa si ikintu umuntu afatira, ni kimwe mu bigize ubuzima bwiwe. Ati: "Jewe nkora ico nshatse. Iyaba nari mfise ubuzima bubiri, kumbure bumwe nari kububamwo uko abandi bashaka”. Kimwe mu vyatumye afata iyi ngendo ni ibibazo vy’amagara yahanganye navyo mu myaka itari mike. Shyja baramubaze  incuro zitandatu mu myaka cumi – rimwe kwari ukugira bamukure ikivyimba mw’ibere, irindi naryo kwari ukumukura utuvyimba mu gasaho k’imbuto. Aho aherukira kubagwa, kwari ukumukuramwo igitereko, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Igihe cose baheza kumbaga, naguma nizeye ko ntari gusubira muri ico cumba c’ibagiro”. Kubona yashoboye kurengana ibi bibazo vyose vy’amagara vyakomeje ivyiyumviro vya Shyja  ko ari ngombwa ko abaho mu buzima bwiwe bumuha umunezero. Shyja avuga ko akiri umwana yari afise isoni. Ni gake abagore mu kigwati ciwe bashobora kuboneka hanze inyuma y’isaha cumi na zibiri z’umugoroba. N’aho Kerala ari imwe mu ntara z’Ubuhindi zigenda zibaho ubuzima bwa none, kandi zifise ibimenyetso bikomeye vy’iterambere, mu turere twinshi umugabo ni we afise ijambo rya nyuma, kandi abagore bama babuzwa gufata ingendo canke kwibana. Igihe arongorwa akimukira mu ntara ya Tamil Nadu ihana urubibe n’iyo yavukiyemwo, Shyja avuga ko yaryohewe no kubona ubundi bwisanzure bushasha. Avuga ati: "Umugabo wanje yarashobora kuja ku kazi akagaruka atevye. Rero narashobora kwicara hanze ku mugoroba, rimwe na rimwe nkaja no kw’iduka ndi umwe mw’ijoro iyo hari ico nkeneye. Nta n’umwe yavyitaho. Igihe niga gukora ibintu jenyene, vyankomereje ukwiyemera”. Avuga kandi ko ariko aragerageza kuvyigisha umukobwa wiwe w’umuyabaga. Umuryango wa Shyja n’incuti ziwe bamye bamushigikira kuri buno bwanwa bwiwe. Umukobwa wiwe amubwira ko bumubereye. Ariko Shyja avuga ko yabwiwe amajambo y’ubwoko bwose avugwa n’abantu iyo bamubonye kw’ibarabara. Ati: "Abantu barantwenga bavuga ngo ‘abagabo bonyene nibo bamera ubwanwa, kubera iki umugore yobumera’?” Mu myaka itari mike, ni kenshi yagiye avugwa mu binyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, nk’uko abivuga, yarabonye amajambo y’agahemo yanditswe ku nkuru yamuvuga yari yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook n’ikinyamakuru co muri ico gihugu. Umuntu umwe yabajije igituma atari gufata urwembwe akamwa ubwanwa bwiwe bimaze kuboneka ko ingohe ziwe yari yazimoye. Ati:"Ariko si ikibazo kijanye n’ivyo nshaka – none ngumye iki hanyuma nikureko iki?” Abagenzi ba Shyja akenshi bishurana agashavu kuri ano majambo yandikwa kuri Facebook, ariko avuga ko ivyo ataco bimubwiye na gato. "Mu bisanzwe, kenshi ndabaraba nkabatwenga”.

column2: Mu mafoto: Umusi mukuru wa Christmas hirya no hino kw'isi
column3: Abantu hirya no hino kw'isi bariko barahimbaza kimwe mu biringo vyeranda ku kirangamisi c'abakristu.
