column2: Evariste Ndayishimiye yizeza Abarundi ko azoshinga leta yumviriza bose
column3: Mw' ijambo ryiwe rya mbere nk'umukuru  igihugu inyuma  yo kurahira, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko aje gushinga leta mvyeyi, itunganyiriza kandi yumviriza bose, ahimiriza Abarundi bahunze gutahuka, mbere akizeza umubano n'amahanga ariko ushingiye ku kwubahana. Bwana Ndayishimiye yijeje ukwishira n'ukwizana kwa bose no gukingira agateka ka buri wese. Agira ati: "Ntimugire ubwoba ndazi ibindindiriye…Kugira nemere ko Uburundi bwikukiye koko ni uko Umurundi wese agira ijambo. Ndayishimiye: 'Gushika ubu ntituramenya inguvu ziwe' - Filip Reytjens Menya 'Neva', umujenerali 'aciye bugufi' agiye gutwara Uburundi "Kugira ijambo ariko si ukuja mu mpari canke kugumuka mu mabarabarara, ivyo bavyita kwiha ijambo kandi mu mico y'ikirundi kirazira,  Abarundi bahana ijambo bakaganira". Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye ko ata mahanga yosubira kwivanga mu biraba Abarundi ngo abaronderera ibiganiro na leta, ahubwo bo boja bitura leta bonyene. Ati: "Abashaka ibiganiro n'ejo baratonda ariko bibuke umwibutsa ngo 'tuyaga dukora, dukora tuyaga'". Yijeje Abarundi bose abari mu gihugu n'impunzi kugira ijambo mu gihugu. Ati: "Guhera ubu ivy'ingimba nibihagarare…None abagiye kuturega mu makungu bageze kuki? Nibagaruke nyabuna bareke kwiha amenyo y'abatwenzi". Yijeje impinduka mu butegetsi, avuga ko abanyagihugu badategerezwa kwumva ko abanyepolitiki aribo babashikirayo. Ati: "Ntihagire uwiyumvira ko hari uwishikirayo kurusha uwundi, Abarundi bose barangana imbere y'amategeko natwe turi ng'aha guhagararira ayo mategeko". Yavuze ko hagiye kungenwa indongozi zo gutunganiriza abenegihugu, ngo "ntihagire Abarundi bagwa mu mutwego w'abanyepolitikie ngo ejo niwe azonshikana aho nifuza". Ati: "Ndabamenyesheje ko uba mu mugambwe canke utawubamwo, ufise uburenganzira bwo kugira uruhara mw'itunganywa ry'ibikorwa vy'igihugu, haba mu burongozi canke mu bikorwa ivyo ari vyo vyose". Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko imvugo 'imigambwe itavuga rumwe na leta' itosubira kuronka ikibanza mu Burundi. Ati: "Utavuze rumwe na leta y'Uburundi wovuga ururimi rw'iyihe leta?". Yagabishije ko ibimenyeshamakuru n'imiryango iharanira agateka ka zina muntu itazokwipfuza kwegera leta ngo baganire "izoba ifise uwundi shebuja". Mu migambi y'imibereho myiza y'abanyagihugu, yijeje abakukuruke ko bagiye kuja bavuzwa ku buntu banaronswe agashahara kangana n'imiburiburi n'ako bahora baronka bakiri ku kazi Yijeje ko hazokwubakwa ibitaro muri buri komine eka no kwitwararika umwimbu w'uburimyi "ntube gusa uwo gufungura gusa ahubwo kudandaza" Yavuze ko yafashe vyiza mu migambi y'abo bahiganwa mu matora, ko mbere azobahamagara ngo yumve ivyo yoranguranana nabo ku neza y'Abarundi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amakungu akwiriye kumenya ko Uburundi ari igihugu gifise ivyo gikeneye ariko naco gifise ivyo gitanga. Yaneguye inyifato y'ibihugu vy'igihagararo vyafatiye ingingo z'ibihano u Burundi, avuga ko ivyo leta yabivanyemwo icigwa co kwongereza umwimbu w'igihugu. Yagize ati: "Hatariho imigenderanire ishimikiye ku kwubahana, kwuzuzanya… ivyo twokora vyose mu vyo gufashanaya mw' iterambere vyoguma bigoye". Bwana Ndayishimiye yashimye imigenderanire n'imikorere y'amashirahamwe ahuza ibihugu vy'akarere, eka akengurukira ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika ku kwugurura isoko rusangi ry'umwimbu w'Abanyafrika. Ati: "Natwe ivyo dukora vyose dukeneye  gukorana n'amakungu mu bisata bitandukanye.. .ivyo tutumva kumwe ntivyotorerwa umuti mu gukoresha igihagararo, ibiganiro niyo nzira yonyene yo gutahurana no guhanurana". "Imigenderanire twipfuza ni uko ata bihugu vyoza biriyitirira amakungu, kugira ngo bikumire ibindi no kubifatira ingingo z'agahotoro". Asaba ibihugu vya Afrika kwirinda inyosha mbi zobaryanisha na benewabo. "Ku bwacu twifuza kubonana nk'Abanyafrika aho kuba abanyamahanga, tukugurura amaremba, tukubaka amabarabara adufatanya". Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye amakungu kudafasha Abarundi bafise imigambi yo gusambura Uburundi. Ati: "Dusavye ibihugu bibanyi kuba abazimyamuriro koko 'kuko umugabo umumwera ubwanwa bwaca akakumwera ubundi', tubasavye rero kuba abazimyamuriro". Bwana Ndayishimiye yavuze ko bashimira Imana ko abantu benshi batarafatwa n'ico kiza ko na bamwe mu bafashwe bamaze gukira. Ati: "Turasaba Abarundi gufata ingamba zose zishoboka ngo ntihagire uwusubira kwandukira ico kiza".

column2: Izinga rya Man ryahaye u Burundi imiriyoni £1.3 nk'imfashayo yo kurwanya ihindagukira ry'ibihe
column3: Reta y'izinga rya Man yahaye ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza imfashanyo  ingana n' imiriyoni 1.3 z'amapawundi ( yababa imiriyaridi 3 .5 mu mafaranga y'amarundi) mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya "ingaruka z'ihindagurika ry'ibihe". Iri shirahamwe International Development Partnership (IDP) ryacishije iyi mfashanyo mu rindi shirahamwe Send a Cow risanzwe rirangurira imigambi mu Burundi. Richard Granville ajejwe ibijanye n'imfashanyo muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ko aya mafaranga yatanzwe agiye gufasha "umugambi w'imyaka ibiri" mu "ntara ya Mwaro". Reta y'iryo zinga ryo ku mugabane w'Uburayi isanzwe yarategekanijwe amafaranga y'ama pawundi agera ku miriyoni 2.5 y'imfashanyo mpuzamakungu. Igisata c'ihindagurika ry'ibirere ni kimwe mu bisata bibiri iri shirahamwe  IDP ryahisemwo gufasha mu kiringo ca 2021-2023. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Howard Quayle avuga ati: "Ikiza karanda ca coronavirus carerekanye ingene twese dukeneraniye kw'isi yose kandi ndanezerewe kubona iri zinga rya Man rishobora gufasha muri iki gikorwa kidasanzwe". Granville avuga ko Uburundi bwama "buhura n'ingaruka zikomeye z'ihindagurika ry'ikirere" mu gihe ibice 94% vy'abanyagihugu "babeshejweho n'uburimyi bwo ku rugero ruto kandi bushingiye ku mvura". Domothile Niyonzima w'imyaka 43 asanzwe aba i Mwaro, avuga ati: "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni uko ata mfungurwa zikwiye turonka, kubera tudafise intabire yo gutabira isi yacu". Unicef ivuga ko abantu barenga 114.000 mu Burundi bataye izabo kubera ibiza bishingiye kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Send a Cow mu Burundi Gloria Nimpundu avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifasha abarimyi mu  "kubaha amazi n'isi ndimwa nziza" kandi ko "akarusho kariko karibonekeza". Avuga ko "ikibazo c'imvura igwa nabi nabi kandi itizewe kigenda ciyongera" gituma bigorana "kwitegurira irima n'iyimbura". "Muri iyi myaka iheze, izuba ryaratikije ibiterwa mu nyuma naho imyuzure iratikiza imirima". Yongerako y'uko uwu mugambi uriko urarangurirwa i Mwaro uzofasha imiryango ishika 5250 "kwikenura mu buryo bw'amafaranga mu guhangana n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, biciye mu kurima n'ukworora kijambere".

column2: Umunsi wahariwe isi: Umurundi Yves Kami mu bakoze indirimbo iwuhimbaza
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Yves Kami ari mu bandi 200 bo hirya no hino kw'isi bahinyanyuye indirimbo Resolution Song, igamije guhimiriza abatuye isi kuyikingira. Itariki ya 22/04/2022 ni umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe kwita ku si dutuye mu gukingira ibidukikije, ukaba wahuriranye n'ishirwa ahabona icese ry'umugambi Resolution Project. Uwo mugambi ni uw'indirimbo yiswe Resolution Song yerekeye gukingira ibidukikije, yagomba kuririmbwa mu ndimi 200 zo hirya no hino kw'isi. Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe n'ikigo Tackroom Theatre, gifadiganije n'ibigo bihinyanyura umuziki hamwe n'ivy'imbuga hwaniro birimwo Deccca Records, WWF International, Tik Tok, Acccenture n'abandi baririmvyi batandukanye bo kw'isi yose. Muri abo baririmvyi, harimwo Umurundi Yves Kami, akaba ari we yatowe mu Burundi ngo akore iyo ndirimbo ashizemwo ikirundi akanayiha umudiho w'ikirundi. Ku bw'ukwo gutoranywa, Kami yabwiye BBC ati: "Jewe ndi umu 'artiste' akora umudiho wisunze imidiho yo ngaha iwacu. Nkora afro ndayicanze n'ingoma nzo ngaha mu Burundi. "Burya ivyo umuntu aba ariko arakora barabikurikirana. Nagiye mbona umuntu andondeye, arambarira umugambi nanje numva neza ko ari umugambi mwiza. "... umuziki wacu tuwukoresha kugira [duhimirize] abantu [...] tuwukoresha kugira ngo ushobore gufasha [ikibano] tubayemwo." Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe mu 2019 ku cicaro ca ONU, ukaba ushigikiwe na ba rurangiranwa ba Hollywood nka Emma Thomson, Naomi Harris, Keira Knightly, Marc Rylance na Bill Bailey. Intumbero yari uko itariki ya 22/04/2022 ishika izo ndirimbo zose 200 hamwe na video zazo vyamaze gushirwa ahabona bishobora kwumvirizwa. Izo ndirimbo zose zifise amajambo amwe hamwe n'injana (melodie) imwe, ariko buri muririmvyi akaza arashiramwo akiwe kajanye n'umuco wiwe. Kami avuga ko bitari vyoroshe guhindura mu kirundi indirimbo isanzwe iriho ngo ariko baroroherejwe. Yagize ati: "Cabaye igikorwa kitoroshe ariko baraduhaye umwidegemvyo wo gukora irya ndirimbo twisunze ama 'realites' yacu yo mu Burundi. "Nico gituma muri irya ndirimbo murumvamwo inanga y'ikirundi, murumvamwo ingoma, murumvamwo akazehe, murumvamwo umudiho w'amayaya." Urashobora kwumva ukanaraba amashusho y'indirimbo Resolution Song ya Yves Kami ngaha.

column2: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje iduzwa ry’amakori mu kwihora Ubushinwa
column3: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje ko agiye kwihora igihugu c'Ubushinwa mu kuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biva muri ico gihugu, ivyatumye ibintu biyangara mu ntambara y'ubutunzi hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi. Hari haciye amasaha make Ubushinwa butangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biciye  imiliyoni 75 z'amadolari vyinjiye muri ico gihugu bivuye muri vya Amerika, ivyo Perezida Trump yiyamiriza. Bwana Trump avuga ko iyo ngingo y'Ubushinwa ari iya "politike", akabwagiriza ko bushaka "kugendera" kuri Amerika. Ubushinwa bwatangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori kuva ku bice 5% gushika kuri 10% ku bidandazwa birenga 5000 biva muri Amerika, harimwo ivyimburwa vyo mu burimyi, indege n'ibitoro bitarahingura. Butegura kandi gutoza ikori ryari ryarabangiriweko ry'ibice 25% ku mamodokari ava muri Amerika. Abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yatangaje iduzwa ry'ayo makori ku bice 5% ku bidandazwa vyinjira bivuye mu Bushinwa. Avuga ko kuva kw'igenekerezo rya 01 ukwezi kw'icumi, Amerika izoduza amakori kuri ivyo bidandazwa biciye imiliyoni 250 y'abanyamerika, kuva kuri 25% gushika kuri 30%. Avuga kandi ko ibidandazwa biciye amadolari 300 vyari vyitezwe gutozwako ikori ingana n'ibice 10% rizoduga gushika kuri 15%. Ati: "Ikibabaje, ni uko ubutegetsi bw'inyuma bwaretse Ubushinwa bukarengera inyungu za Amerika muvyo ubudandaji, ku buryo bwabaye umuzigo ku mutangakori wa Amerika. Jewe nk'umukuru w'igihugu, sinshobora kwemera ko ivyo bisubira". Bwana Trump amenyesha ko "kuri iyo mvo, yategetse" amakompanyi ya Amerika kuvavanura n'Ubushinwa bakarondera abandi bakorana, agapfuma arondera ingene yokorera muri Amerika. Izo ngingo zerekana ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri ku vyerekeye ubudandaji zatumye ibintu biba nabi ku masoko y'ivunja n'ivunjwa ry'amafarangam haba muri Amerika, canke i Bulaya. Ku munsi wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga umukuru w'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ca Amerika, Jerome Powell, inyuma y'aho avugiye ko iyo ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bugira ibibazo. Aciye kuri Twitter, Perezida Trump yashitse kure, aho yibajije nimba uyo mukuru w'ibanku nkuru y'igihugu atoba ari "umwansi" mukuru gusumba umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa, Xi Jinping.

column2: Umuyabaga wa Barcelona ava Guinée-Bissau, Ansu Fati w’imyaka 16, yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espagne
column3: Umuyabaga Ansu Fati w'imyaka 16 akinira Barcelona yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espanye, ikaba ari inzira yuguruwe ngo ico gihugu gishobore kumukinisha mu nkino mpuzamakungu. Uyo muyabaga w'imyaka 16 afise kandi uburenganzira bw'ugukinira igihugu ciwe c'amavukiro ca  Guinée-Bissau , ariko kandi agashobora n'ugukinira Portugal aho sekuru na inakuru basanzwe bari. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati nibwo bwafashe ico cemezo c'ukumwemerera igisabo ciwe inyuma y'aho akwirije imyaka 10 aba muri ico gihugu nk'uko bisabwa n'amategeko. Ivyo bivuga ko Fati ashobora gukinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espanye mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi c'umupira w'amaguru w'abatarenza imyaka 17 ryimirije gutangura muri Brezili ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kw'icumi uno mwaka. Ariko n'aho azokinira Espanye mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 17, amategeko agenga ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi FIFA avuga ko ashobora guhindura agakina mu murwi w'abakuze. Ku munsi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, Fati yabaye umukinyi wa mbere muto cane akiniye Barcelona mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere mu bihugu vyabo (Champions League), mu rukino rwayihuje na Borussia Dortmund rukarangira ari 0-0. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 16 ariko yerekana ibintu bidasanzwe mu mupira w'amaguru mu murwi wiwe Barcelona, ibitangaza abatari bake ku myaka yiwe. Mu nkino zine gusa za mbere Barcelona imaze gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Espanye, La Liga, Fati amaze gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri. Yatanguye gukinira Barcelona igihe uyo murwi wahura na Real Betis, akaba yagiye kwinjira mu kibuga ku munota wa 78 asubiriye umukinyi yitwa Perez. Fati yatangujwe mu kibuga ubwa mbere igihe Barcelona yatana mu mitwe na Valencia ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze, aho yataye abantu mu gahundwe mu gutsinda igitsindo ca mbere ku munota wa kabiri gusa urukino rutanguye, rukaba rwagiye kurangira Barcelona inyagiye Valencia ibitsindo 5 kuri 2.

column2: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
column3: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

column2: Finland, igihugu gitwawe n'abagore
column3: Finland, igihugu gitwawe n'abagore kikaba ari naco kirangwamwo umunezero kurusha ahandi kw'isi mu mwaka w'2019 nk'uko icegeranyo ca ONU kibivuga. Umushikirangani wa mbere ni umugore, akaba ari we mushikiranganji wa mbere akiri muto kurusha abandi kw'isi.

column2: European Super League: FIFA iragabisha abatanguje iri higanwa
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ry'umupira w'amaguru, FIFA, asaba abateguye ihiganwa European Super League kwiyumvira neza imbere y'ugufata ingingo. Gianni Infantino agabisha ko abari inyuma yavyo bashobora kwisanga bari hanze yaryo. Mu gihe abatari bake cane cane abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru biyamiriza iyo ngingo bakavuga ko ifashwe ku ntumbero zo kurondera amaronko, Florentino Perez, umukuwu w'umurwi Real Madrid, we avuga ko iri higanwa rizorokora umupira w'amaguru. Ku mugoroba w'uyu musi, vyitezwe ko umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson agiriranira inama n'abarongoye umupira w'amaguru hamwe n'abaserukira abafana kuri iki kibazo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu nama nkuru y'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Gianni Infantino yavuze ko abatanguje iri higanwa, bazotegerezwa kwemera ingaruka z'iyi nzira bazoba bahisemwo. Yashimangiye cane ko FIFA idashigikiye iyo ngendo. Florentino Perez, umukuru w'umurwi Real Madrid, umwe mu mirwi 12 ya Buraya yatanguje iri higanwa, avuga ko ryashinzwe kugira ngo "rirokore umupira w'amaguru". Avuga ko iyi  ngingo yafashwe kubera urwaruka "rutari rugikunda umupira w'amaguru" kubera "ubuhinga buke burangwa mu nkino zitandukanye". Ati: "Igihe cose habaye impinduka, hama hari abantu bazirwanya". Imirwi itandatu ikomeye yo mu Bwongereza, Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool, Manchester City, Manchester United na Tottenham yaremeye kwinjira muri iryo higanwa. Iyi ngingo iranegurwa cane n'abarongoye umupira w'amaguru hamwe n'abashikiranganji bamwe mu Bwongereza, ikaba kandi yiyamirizwa cane n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Buraya, UEFA, hamwe n'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru. Kuri uyu wa kabiri umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yagiranye inama n'abarongoye amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru muri ico gihugu kugira ngo bavugane kuri iki kibazo, mu gihe imirwi 14 ya Premier League itari muri uwo mugambi vyitezwe ko nayo nyene ikorana. Perez avuga ko imirwi mikuru mikuru iriko iratakaza amahera, ko rero inkino z'imirwi ikomeye zizoshobora kunagura ubutunzi bwayo. Perez yabwiye televiziyo yo muri Espagne El Chiringuito de Jugones ati: "Turiko dukora ibi kugira ngo turokore umupira w'amaguru muri  iki gihe gikomeye." "Tubandanije n'iri higanwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League), ibintu bizogenda biyangara, hayuma bipfe burundu". "Iyi nteguro nshasha izotangura mu 2024 ntitomoye. Mu 2024, twese kazoba kabaye". Integuro yo gusubiramwo Champions League ku buryo izohora ihuriramwo imirwi 36 ikaba izotangura mu 2024, yaremejwe na UEFA ejo ku wa mbere. Yongerako ati: "Mu myaka ya 1950, vyari co kimwe. UEFA na FIFA zariyamirije ihiganwa rishasha rya Buraya, ariko ryarahinduye urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru". Perez avuga ko iyi ngingo yatumwe n'ikiza karanda ca coronavirus, catumye inkino zikinwa ata barorerezi bari mu kibuga. Avuga ko ibice 40% batagikunda umupira kandi ko Real ubwayo yatakaje imiriyoni 400 z'ama euros kubera ingaruka za coronavirus. Perez ati: "Iyo udafise ayandi mikoro uretse ayava kuri tereviziyo, ni ngombwa ko urondera inyishu kugira ngo haboneke izindi nkino zihuza imirwi yose ikomeye kugira abafana kw'isi yose bashobore kurorera". "Abakiri bato ntibagikunda umupira w'amaguru. Baca bigira ku zindi mbuga zibamara irungu". "Dushobora kugarura amwe mu mafaranga twatakaje kubera iki kiza. Ni ngombwa ko turondera amahera mu gutegura ayandi mahiganwa". Abatanguje iri higanwa bavuga ko imirwi yose yatakaje amafaranga kubera ikiza ca coronavirus. Ingene ubutunzi bwamanutse mu 2020 ugereranije na 2019: Ariko abanegura iyi ngingo bavuga ko ata kindi igamije atari ukurondera amahera gusa, ko izokwica amahiganwa y'ibihugu kandi ko idahesha iteka uru rukino. Uwahoze ari kizigenda w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Alan Shearer avuga ko yizeye neza ko imirwi y'Ubwongereza izofata nkama  ivyo abafana bazovuga, aba nabo bakaba bavyiyamiriza bikomeye. Shearer yabwiye ikiganiro Breakfast ca BBC ati:  "Imirwi yama ivuga ko ari umuryango kandi ko abafana ari wo mutima w'umurwi". "Rero, reka turabe ico biyumvira ku bafana, kubera ubu abafana bamaze kuvuga aho bahagaze". "Biraboneka neza ko iki kintu batagishaka, rero reka turabe ikibanza abafana bahabwa n'imirwi y'umupira w'amaguru". Perez avuga ko iyi mirwi yagiye hamwe yipfuza ko iri higanwa rishasha ritangura mu kw'umunani mu gihe bokwumvikana na UEFA, vyanse rikarindirizwa umwaka umwe. Umukuru wa UEFA, Aleksander Ceferin, avuga ko iri higanwa ari umugambi "uteye isoni, wo kwigungirako" kandi ko ari "ugucira amate mu maso abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru". Ceferin avuga kandi ko abakinyi bazoba bari muri iri higanwa bashobora guhagarikwa mu yandi mahiganwa ya UEFA, ivyo Perez abeshuza. Ati: "Ibi ntibizobaho, amategeko aradukingira". "Nta mpari zo mu mategeko tuzojamwo. Ntibishoboka. Abakinyi botekana kuko ibi ntibizoba". "Si ihiganwa ry'abatunzi, ni ihiganwa ryo kurokora umupira w'amaguru". Iri higanwa ritegekanywa guhuza imirwi 20 yose hamwe kandi ribangabanganwe n'ayandi mahiganwa y'ibihugu nk'akarorero Premier League.

column2: Burundi: Révérien Ndikuriyo yatowe kuba umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNDD-FDD
column3: Umukenguzamateka Reveriyano Ndikuriyo niwe yemejwe n'abanywanyi ba CNDD-FDD nk'umunyamabanga mukuru mushasha w'uyo mugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu Burundi. Ni inyuma y'ikoraniro kaminuza ridasanzwe ryabereye ku mugwa mukuru wa poritike, Gitega, ku wa Mungu 24/01/2021. Umukenguzamateka Ndikuriyo asubiriye Evariste Ndayishimiye yari ajejwe ayo mabanga kuva mu 2016 igihe haba isubirwamwo ry'inzego zirongoye uyo mugambwe. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, umushingamateka Ndikuriyo yashimiye Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye bagendanye, hamwe n'abanywanyi b'umugambwe wiwe bamwizeye. Yiyemeje kutazobahemukira. Umukenguzamateka Reveriyano Ndikuriyo yavukiye muri komine Kayogoro y'intara ya Makamba. Reveriyano Ndikuriyo yahoze ari mu banywanyi ba CNDD-FDD igihe wari ukiri umuhari warwanya ubutegetsi mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Uyo muhari umaze gutera igikumu ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara, umukenguzamateka Ndikuriyo yarasubijwe mu buzima busanzwe akaba yararanguye amabanga atandukanye mu gihugu. Kuva mu 2004 yabaye buramatari w'intara ya Makamba asanzwe avukamwo, gushika mu 2007 aho abereye umushingamateka gushika mu 2010. Mu 2010, yatowe kuba umukenguzamateka, amabanga yasubiye gutorerwa mu 2015 mu matora yabayemwo impari nyinshi, maze aca atorwa kuyirongora gushika mu 2020. Muri kino gihe, asanzwe arongoye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu burundi, FFB kuva mu 2013.

column2: Burundi: BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu ico gihugu
column3: Radiyo BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, nk'uko bihejeje gutangazwa n'urwego rw'Uburundi rujejwe gucungera ibimenyeshamakuru, Conseil National de la Communication (CNC). Uwurongoye urwego CNC, Madame Vestine  Nahimana, yabimenyesheje mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'inama y'abagize urwo rwego. BBC yari imaze neza na neza imyaka itatu yafatiwe ingingo yo guhagarikwa mu Burundi. Ingingo yari yafashwe itariki 29 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2019. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko mu rwego CNC baronse ikete rya BBC isaba gusubira gukorera mu Burundi  baca basanga "nta kindi gisigaye atari ukuyakira kugira ngo isubire gushira ahabona ibiganiro vyayo". CNC yari yatse BBC uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi iyagiriza kurenga amategeko agenga umwuga  wo kumenyesha amakuru muri ico gihugu  hamwe n'inyafato itajanye n'umwuga. Nta biganiro yari irekuriwe gushikiriza mu Burundi, nta n'umunyamakuru yari yemerewe kuyikorera canke kuyiha inkuru mu buryo ubwaribwo bwose muri ico gihugu kuva ico gihe. BBC yari yatswe uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi yagirizwa  gutosekaza izina rya reta yari irongowe ico gihe na prezida Pierre Nkurunziza. Na cane cane inyanduruko yavuye ku matohoza ku vyavugwa ko ari ibibanza abantu bapfungirwamwo mu kinyegero  kandi bakaborezwamwo igufa mu ntumbero yo gucecekesha abatavuga rumwe na reta, ivyo reta yiyamirije nk'"inkuru z'ibinyoma". Ico gihe BBC yumvirizwa n'abantu bangana na miriyoni 1.3 mu Burundi. Hemerewe ibinyamakuru bishasha vyinshi Ibinyamakuru bitari bike birimwo n'Ijwi rya Amerika (VOA),  Iwacu, radiyo Bonesha FM, Ikiriho n'ibindi vyarafatiwe ibihano mu bihe n'imvo bitandukanye vy'inyuma y'intureka za poritike zo mu 2015. Ivyo bihano vyari vyiyamirijwe n'amashirahamwe haranira uburenganzira bwa zina muntu nka Amnesty International yavuze ko vyari ingingo "zeruye z'abategetsi b'Uburundi mu gucecekesha ibimenyeshamakuru". Kuva presida Evariste Ndaishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2020,  imwe mu ntumbero yashize imbere n'ukunagura imigendeneranire myiza n'ibihugu canke amashirahamwe atarabana ryiza na reta y'Uburundi kuva mu 2015. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ishirahamwe rya  Buraya biherutse gufuta ingingo z'ibihano  vyari vyarafatiye Uburundi. Bimwe bimwe nka Iwacu, Ikiriho na Bonesha FM  haheze igihe vyarahawe uruhusha rwo gusubira gukora. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko CNC yumviye akamo k'umukuru w'igihugu yasavye urwo rwego kuvugana n'ibinyamakuru vyari vyarafatiwe ibihano kugirango bisubire guhabwa impusha zo gukora. Muri iyo nama yemereye BBC gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, CNC yemereye kandi ama radiyo n'ama television mashasha: Dosiye y'iyindi radiyo, Radio Voix de Developpement Communautaire de Bubanza yasubijwe inyuma  kugira ije guhinyanyura ivyo  CNC yayisavye. Atangaza ko BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, umukuru wa CNC yagize ati:  "Twizeye ko tugiye kubandanya dukorana n'iyo radiyo mu ntumbero yo kubandanya twubahiriza umwuga w'abamenyeshamakuru n'ibimenyeshamakuru."

column2: Burundi – US: Prezida Joe Biden yavanyeho ibihano vyari vyarafatiwe Uburundi
column3: Umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden ku wa kane yafashe ingingo-tegeko ivanaho ibihano ico gihugu cari cafatiye Uburundi mu 2015 gishingiye  k'uko ibintu vyari vyifashe muri ico gihe. Ingingo itavugwako rumwe ya Prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yo kwitoreza ikiringo ca gatatu c'umukuru w'igihugu mu 2015 yakurikiwe n'intureka ziturutse ku myiyerekano yo kuyanka hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'inzego z'umutekano vyo kuyitesha. Abantu amajana barishwe abandi ibihumbi barahunga igihugu. Prezida Biden avuga ko iyo ngingo yafashe ku wa kane ishingiye ku bimaze guhinduka mu nzira nziza kuva hashitse ku butegetsi umukuru w'igihugu mushasha. Prezida Biden avuga ko ibintu mu Burundi ''vyahinduwe cane n'ivyabaye mu mwaka uheze" harimwo guhererekanya ubutegetsi inyuma y'itorwa rya Evariste Ndayishimiye mu 2020, ukugabanuka kw'intureka, hamwe no "kubandanya impinduka mu bisata bitandukanye". Ku butumwa yanditse kuri Twitter, umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evaritse Ndayishimiye yakiriye neza iyo ngingo y'umukuru wa Amerika yo kuvana ibihano ku gihugu arongoye. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Ibihano ku Burundi  vyari vyafashwe ku ntwaro ya Prezida Obama mu 2015. Ico gihe hari abantu bane bari bafatiwe ibihano ku giti cabo. Barimwo Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni, ubu asigaye ari umushikiranganji wa mbere muri reta ya Evariste Ndayishimiye. Mu 2015, Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni yari umushikiranganji ajejwe umutekano. Bamwe mu bari mu nzego z'umutekano bagirijwe uruhara mu mahano atandukanye muri ico gihe c'intureka. Uwundi mutegetsi mu nzego z'igihugu yari Godefroid  Bizimana yari icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru ajejwe igiporisi. Bandi babiri bari abaza kw'isonga mu bashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu 2015: Jenerari Godefroid Niyombare n'umuhisi Jenerari Cyrille Ndayirukiye. Harongeweko n'abandi mu nyuma. Barimwo  Gervais Ndirakobuca ubu ajejwe ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati , umutekano n'iterambere rusangi.  Hari na  Joseph Mathias Niyonzima azwi cane mu rwego rw'iperereza mu Burundi. Harinwo kandi  Alexis Sinduhije na Leonard Ngendakumana ku ruhara  mu guteza umutekano muke mu Burundi. Ntibari bemerewe guhabwa uruhusha rwo kwinjira muri Amerika, amatungo yabo nayo yari yarafatiriwe. Iyo nkuru nziza kuri reta y'Uburundi Amwe mu mashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu  ashobora kutayakira neza. Ni mu gihe avuga ko Prezida Ndayishimiye ataco arakora gifadika ngo agateka ka muntu kubahirizwe, akavuga ko ivyaha birimwo kwica, kunyuruza no kwica rubozo n'ubu bikibandanga mu gihugu na cane cane ku batavuga rumwe n'iyo reta. N'ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryarafatiye ibihano Uburundi kubera ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu  ryandurutse kuri izo ntureka za poritke. Iryo shirahamwe na reta y'Uburundi bamaze umwaka urenga baganira ingene ivyo bihano vyovaho. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya rivuga ko bigeze ku "ntambwe ikomeye". Mw'itangazo, icegera c'umukuru w'urwego rw'imari muri Amerika Wally Adeyemo avuga ko "Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zibona impinduka nziza ziriko ziragirwa na prezida Ndayishimiye mu gihe zibandanya guhimiriza Uburundi guteza imbere ibijanye n'agateka ka zina muntu mu gihugu n'uko abakora amabi babibazwa."

column2: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

column2: Inama ya G7 yemeje integuro yo gusohora amafaranga kugira ihangane na China
column3: Abategetsi b'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bihurikiye mu citwa G7 bemeje integuro yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye n'ibiri mu nzira y'amajambere mu bikorwa vy'iterambere, ni mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko ashaka ko umugambi wo gufasha ibihugu bikenye ushigikiwe na Amerika, wiswe Build Back Better World (B3W), uba uwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ugasubirira umugambi nk'uwo w'Ubushinwa. Umugambi w'Ubushinwa uzwi nka Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), uramaze gufasha ibihugu bitari bike mu kubironsa amagari ya moshi, kwubaka amabarabara n'ibivuko. Ariko ni umugambi unegurwa cane, uvugwa ko winjije ibihugu mu madeni y'umurengera. Mw'itangazo basohoye inyuma y'inama yariko ibera mu karere ka Cornwall mu Bwongereza, abategetsi ba G7 bavuga ko bazoshira imbere ubucuti bushingiye ku "kwubahiriza indangagaciro, bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru hamwe no gukorera mu muco". Hagati aho, ntibatomora iyo amafaranga azova mu gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel avuga ko batari bwagere ku gihe co gusohora amafaranga. Amerika iranegura cane Ubushinwa ku nteguro yabwo y'ugukomeza igifatwa nk'imigenderanire "ishingiye ku madeni". Abategetsi ba G7, umurwi w'ibihugu indwi bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bivuga ko bishira imbere intwaro rusangi, bavuga kandi ko biyemeje gushiraho iyindi nteguro y'ingingo zo kurwanya ibindi biza bishobora kwiyadukiza muri kazoza. Muri izi ngingo harimwo kugabanya ikiringo co gukora no kwemeza incanco n'imiti yo kurwanya Covid-19 kikaja musi y'imisi ijana. Kuri uyu wa Mungu niho bategekanya gutangaza iyi nteguro, hampande y'itangazo rirangiza iyi nama barimwo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson niwe arongoye iyi nama y'imisi itatu iriko ibera mu karere ka Carbis Bay. Ni ibiki ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'isi vyoba bimaze gukorera Ubushinwa gushika ubu ? Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Amerika, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Ubwongereza hamwe na Canada vyafatiye ibihano Ubushinwa. Ibi bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi bo hejuru mu ntara ya Xinjiang bagirizwa ihonyanga ry'agateka ka zina muntu bakorera aba Islam  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur, muri vyo hakaba harimwo ukubuza ingendo muri ivyo bihugu hamwe no gufata amatungo yabo. Abantu barenga umuriyoni bo  mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur z'izindi nkehwa nibo bazwi ko bapfungiwe mu makambi ari muyi iyo ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Reta y'Ubushinwa yagirizwa gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba Uyghur no gusambura imiryango, mu gutandukanya abana n'abavyeyi babo. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryashizwe ahabona mu kwa kabiri ririmwo amakuru yemeza ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'iyicarubozo bikorerwa abapfungiwe muri ayo makambi. Ubushinwa bwaciye bwihora mu gufatira ibihano abategetsi b'aba nya Burayi.

column2: Covid: Biden avuga igitigiri ca 500.000 bamaze gupfa ari ''intambwe ivuna umutima''
column3: Prezida Joe Biden yashikirije ijambo igihugu ubwo Amerika yarenganye igitigiri c'abantu ibihumbi amajana 500 bamaze guhitanwa n'impfu zifatiye kuri Covid, igitigiri ca mbere kinini mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi. Biden yavuze ati: ''Nk'igihugu, ntidutegezwa kwemera akaga kariko karadushikira.Dutegerezwa kwanka gutimbishwa n'intuntu.'' Umukuru w'igihugu n'icegera ciwe, n'abo bubakanye,baciye bamara akanya mu gacerere hanze ya Maison Blanche(White House) mu birori vyo kwatsa buji. Ubu abantu banduye umugera wa corona muri Amerika  ni miriyoni 28,1. Naco nyene nico gitgiri ca mbere kinini kw'isi. . Biden yavuze ati: "Uyu munsi nsavye Abanyamerika bose kwibuka. Kwibuka abo twabuze no kwibuka abo twasize inyuma", anasaba abanyamerika kugwaniriza Covid hamwe. Biden yavyifashemwo gute kuri uwo munsi? Prezida yategetse amabendera yose yo mu bibanza mpuzantara kuduzwa gushika hagati muri iyi minsi itanu iri imbere. Ku ngoro y'umukuru w'igihugu, yuguruye ijambo ryiwe yerekana ko igitigiri c'Abanyamerika bamaze kwicwa na Covid kiruta abishwe mu ntambara ya mbere y'isi , intabara ya kabiri y'isi n'intambara yo muri Vietnam ubafatiye hamwe. Yavuze ati : ''Uyu munsi vy'ukuri n'umunsi mubi, umunsi w'intambwe ivuna umutima-abantu 500.071 bamaze gupfa.'' Yabandanije ati: ''Hari aho twumva abantu bavugwa ngo Abanyamerika basanzwe. Ikintu nk'ico ntikibaho. Nta kintu cari gisanzwe kuri bo. Abantu  twabuze ntibari basanzwe. Bari mu myaka myinshi y'urunganwe. Bavukiye muri Amerika, bimukiye muri Amerika. None benshi muri bo bahemye irya nyuma bonyene muri Amerika'' Yafatiye ku vyamushikiye mu buzima bwiwe mu kwerekana akababaro-umugore wiwe n'umukobwa wiwe baguye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu 1972 hanyuma umwe mu bahungu biwe yicwa na cancer yo mu bwonko mu 2015. At: "Ndazi ico arico kuba utari hafi iyo bishitse. Ndazi icari co iyo uhari ukabafata ibiganza; urabona ingene bakuravye hanyuma bakigira.'' "Kuri jewe, inzira yo kurwanya intuntu n'ugutora ico tugamije". Intumbero ya Biden itandukanye n'iyo uwo yasubiriye, Donald Trump yari afise kwijijanya ingaruka z'uwo mugera kandi yabonwa nk'uwagize ikibazo ca poritike ukwambara agafukamunwa n'izindi ngingo zo kwirinda gukwirakwiza uwo mugera. Ku wa 19 ukwezi kwa mbere, buca Biden atangura amabanga, yarakoze umugirwa wo kwibuka abanyamerika 400.000 bari bamaze guhitanwa n'iyo ndwara. Umunsi wo kuri uyu wa mbere washitse haheze hafi ukwezi. Ahandi mu gisagara ca Washington, amakengeri kuri National Cathedral yavuze incuro amajana atanu, rimwe rimwe ryose ku bantu 1.000 bamaze gupfa muri iki kiza. Dr Ashish Jha, umukuru w'igisata c'magara y'abanyagihugu kuri kaminuza ya Brown yabwiye BBC News  ati  : "Haraheze umwaka ntibaza ko  inusu y'umuriyoni w'abantu bashobora gutakaza ubuzima kubera iyo ndwara. Dufise ubushobozi bwinshi, dufise uburyo bwinshi…ibi vyose twari kuvyirinda,ntivyari gushika. Ariko none raba aho tugeze.'' Igihe co  kubaho muri Amerika ubu cagabanutseko umwaka wuzuye kubera Covid-19,nk'uko vyavuzwe ku ndwi iheze n'ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya no gukinga indwara. Ico gihe cagabanutse cane mu bo mu bwoko bwa banyamuke ari nabo uwo mugera wasinzikaje cane ugereranije n'abandi. Ibirabure bataje imyaka itatu ku gihe cabo co kubaho hagati y'ukwezi kwa mbere n'ukwa gatantatu mu 2020. Abagabo bakomoka muri Amerika y'Epfo (Hispanic) nabo batakaje imyaka 2,4 muri ico kiringo.

column2: DR Congo: Ebola 'yarangiye' mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko
column3: Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi  ya Congo itangaza ko akarere k'ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu ubu katakirangwamwo Ebola, inyuma y'amezi arenga abiri ata wundi murwayi abonetse. Ivyo bimenyeshwa n'ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi (OMS/WHO) risubiramwo ivyatangajwe na Dr Longondo Eteni, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Congo. Ivyo bimenyeshejwe haciye iminsi 40 ata wundi murwayi wa Ebola abonetse mu ntara ya Kivu y'uburaruko hamwe na Ituri, zose ziri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Congo. Umurwayi wa nyuma yaheruka kuvugwa ku wa 06 z'ukwa kane. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe OMS muri Afrika Dr Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ko iyo ndwara yarwanijwe muri ako karere kubera ugukorana hagati y'inzego zitandukanye be n'abanyagihugu. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abamenyeshamakuru biciye ku buhinga bwa none, Dr Moeti yavuze ati: "Iki ni icizere ko ugufatana mu nda be n'ubuhinga bigiye hamwe indwara z'ivyaduka zishobora kuranduranwa n'imizi". Kugira ngo ikiza gitangazwe ko carangiye, hategerezwa kuba haciye iminsi 42 kuva umuntu wa nyuma avuye mu bitaro amaze gupimwa agasanga ntakirwaye. Ikiza ca Ebola cadutse mu kwa munani 2018 ni co cagira kabiri gikomeye aho abarenga 3400 banduye nayo abarenga 2200 kirabahitana,  inyuma y'ico mu 2014 muri Afrika y'Uburengero. Nico ca mbere kandi cadutse mu karere karimwo intambara, aho ibitero birenga 420 vyakozwe n'imirwi y'inyeshamba ku bigo vy'amavuriro, ivyatumye utwigoro two kurwanya ico kiza tugenda ducumbagira. Iyo nkuru ije nk'ihumure mu gihugu kandi gihanganye na wa mugera coronavirus hamwe n'ikiza c'agasama kitari bwigere kiboneka kw'isi nzima. Hagati aho, haravugwa ko Ebola yibonekeje mu bindi bice vy'igihugu - ku ncuro ya 11 mu mateka y'ico gihugu - mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Ku wa 01 z'uku kwa gatandatu, niho leta y'ico gihugu yatangaza umurwayi wa mbere wa Ebola mu ntara ya Mbandaka.

column2: US iriko izibira Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, umunyafrika wa mbere kurongora WTO
column3: Igenwa ry'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji w'ikigega wa Nijeriya kurongora  ishirahamwe rijejwe ubudandaji kw'isi, OMC/WTO, rishobora kuburizwamwo inyuma y'aho Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zankiye iki cemezo. Ejo ku wa gatatu, umurwi ujejwe kugena abashaka kurongora iri shirahamwe wasavye ibihugu 164 bihurikiye muri iri shirahamwe gushigikira umupfasoni Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala. Yoba abaye umugore wa mbere kandi umunyafrika wa mbere arongoye WTO. Ariko Amerika isanzwe inegura imikorere ya WTO mu budandaji mpuzamakungu, ishaka ko iri shirahamwe rirongorwa n'uwundi mugore, umunya Koreya y'Ubumanuko, Yoo Myung-hee, ivuga ko yozana impunduka muri iri shirahamwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala avuga ko "ari iteka rinini cane" kuri we kubona yizigirwa. Ariko iki gikorwa kimaze amezi ane yose co kugena uwushobora kurongora WTO cahuye n'inzitizi zikomeye igihe Amerika ivugiye ko izobandanya ishigikira uyu mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji wa Koreya y'Ubumanuko. Mw'itangazo rinegura WTO, ibiro vya Amerika bijejwe ubudandaji, ari navyo bihanura Perezida Donald Trump ku bijanye na politike y'ubudandaji, bivuga ko iri shirahamwe "ritegerezwa kurongorwa n'umuntu nyawe afise uburambwe muri kino gisata". Umupfasoni Yoo afise "ubuhinga yisangije" nk'inzobere mu bijanye n'ubudandaji kandi "afise ubumenyi bukwiye bwo kurongora neza iri hirahamwe" nk'uko tubisoma muri iryo tangazo. Ryongerako riti: "Iki ni igihe kigoye kuri WTO n'ubudandaji mpuzamakungu. Mu myaka 25 yose iheze nta biganiro vyigeze bihaba ku bijanye n'ibiciro, integuro yo gukemura ibibazo nta kigenda, hanyuma kandi ibihugu bike cane biri muri iri shirahamwe nivyo vyashoboye gukurikiza ingingo shingiro zijanye no gukorera mu muco. WTO irakeneye cane rwose impinduka". Hagati aho, muri iri tangazo, nta na hamwe harimwo izina ry'uyu mupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Mu gatondo k'ejo ku wa gatatu, inyuma y'umubonano w'intumwa za WTO  wo guhanahana ivyiyumviro ku bijanye n'iri genwa, umuvugizi waryo Keith Rockwell yavuze ko igihugu kimwe gusa ari co kitashigikiye umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Ati: "Uno munsi, intumwa zose zashigikiye cane rwose ingene igikorwa cagenze ...n'ivyakivuyemwo. Kiretse iz'igihugu kimwe". 'Igikorwa kidasanzwe' Bwana Trump avuga ko WTO ari "akaga" kandi ko yegamiye ku ruhande  rw'Ubushinwa, ni mu gihe hari bamwe bari bagenywe muri iri shirahamwe bamaze guhagarikwa. WTO yaciye itumako iyindi nama ku wa 09 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe - inyuma y'amatora ya Amerika - kugira ngo basubire bahanahane ivyiyumviro kuri iki kibazo. Kubona Amerika yanka igenwa ry'uyu munya Nijeriya si ukuvuga ko adashobora kugenwa, ariko Washington ishobora kugira uruhara rukomeye mu gufata icemezo ntabanduka. Bwana Rockwell yabwiye abanyamakuru ko hashobora gusabwa igikorwa kidasanzwe kugira ngo igenwa ry'uyu mupfasoni  Okonjo-Iweala rishigikirwe na bose. Gushika ubu, arashigikiwe n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Bulaya. Iri shirahamwe ryatakaje uburongozi bwaryo igihe uwari arirongoye Roberto Azevedo  atangiye imihoho mu kw'umunani kw'umwaka uheze. Kuva ico gihe, ivyegera bine nibo bafise ibintu mu minwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala w'imyaka 66 niwe mupfasoni wa mbere yabaye umushikiranganji w'ubutunzi hamwe n'uw'imigenderanire wa Nijeriya kandi akaba yaramaze imyaka 25 yose ajejwe ibibazo vy'iterambere mw'Ibanki y'isi yose. Muri kino gihe, ari mu barongoye urubuga rwa Twitter, akaba arongoye ihuriro rya GAVI rijejwe incanco, kandi akaba n'intumwa idasanzwe y'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO mu rugamba rwo kurwanya Covid-19. Mu gihe umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala yogenwa, azoba afise igikorwa kidasanzwe. WTO isanzwe ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ibiganiro vy'ubucuruzi vyahagaze hamwe n'icuka kibi hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, yavuze ko uburambe bunini afise mu mu guhindura imikorere bwamutumye aboneka ko ari we nyawe ashoboye gufasha WTO kusubira ku murongo.

column2: Barcelona yemeje ko Xavi Hernandez yagarutse nk'umumenyereza
column3: Uwahoze akina hagati muri Barcelona Xavi Hernandez yagarutse muri uyu murwi wo muri Espagne nk'umumenyereza mu masezerano yo gushika mu 2024. Uyu munya Espagne w'imyaka 41 yahora amenyereza umurwi Al Sadd  wo muri Qatar kuva mu 2019, ariko ejo ku wa gatanu uyu murwi waremeye kumurekura kugira agende muri Barcelona inyuma y'aho iyi mirwi ishikiye ku masezerano. Barcelona ivuga ko aya masezerano azotangurana n'igice gisigaye c'umwaka w'inkino 2021-22 abandanye mu yindi myaka ibiri izokurikira. Yitezwe muri Espagne muri iyi misi y'impera z'iyi ndwi, akaba yiteze kwerekanwa ku mugaragaro i Nou Camp ku wa mbere. Mw'ireresi yarungikiye abafana, uyu yahoze ari umukinyi yafashije igihugu ciwe gutahukana igikombe c'isi yose mu 2010 hamwe n'ibikombe vya Bulaya incuro zibiri yavuze ati: "Si nari nasezeye burundu, nari navuze nti 'tuzosubira vuba'.  Nou Camp hamye ari muhira kuri jewe". "Muri abafana banje, abantu banje, uyu murwi nkunda cane. Ubu rero ndagarutse muhira. Vuba turi kumwe bagenzi.  Forca Barca." Inyuma y'inkino 767 agatsindira ibikombe 25 mu myaka 17 yose yamaze muri Barcelona, Xavi yasezeye uyu murwi mu 2015 aja muri Al Sadd, aho yashikiye ubwa mbere nk'umukinyi. Yahavuye aba umumenyereza wayo mu 2019 inyuma y'aho akukurukiye nk'umukinyi, akaba yarawufashije mu mwaka w'inkino uheze gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa. Mu nkino 36 zose Al Sadd ntirigera itsindwa. Kuva Barcelona yirukanye Ronald Koeman ku wa 27 z'ukwa cumi, Xavi yaravuzwe cane ko yashobora gusubira i Nou Camp ari na ho yamaze igihe kinini cane mu mwuga wiwe w'umupira w'amaguru. Barcelona ubu iza mu kibanza c'icenda mw'ihiganwa La Liga  rya Espagne, imaze gutsinda inkino zine gusa mu nkino cumi na rumwe za mbere imaze gukina, ikaba isumbwa na Real Sociedad iza mu kibanza ca mbere amanota icenda yose. Uyu murwi wo mu ntara ya Catalonia ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amafaranga, mbere ukaba waranananiwe no kugumana umukinyi rurangiranwa yahoze akinana na Xavi, Lionel Messi, kubera ikibazo c'umushahara wiwe. Barcelona yarananiwe no gusohora ayandi mafaranga kugira ngo igure abandi bakinyi mu ci riheze, ikaba yaronse Memphis Depay, Sergio Aguero na Eric Garcia kuri gusa, hanyuma umusatirizi Luuk de Jong nawe akinjira avuye muri Sevilla nk'intizo. Imbere y'umuzo wa Xavi, umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta yigeze kuvuga ati: "Namye ndabivuga kuva kera ko impera n'imperuka (Xavi)  azoba umumenyereza wa Barcelona, ariko sinzi igihe".

column2: Olaf Scholz: Chancelier mushasha w'Ubudagi ni nde?
column3: Yatsinze amatora rusangi, none uwo yari amaze imyaka itatu ari icegera ca Chancelier [Umushikiranganji wa mbere] Angela  Merkel ubu aramusubiriye muri ico kibanza. Olaf Scholz yigeze guhabwa agatazirano ka "Scholzomat" (Scholzomaton) - ariko ubu yarashoboye gushira ku ruhande ivyo abantu bamuziko vyo gukora nk'imashini, arumvikana  n'imigambwe y'aba-Greens (Verts) na Free-Democrats (Liberaux Democrates). Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 63 yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca Hamburg yemereye abatora kubandanya uko ibintu vyahora inyuma y'imyaka itandatu iheze Ubudagi butwarwa na Angela Merkel w'umu conservateur (Conservative), n'ubwo yari ahagarariye umugambwe bahiganwa wa Parti Social Democrate (SPD). Uburyo yifashe neza mu gutunganya ikibazo ca Covid bwamutumye  gushimagizwa no kuduza amajwi y'abamushima. Abatamwemera bafatira ku vyo yaranguye nk'umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta, bakamwagiriza kuba yarananiwe cane  mu kibazo c'incuro zibiri z'akamaramaza kajanye n'amafaranga. Nk'umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta,  Olaf Scholz ni we yari ajejwe uburyo bungana na miriyaridi 884 z'amadorari zegeranijwe na reta y'Ubudagi kugira zifashe  abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu guhangana n'ingaruka z'ikiza. "Iyi ni yo bazooka [ubwoko bw'inkoho] ikenewe kugira akazi gakorwe." Ni we yakoresha amanama y'abashikiranganji igihe Chanceliere Merkel atava i muhira   mu kwiyubara kwandura. N'ubwo wari umuruho guhangana n'ikibazo ca Covid, kuri  Scholz kabaye akaryo ko gutunganya uburyo bunini cane bw'ineza y'igihugu no kurwanira itekane ry'ihihugu, bijanye cane n'imizi yiwe y'ivyiyumviro vy'aba socialiste. Imbere y'uko bitangazwa ko ashaka kwitoza kw'izina ry'umugambwe wiwe  SPD mu kibanza ca chancelier yarakunda kuvuga, iyo abajijwe niba azokwitoza, ati "dukeneye gukora aho kuja mu vyo kwirata". Hamwe n'Ubufaransa, Scholz  yabaye kirumara mu gushika ku mwumvikano wo gusohora amafaranga angana na miriyaridi 750 z'amafaranga y'amanyaburaya Euros yo kwivyukiranya ikiza ca Covid. Hanyuma  inyuma y'imyaka ya Merkel yaranzwe n'imigenderanire ya hafi cane n'Ubufaransa, ivyo Scholz yakoze mu gukomeza ugushigikirana hagati y'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi na we bigiye kumugirira akamaro. Umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe ikigega Bruno Le Maire, uretse kumukeza ku gushigikirana n'Ubufaransa, yanamukeje kandi kuba uwo bavukana,  muganga Jens Scholz, yarafashije kujana mu bitaro vya Kiel n'indege abafaransa batandatu bari baremvye cane kubera Covid -19. Ni igikorwa co gukiza ubuzima cari  kizimvye cane, carishwe na reta y'Ubudagi. "None warakoze cane, Olaf, ku vyo umaze gukora vyose. Ariko kandi n'uwo muvukana yarakoze. Vy'ukuri n'umuryango nyawo w'Abadagi, umuryango w'aba Scholz", uko niko Le Maire yabivuze. Mu  mugambwe wa SPD, yamara, Olaf Scholz abonwa nk'umu-conservateur. Uwo mugambwe afatanije kuwurongora na  Saskia Esken na  Norbert Walter-Borjans, bo basanganywe umurongo w'aba-socialiste ukaze gusumba. Scholz, afise umugore na we w'umunyaporitike w'umu-SPD  Britta Ernst, yakuriye i Hamburg aca yinjira muri poritike nk'indongozi y'urwaruka rw'aba-socialiste, inyuma yo kwiga amategeko ajanye n'akazi. Yabaye umukuru w'igisagara ca Hamburg kuva mu 2011 gushika mu 2018,  ico gihe akaba ari ho ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyagabanuka ubukari bwa gi-socialiste. Yatowe ubwa mbere kuba umushingamateka mu 1998.

column2: Aung San Suu Kyi: Uwo yatembagajwe ku butegetsi bwa Myanmar yaciriwe iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa
column3: Sentare yo muri Myanmar yaciriye Aung San Suu Kyi yakuwe ku butegetsi iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa, mu rubanza rwa vuba muri nyinshi zimurindiriye. Yahamijwe icaha co gutunga no kwinjiza mu gihugu  bitemewe n'amategeko amaradiyo yo gutumatumanako (talkie-walkies) hamwe no kurenga ku ngingo za Covid-19. Madame Suu Kyi yagiriwe n'icaha ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa 12, aca acirirwa igihano kigufi  c'imyaka ibiri yo gupfungwa. Asanzwe apfunzwe kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri igihe igisirikare catembagaza ubutegetsi bwiwe ubu akaba ahanganye n'ibirego vy'ivyaha birenga 10, vyose akaba abihakana. Vyariyamirijwe cane nk'akarenganyo. Vyibazwa ko ivyaha vyo kuri uyu wa mbere vyavuye mu gihe abasirikare basaka inzu yiwe ku munsi haba itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ingabo zari zirongowe na jenerari  Min Aung Hlaing, uwo munsi akaba ariho bavuze ko batoye ivyo ibintu muri iyo nzu. Urubanza rwo kuri uyu wa mbere ku murwa mukuru Nay Pyi Taw nta binyamakuru vyemerewe kurukirira, abacamanza ba Madame Suu Kyi nabo bakaba barabujijwe kuvugana n'abamenyeshamakuru. Ico gihano ca vuba giciye kimushikana  ku myaka itandatu yo gufungwa. Mu kwezi guheze uwo yatsindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel yahamijwe  guhamagarira abantu kutumvira ubutegetsi no kurenga ku mategeko ya Covid-19, mu ciyamirijwe n'umukuru w'urwego rwa ONU  rw'agateka ka zina muntu Michelle Bachelet nk'"urubanza rw'akamaramaza". Human Rigjhts Watch  nayo  yavuze ko izo manza ari "ikinamico ya sentare y'imanza zo mu kinyegero ku vyaha vy'irementanya… kugirango (Aung San Suu Kyi) azohere mw'ibohero". Itangazo ry'icegera c'umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe muri Asia, Phil Robertson, ryagirije kandi igisirikare "kumuhamya ivyaha muri sentare ijejwe kumuhezayo ku birego bidafashe kandi bishingiye ku mvo za poritike", rivuga ko "cirengagiza uburenganzira bw'abantu bose, kuva kuri Suu Kyi… gushika ku mihari y'abatayoboka ubutegetsi  mu mabarabara." Ifatwa ry'ubutegetsi n'igisirikare muri Myanmar (kizwi kandi nka Birmanie/Burma) mu kwezi kwa kabiri ryabaye haheze  amezi umugambwe wa San Suu Kyi, National League for Democracy (NLD), utsinze urukombamazi amatora yo mu kwezi kwa 11 mu 2020. Igisirikare cavuze  ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ariko abakurikirana amatora bavuze ko muri rusangi yagenze neza. Itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ryakiriwe n'imyiyerekano mu gihugu cose, igisikare ca Myamar kikaba kitihanganiye abitaba iyo myiyerekano basaba demokrasi, abaharanira uburenganzira hamwe n'abamenyeshamakuru. Madame Suu Kyi ni umwe mu bantu barenga 10.600 bafashwe n'igisirikare kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri, mu gihe abandi barenga 1.303 bishwe mu myiyerekano nk'uko bivugwa n'umugwi ubikurikirana, Assistance Association for Political Prisoners.

column2: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
column3: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

column2: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

column2: Abarundi barenga 200 bari i Dubai babuze epfo na ruguru kubera coronavirus
column3: Abarundi barenga 200 baheze mu gisagara ca Dubai kuva mu kwa gatatu kw'uno mwaka kubera vyanse ko batahuka iwabo inyuma y'aho uruja n'uruza ruhagarikiwe bivuye ku kiza ca coronavirus. Bavuga ko bari mu mazi abira, bakabona ko bashobora kwisanga mu mabohero kuko ikiringo bahawe na leta y'igihugu ca Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu kizorangira ku wa 12/08. Bavuga ko barishe amatike  mw'ikompanyi y'indege Kenya Airways, ariko ko mu nyuma iyo kompanyi yababwiye ko idashobora kuja mu Burundi kuko ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura kicugaye. Ubuserukizi bw'u Burundi i Dubai burabahumuriza ko ikibazo cabo kiriko kirigwa kandi ko vuba kizotorerwa umuti. Banga Rigumye, umwe muri abo Barundi yagiye arondera akazi, yabwiye BBC ko ibibazo barimwo vyatanguye kuva mu kwagatatu kw'uno mwaka, igihe u Burundi bwugara ikibuga c'indege. "Twari twateguye gutaha ku wa 22 z'ukwa gatatu, iyo tariki nyene leta y'u Burundi ica itangaza ko ikibuga c'indege cugaye mu gihe aha i Dubai naho hari hasohotse itangazo rivuga ko ikibuga cari kwugarwa itariki 25 z'ukwa gatatu". "Twebwe rero twari twateguye kwurira indege kuri iyo tariki kugira ngo ino ntibahave batwugarirako". Avuga ko bahavuye bitura ubuserukizi kugira bubavugire batahe, ariko bikaba bitakunze. Bangarigumye avuga ko leta ya Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu yari yabemereye ko impusha zo kuba muri ico gihugu zari kubandanya gushika mu kwa cumi na kabiri, ariko mu nyuma ivamwo irisubirako. "Twatangarijwe ko kugera kw'igenekerezo rya 12/08 twese twoba twasohotse, atari uko naho uwubishoboye arihe amadolari 700 kugira ngo aronswe visa nshasha. Rero ingorane twebwe Abarundi dufise, kubera coronavirus nta buzi dufise ngo turonke ayo mahera". Avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko bagumayo ataco bariko barakora, gushika aho bene amazu babirukana, ubu bamwe bakaba barara bakirirwa hanze, "ivyo gufungura vyovyo bikaba ari umugani". Asaba ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi y'uko bwobacishirizamwo bagatahuka amarembe badateje iceyi igihugu. Eddy Kevin Gahire aserukira abarundi baba muri ico gihugu avuga ko ico kibazo bagishikirijwe, nabo bakagishikiriza ubuserukizi bw'u Burundi i Dubai. Uwuserukira u Burundi muri Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu aremeza ko abo bantu abazi kuko bamwituye kandi ko ariko arakora uko ashoboye kugira ngo ikibazo cabo gitorerwe umuti. Bapfinda Epimeni yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko mu bisanzwe iyi ngorane iri n'ahandi, ariko ko ikibazo c'abo bari i Dubai gitandukanye kubera abenshi muri bo ari imisore n'inkumi bagiye barondera ubuzi butobuto. Ati: "Barafise ingorane kandi zikomeye cane kuko abenshi ntibafise aho baryama, abenshi ntibafise ingene bashobora no gufungura". "Icabateye ubwoba gusumba ni uko leta y'iki gihugu iherutse gutangaza ko uwo hazogera itariki 12 z'uku kw'umunani azoca atangura gufatwa nk'uwuri mu gihugu bitemewe n'amategeko (overstay)" "Ico gihe bazoca batangura gutozwa ama Durham 100 ku munsi (hafi 525  amafaranga y'amarundi), mu gihe batanaronka n'ayo gufungura". Avuga ko ico bakoze kwabaye ukwandikira ababatwara mu Burundi, kandi ko babishuye bakabasaba  ko botegura urutonde rw'abo bantu. Afise icizere ko mu minsi ikibazo bazogitorera umuti. Abasaba kubandanya barindiriye mu kwihangana gushika ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura cuguruwe bagashobora gutahuka kuko basanzwe bararishe amatike y'indege. Arabahumuriza ko ni hagera y'uko ikiringo bahawe kirangira ku wa 12/08 ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura kitarugururwa ngo bashobore gutaha ko azobasabira imbabazi mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire ya Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu kugira ngo ntibarihishwe amande.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira i Buraya: Mourinho, De Gea, Aguero, Bissouma, Zidane, Benteke, Silva
column3: Igenwa rya Jose Mourinho ngo abe umumenyereza wa Roma mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uza w'inkino rishobora gutuma umukinyi wo hagati w'umutariyano Lorenzo Pellegrini w'imyaka 24 yimukira muri Liverpool, ni mu gihe Mourinho ashaka kugura abakinyi asanzwe azi cane, harimwo Nemanja Matic, umunya Serbia w'imyaka 32 asanzwe akinira Manchester United.(Mirror) Mourinho kandi arizeye ko, mu gihe azoba atanguye ibikorwa muri Roma, ashobora gukorana n'umunyegori wa Manchester United, umunya Espagne David De Gea w'imyaka 30. (Todofichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona yatanguye ibiganiro n'abaserukira wa musatirizi w'umunya Argentina Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32 yiteze kurangiza amasezerano afitaniye na  Manchester City mu ci riza. (Sky Sports) Arsenal iri imbere mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Brighton Yves Bissouma w'imyaka 24, ni mu gihe Tottenham, West Ham na Everton na yo nyene iriko iramurondera.  (Express) Manchester City nayo nyene iriko iraraba ingene yogura uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Mali Bissouma, inyuma y'aho ikuriyemwo akarenge mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wa  West Ham, Declan Rice w'imyaka 22. (Star) Manchester United yabwiwe ko nimba mu ci riza yipfuza umusatirizi wa  Eintracht Frankfurt, umunya Portugal Andre Silva w'imyaka 25 itegerezwa kwegeranya imiriyoni zirenga 48 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Express) Umumenyereza wa Brighton & Hove Albion, Graham Potter ubu afise imyaka 45, ashobora kutemererwa kuva muri uyo murwi mu gihe  Tottenham, isanzwe itagira umumenyereza, yomurondera, ibi bivugwa n'umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Brighton & Hove Albion Paul Barber. (Argus) Umumenyereza wa Leeds United umunya Argentina Marcelo Bielsa aripfuza kugumana umukinyi w'inyuma wo ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Ezgjan Alioski w'imyaka 29, ariko ntabona neza kazoza k'uyu munya Macedonia asanzwe ariko araronderwa na  Galatasaray yo muri Turukiya. (Yorkshire Evening Post) Chelsea irondera kugabanya abakinyi b'inyuma kugira ngo irondere amahera yo kugura abakinyi bandi mu ci, bikaboneka ko umunya Espagne Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30 n'umutariyano akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Emerson Palmieri w'imyaka 26 bashobora gusezera Stamford Bridge. (Goal) Hagati aho, Chelsea na Inter Milan ziteguriye kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Bosnia,  Miralem Pjanic w'imyaka 31 adakunze gukinishwa cane muri Barcelona yashitsemwo mu ci riheze avuye muri Juventus. (Sport) Umukinyi Ashley Young w'imyaka 35 avuga ko bishobora kumugora kwirengagiza gusubira mu murwi wamureze Watford mu gihe womurondera ntanashobore kugiriranira ayandi masezerano mashasha na Inter Milan mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'umwaka w'inkino uza. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Florian Thauvin w'imyaka 28, umukinyi ari mu rutonde rw'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa uherutse gutsindira igikombe c'isi yose, yanse kuja gukinira Crystal Palace ahubwo akaba azova mu murwi wiwe Marseille akaja gukina mu murwi  Tigres wo muri Mexique mu ci riza. (La Provence - in French) Abakinyi ba Real Madrid bafise ubwoba ko umumenyereza wabo, umufaransa Zinedine Zidane w'imyaka 48 "arushe kandi ashavuye", kandi ko azohava ava muri uyu murwi mu ci riza atanarangije amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi asigaje umwaka umwe.  (Goal) Inyuma y'aho Real Madrid ikuriwe na Chelsea mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Buraya (Champions League) igeze mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, abakinyi Eden Hazard umubirigi w'imyaka 30, umunya Bresil Marcelo w'imyaka 32 akina inyuma, hamwe n'umunya Espagne   Isco w'imyaka 29 akina hagati, baboneka ko batari muri kazoza k'uyu murwi.  (Marca - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Crystal Palace n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi Christian Benteke  ashobora kuja gukinira umurwi Fenerbahce, atagisabwe, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyo murwi azorangira ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. (Sun) Everton yemereye amasezerano mashasha umukinyi w'inyuma w'Umwongereza Joe Anderson w'imyaka 20 mu gihe imirwi itari mike yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza iriko iramurondera cane, na rirya amasezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azorangira mu ci riza. (Liverpool Echo) Atletico Madrid irashaka kugura mu ci riza umukinyi wa Barcelona, umunya Espagne Riqui Puig w'imyaka 21. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona na Paris Saint-Germain ziriko zirarondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Monaco, umunya Bresil Caio Henrique w'imyaka 23. (UOL - in Portuguese)

column2: China: Uwakoze urukino rwa video 'Game of Thrones' yishwe ahawe ishano
column3: Igipolisi ca Shanghai kivuga ko umugwizatunga w'umushinwa yapfuye kuri Noheli yahawe ishano. Lin Qi w'imyaka 39 yari arongoye akaba n'umunyamabanga mukuru wa kompanyi ikora inkino zo kuri video Yoozoo izwi cane ku rukino rwa Game of Thrones: Winter is Coming. Itangazo ry'igipolisi ca Shanghai ritunga agatoke uwo bakorana na Lin - azwi kw'izina rimwe gusa rya Xu- ko ari we yikekwa. Lin yoba yarafise ubutunzi bwa miriyaridi 6.8 z'ama Yuan (imiliyoni 980 z'ama pawundi) nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo ca Hurun China Rich List. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, abakozi benshi hamwe n'abahoze bakora muri kompanyi Yoozoo bakoraniye hanze y'ibiro vyayo mu kumugandarira. Uwo mugwizatunga yari rurangiranwa kw'isoko ry'ubushinwa rigurisha inkino za video akaba yari yanatanguye urudandazwa rwo gusohora filime. Yashinze Yoozoo mu 2009, arongora neza iyo kompanyi mu gihe hariko haraba impinduka nyinshi ziganisha ku nkino zo kuri telephone ngendanwa. N'iyo kompanyi yasohoye itangazo ribabaje ku rubuga rwayo rwa Weibo Microblog. Rivuga riti:"Turikebanuye ugiye ukiri muto. Tuzokwama turi kumwe. Tuzogumana ubwitonzi, tubandanye kwemera ubugwaneza kandi tuzokwamirira kure ikintu cose kibi." Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bagize ico bavuze kuri urwo rwandiko, rwarabwe n'abantu incuro zirenga imiliyoni 290 kuri Weibo.
